story:
Why The Backup Belt™?

The stats on rape and sexual assault are staggering. The rape culture is real, and there must be a solution. Almost daily, the news is filled with coverage of college rape or sexual assault, or other violent crimes against women. The discussion must continue to be opened up, and a change must take place. Just look at a few of these statistics.

What is the Backup Belt™?

The Backup Belt™ is a non-lethal, triple-threat, personal, safety device designed to empower women to defend themselves if and when a sudden situation arises. It was designed by a woman, for women. Ladies, it empowers us to defend ourselves if and when it becomes necessary.

Weapons on the Belt

It was created for active women everywhere; young or old; while working, shopping, or at play. It is made of a durable, washable, material that has a Velcro facing allowing multiple weapons to be affixed to the front of it. Every weapon attached to The Backup Belt™ can easily and immediately be accessed (in less than one second; faster than the blinking of an eye). Easily enough time to make your presence known to bystanders, law enforcement, or your neighbors.

From our factory, The Backup Belt™ comes with the following weapons:

  1. a loud, shrill personal alarm with easy pull cord (140dB),

  2. an on-demand, easy-to-use canister of pepper spray,

  3. an easy-to-grip corkscrew (in a protective sheath).

The Alarm

The personal alarm at 140 dB (decibels) is so ear-piercing that it literally jolts anyone within several hundred feet, makes dogs in the area start howling and barking, and startles any would-be attacker.

Pepper Spray

The pepper spray emits a pattern of approximately 2 feet in diameter, and a distance of up to 15 feet. It is so potent that it can stop an attacker in his tracks; if it gets in his eyes it will temporarily blind him giving you plenty of time to leave the area.

The Corkscrew

The corkscrew with its pistol-grip like handle can be held so tightly it would be very difficult to shake out of your hand. One jab inflicted from the corkscrew could be so painful it could not only quickly deter an attacker, but in the process be very likely to cause him to leave his DNA on the scene. DNA can be extremely helpful to law enforcement in collecting evidence against the attacker. This is something criminals are very aware of today and try to avoid at any cost.

The Hunting Ground is an Explosive Documentary

To see the extent of which our young women are being assaulted and raped on campus and how colleges and universities are failing to report these heinous crimes, watch the shocking video trailer of this just released documentary. It reveals that many institutions of higher learning are actually trying to turn innocent victims into provocateurs, insinuating it is they who are to blame, it’s criminal!

Click here to view The Hunting Ground trailer

Additional Information on some of the Perks

  • "The Hunting Ground" + 4 Belts Perk: More information, trailers, and show times about The Hunting Ground documentary can be found on IMDb here.
  • "Help Wanted" + 3 Belts: More about the eBook by Kat Folland can be found on Amazon at this link, and more about WEAVE, Inc, can be found on their website weaveinc.org.

story:
Short Summary

Having spend enough time scouring the web for useable hdri images I took the plunge and invested in all the gear needed to create them myself. I've been doing this quite a bit now, and already have a small library that i use all the time. But I want to share it! And it should be bigger and better! So I decided to create a 100 image library of high quality material and put that up for sale. The problem I've run into though, is that I also need to work and care for my family, so it keeps ending up on the back burner. Not acceptable for something i have a weird passion for!
 
I'm a vfx artist(www.spyfactory.tv), having worked in the industry for 14 years now, doing feature films, commercials, music videos and tv series, so I know what i'm doing, and i know what it would take to make the material useable.
 
Moreover, I have created the website www.renderschool.com which i'm working on filling up with high quality production level tutorials. There is already a free for all vray for maya 2hour tutorial in there.

What We Need & What You Get

So, whats in it for me and you:

  • First of all i need to recover some of the thousands of dollars i've invested in this project, buying gear and testing out. 
  • Second, I need to be able to take the time away from work to create all this material in a professional manner so it's all ready for you to use.
  • You will get access to a HUGE library of HDRI images
  • You will get assets you can use for whatever you want
  • Depending on the funding, HUGE might not even be the word to define it

The Perks

The question is, what can I do for you to make this worth while. So, there are perks for you:

  1. The 100 image library! this is what i'll be setting out to create! (200$ value)
  2. Instant access to the first 20 high res hdri images.
  3. The video tutorial on how to take and create hdri images yourself(40$ value)
  4. Google Drive access to the collection as it is being made
  5. And even better, access to my google drive that will be updated with more and more hdri images, even as the 100 image mark is met. This is continual access to a library that will keep growing and growing over the years! (unvaluable!)
  6. A collection of stickers, both "I supported this" type stickers, and tracking markers you can use when you are supervising shoots (50$ value)

What if the project is overfunded?

Thats where the fun starts.

A bigger library! More travels around the world to create even more interesting images

If we hit the 30k mark, I will rent a studio and create a complete set of hdri images for studio/product lighting with professional photographers and lighters to get you loads and loads of great assets for your packshot and product renders.

 

What if the project is underfunded?

 

 The library will be made... I really want to make it... it'll just take a bit longer.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you're not up for throwing some cash at this right now, you might want to help me get this project launched anyway, and maybe purchase the material afterwards? If so, please do share this campaign!

story:
We are es + es, a luxury children's brand for kids sizes 4-12. We strive to use sustainable textiles and produce everything in the USA.

Our Fall 2013 Collection



ABOUT US:
es + es has been in the idustry for almost four years now, and we have loved being a part of your lives!

We have never received any sort of business funding, loans or credit lines. This brand has been 100% self funded for the past three years. Now, we need your help!

es + es works with the Ronald Mcdonald house charity, which provides assistance to sick children and their families all over the world.

es + es prides itself on being produced in the United States, we think it's important to help out our economy in any way we can.

Faith Wladya in our Once Upon A Time Dress at the Cannes premiere of 'Blue Valentine'
Once Upon A Time

GO GREEN! Sustainable textiles are used in every one of our collections. We believe that we need to reduce our global footprint as much as possible.

We have worked with Gilt Groupe, have been feautured in Lucky kids magazine, and our items have been worn to the Cannes Film Festival!

We are currently looking to expand our market, and create collections that will blow everyone away.

We are putting together a collection of 20 styles for Spring 2014 and we need help manufacturing the collectio

We're trying to raise $24,000 to help us manufacture our Spring 2014 Collection. Your funds will be used for the following:

Fabric, trims & for production: All fabrics, notions and supplies needed for the actual garments are accounted for in this category.

Production Cost (labor)-All of our factories are in the United States, and we work with smaller manufacturers that can ensure a higher quality product.

Indiegogo cut 9% of funds raised.

 

Here is the breakdown for the Spring 2014 Collection:

 

CAROLINE= $784.20

CASEY GREY= $995.40

CASEY IVORY= $995.40

EMMA WHITE= $687.30

EMMA STRIPE= $687.30

GRACIE=$962.40

ALYSSA= $1158.90

JILLIAN=$939.60

HARPER (MINT AND PEACH)= $2350.80

LONDON= $1196.40

MELANIE IVORY=$1139.70

MELANIE GREY=$1124.70

PEYTON=$1032.90

AVERY STRIPE=$829.80

AVERY WHITE=$844.80

HAZEL=$1481.40

KALEY GREY=$1970.70

KALEY MINT= $1970.70

LAYLA=$969.17

 

APPAREL PRODUCTION: $21,434.27

 

INDIEGOGO FEE: $1929

 

TOTAL: $23,363.27

 

The Spring Collection:

 

Should our project be successfully funded, there will still always be little bumps in the road:

The wrong thread is used, buttons get lost, machines break down!

We feel strongly that we have been in the industry long enough to avoid these issues as best as humanly possible.

For the past four years, we have faced unimaginable difficulties. Yet, here we are, still trying to make our business even more successful. We will not give up when things get rough, we're encouraged to do even better.

 

The Perks:

 

The cluster tank- Sizes XS S M L XL 100% ORGANIC COTTON

 

 

Eve Tee- sizes XS S M L XL 100% ORGANIC COTTON

 

 

Gayle Dress in Charcoal-Sizes  4 5 6 8 10 12- 100% ORGANIC COTTON

 

 

 

Once upon a time dress Sizes 4 5 6 8 10 12

 

 

 

The Harper Dress

Here is where you can find us:

 

Facebook: www.facebook.com/esandeskids

Website: www.esandeskids.com

Twitter: twitter.com/esandeskids

Pinterest: www.pinterest.com/esandeskids

 

Thank you so much for taking the time to check out es + es!

story:
Hi Everybody!  Thanks for stopping by. 

Our Indiegogo campaign has ended.  While we may not have reached our targeted goal, we have received lots of interest from individual investors and excited collaborators.  

Long story short, we are now baking up our secret recipe and look forward to sharing its deliciousness with the world in the next 3-6 months!!

Untill then, thanks to all of our wonderful supporters for the feedback and momentum you've given us.  There is a huge revolution at bay and we could not have gotten to where we are without all your generous contributions and encouragement!

Woof!

Team Ridogulous 

Stay tuned to all that is going on by Liking us on Facebook (http://facebook.com/ridogulouslabs), 

Following our blog (http://thatsridogulous.com), and

Keeping your eyes peeled as we prepare to open our web store for product pre-orders (http://ridogulouslabs.com).  

 

 

Some recent press:

     

 

 

 

 

Select Product Pics: 

 

 

 

 

 

  

     

  

 

 

 

Special Thanks:

Marian (www.3dlance.com) for the amazing design work

Niko Belic (www.snowballcreativestudios.com) for the creative animated video

 

 

Yay, you made it to the bottom! As a bonus, here are some cute puppies!:

story:
The Bio

Camille Taylor, the person who is called the quirkiest of them all was originally born in Detroit, Michigan and currently relocated to Atlanta, GA. At the tender age of 20, she moved to Atlanta without friends or family in pursuit of her dreams. It was the burning desire to embrace her often misunderstood creative character. Designing furniture was a curiosity which she developed as a little girl, telling her mom how she should put her bed in the wall. Her mother of course didn’t understand what she was trying to explain. As she became older, she began to see some of the greater things in life, and how she could contribute to the creative side of the world. Being a risk-taking rebel, she took it upon herself and developed Renee Taylor Designs. She sold her first sofa design in 2009, which her partner Michael and herself built in a small shop in East Point, GA. After building her 1st sofa, she knew anything was possible and her ideas could reach new levels. Currently she is working on the very first Men’s Furniture Line. The development of the site is in working progress and will launch this summer. The ideas she currently holds on that black and white clipboard is soon to turn furniture into fun and functionality. In her spare time, Camille draws new furniture pieces, cooks, pursues ice cream cravings, and owns a media company consisting of Film and Graphic Design.

What's Happening Now!

Looking at the sofa above, all pieces will have character and inspired by some of the greatest objects. The seat is a suede and leather to the touch. The letters are patent leather red. The pillows are permanently attached. The back of the sofa is completely finished with the matching seat fabric. This sofa can sit against the wall or in the middle of a room.

Renee Taylor Designs is a furniture line made for unique homes. Their will be special collections built for industries such as lodging, television shows, and restaurants, and nightclubs. All furniture designed will be modern and contemporary with a bold finish!

Renee Taylor Designs will also have a special collection for the "manly man!." This collection is for the single busy bachelor who loves to impress the ladies.  This will consists of bold and earthy woods, alongside recylcled aluminum, and itialian leatthers. I'm excited about this line becuase sometimes the black leather couch just isnt enough!

How you can help? 

This has been a dream for a long time, we finally have the resources needed, and the crew to make it happen. We are anxiously waiting on the go button. People who are kind enough to support the biggest dream in life, to take the feeling of emptiness away knowing goals have not been accomplished. This will change the normal way of how people think of furniture, and by using recycled materials in each piece, this also helps the environment.  

What We Need & What You Get

The goal of this campaign is to get a good head start on material costs, website, and manufacturing of furnishings such as headboards, chairs, sofa, and tables.

The start funding of the launch is 50,000. By budgeting profusely this gives us a good head start on producing each and every piece. We will be taking pre-orders for each unique piece. A cap on each piece will be placed so the likelyhood of someone else having it will be unlikely. 

Different perks for contributors vary and can be your very own unique piece designed by Renee Taylor Designs. This perk is dependent on your donation to the start of our project. This excites us because at least we know our supporters will have something uniquely made for them that can be cherished. 

If we do not reach our goal, which I know we will. The money will still be used towards the furniture line. (Materials, Website, Logo, Manufacturing) 

$20,000- Material

$10,000- Additional Tools & Equipment

$15,000- Branding and Marketing

$5,000- Website and Photoshoots

The Impact

Everyone has their very own unique taste. This is not to say that everyone loves contemporary quirky furniture. For those who can appreciate the creation of this business can forever see its uniqueness. 

We have already successful sold and designed our very 1st sofa. The track record and dedication is proven. Our team has been trained and are ready to go!!

All we need is a little PUSH! 

 

 

 

Help us OUT!

 

If you can't help, Spread the word to others you believe could help in anyway. 

 

Thank you so much! ^_^

story:
4 Cards + Cash = Scalzo Wallet

Story

I'm a italian boy with a passion for the American wallet.I started the production because time ago I ordered a wallet, but it never arrived, so I decided to make one on my own. After a lot of tests, I found the right model.


Production

The wallet is made of excellent quality italian leather,great scent, with a special treatment to avoid damages due contact with water.

This treatment is very expensive, I'll be able to do it only raising at least 3500€, rising less, the color of leather will be different.

Amazing Photo by:

http://www.annalisacavallari.com/annalisacavallari/Home_1.html
story_txt:
4 Cards + Cash = Scalzo Wallet
StoryI'm a italian boy with a passion for the American wallet.I started the production because time ago I ordered a wallet, but it never arrived, so I decided to make one on my own. After a lot of tests, I found the right model.


Production
The wallet is made of excellent quality italian leather,great scent, with a special treatment to avoid damages due contact with water.
This treatment is very expensive, I'll be able to do it only raising at least 3500€, rising less, the color of leather will be different.
Amazing Photo by:
http://www.annalisacavallari.com/annalisacavallari/Home_1.html

story:
I have studied many spinning tops designs and I decided to go way back to basics to a design dating to year 3000 B.C. Our design is inspired from terra cotta ceramic spinners that were found at Troy.

I have chosen this design due to its spinning abilities and it's mesmerizing beauty. I believe it is the perfect balance between performance and beauty. Similar designs have been portrayed on popular culture, such as the blockbuster movie "Inception".

Designed and 3d prototyped in the Connex 500. The Connex 500 is a half a million dollar 3d printer made for precision Prototyping, with an accuracy of 16 microns (5 times smaller than a human hair) we have been able to come up with a spinning top that is a perfect balance of weight and symmetry. 

Our Tops are CNC Machined from 1 solid piece of high-grade metal rod for precision and quality.




Precision, durability and luxury is what will set forever spin apart from other spinning tops.

Every spinning top, is manually checked with the latest technology to ensure that only perfectly balanced spinning tops will get a serial number, and be allowed to carry the Foreverspin seal. 

We have some amazing rewards that you get for backing this project. I hope they last you a lifetime.

story:
Background / Summary

By Invite Only™ is an independant jewellery label based in Singapore established in 2009. This label is run by me, Trixie Khong, a self-taught jewel-smith trained in Public Relations (Ba.) and Chemical Engineering (Diploma). 

Since its inception, I have managed to build the company through word of mouth and survived with $500 capital from pocket money my mother had given me when I was still in University. I worked part-time and saved all I had to accumulate tools and materials to start creating my jewellery pieces. 

Today, we are ready to expand and become a full-fledge exporting brand. We are a true blue company that worked from the ground up without any grants or rich-relatives to help us out. We are the true blue hard-workers and we hope that we would make your proud.

Check out our website to see our press features and products on sale: www.byinviteonly.info

What The Money Will Be Used For

We will need $9000 USD for:

- 3 months Rent and moving costs ($3500)
- Hiring Interns and Crafts-women ($2500)
- Purchasing supplies and better grade crystals and quality findings ($2000)
- Keeping our cat ($100 per month, we adopted a cat from the shelter)

This money would help us get the engines running. We know it is not a large sum of money to afford us attending trade shows or even hiring a publicist but we ARE hard-workers and aim to save the money through good sales and rapport with our customers. With your help, it can be done!

If we cannot raise the full amount we need, we will contrbute the bulk of the funds to our rent and also keeping our cat alive.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are like us, a struggling artist, craftsmen (or women) or just a hard-worker like us trying to put bread on the table, we thank you for pressing on in life and living a great example. We understand if you would prefer not to contribute monetarily. 

Nonetheless, we hope that you would help us spread the word through word of mouth, facebook, twitter, instagram or any platform you can think of! 

Thank you for viewing our page, from the bottom of our hearts.

story:
A little about us...

Starting off as casual meetings in local coffee shops discussing our love of fine watches, it soon dawned on both of us exactly how our passion for design could be directed into creating our very own collection. Our ultimate goal would be to create a unique group of watches that could span every style and innovation over the last 13 decades of wristwatch design. And so W. T. Author was created, a brand that spawned from the art of story-telling combined with limited edition, unique design. Our Indiegogo campaign introduces the first wristwatch, 'No. 1905' by W. T. Author. The project runs from September 13, 2013 - October 14, 2013 (11:59pm PT) to secure a deposit of £15,000 to assist in the manufacture of each individual component, and the exclusive items that come with each watch.

This includes:

• The manufacture of the watch case

• The production of the Swiss-made movement

• The sourcing of the finest cow-hide for our leather straps

• The manufacture of the watch straps

• The printing costs for our limited edition book

• The creation of our limited editon hand drawn screen prints

• The manufacture of our custom-made packaging

We hope that with your help today this could be the start of an exciting 13 years to come. Below you will find the full product description as well as each individual perk outlined down the right hand side of the page.

Thank you for your continued interest and support. We will be keeping you all updated with the exciting developments as we progress to the product's launch.

 

 

~ W. T. Author

 

'No. 1905' Wristwatches by W. T. Author

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Share Our Story

"Hello Backers, thank you for visiting our Indiegogo page! Please follow our journey and share it with the world. For more information and exclusive downloads visit http://www.wtauthor.com, or use the buttons the bottom of the page to access our social media channels."

- W. T. Author

 


Original Blueprint by master watchmaker W. T. Author

 

 

 

 

Product Overview

 

 

The first series of limited edition watches by W. T. Author.

 

Every component has been designed and hand-finished exclusively by W. T. Author in Britain, and fitted with a Swiss made movement.

The 'No. 1905' first edition watch draws inspiration from the turn of the 20th Century: a time when the first wristwatches for men were introduced by Louis Cartier and Edmond Jaegar. Taking inspiration from traditional aesthetics of the pocket watch, it reflects pioneering achievements of the era with signature shoulders brazed directly into the bespoke case allowing a hand-finished leather strap to be fitted. The case measures 46 mm across and 52 mm high including the shoulders. The case depth is 11 mm The dial utilises numbers taken directly from 1900's pocket watches and is enhanced with Author's unique hour markers. Traditionally formed custom-made hands complete the dial.

The watch has been modernised with a beautiful enamel screw down case back, the signature red aluminium crown embossed with the Author trademark and a Swiss made 513S calibre movement.

Every watch comes with an A5 book detailing the story of master watchmaker W. T. Author individually signed by the team and a limited editon A5 silk screen print available in 5 colours, again individually numbered and signed. The set is beautifully presented in a custom-designed package.

 

 

 

 

 

 

Individually Signed A5 Book 'No. 1905': The Story of W. T. Author

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Hand-Made Limited Edition Silk Screen Prints (Numbered and Signed, cut to A5 format)

 

 

 

 

 

 

All beautifully presented in a custom-made package

 

 

'No. 1905 Specification'

 

• Available in 4 exclusive colours, limited to 125 first edition watches

 

 

'No. 1905' Black Dial with Black Strap
 

 

 


 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

'No. 1905' Blue Dial with Brown Strap
 

 

 

 

 

 

 


'No. 1905' Cream Dial with Tan Strap

 

 

 

'No. 1905' White Dial with Brown Strap

 

 

 

• Swiss made movement

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Swiss Made 513S Calibre Movement

 

• Custom-made signature stainless steel 46 mm case

 

 

 

Custom-Made Case Exclusive to W. T. Author

 

 

 

• Signature red crown with embossed trademark    

 

'No. 1905' Side Profile

 

 

 

 

 

 

• Unique enamel screw down case back 
(Numbered 1 to 125 of 125)

 

 

 

 

Custom Made Screw Down Enamel Case Back

 

 

 

• Hand-made leather strap fitted with a stainless steel buckle

 

 

 

Each watch strap has been hand-made with natural leather, designed to soften and mould to your wrist almost immediately. Making each strap as individual as the person wearing it, with its own unique story to tell.

 

 

 

 

 

Cow Hide Sourced from South American Tanneries

 

• Sapphire coated mineral lens

 

 


• 2-year limited warranty

 



The Manufacturing Plan

 

 

We have successfully secured and worked with eight collaborators from around the world to ensure we guarantee the product will be delivered to you on time and of the highest quality. The types of partners are outlined below (the kind of manufacturer, what they do, how they do it, and the order each component has been or is being made).

 

 

 

1. Watch Case Manufacturer

 

 

Specialising in the production of stainless steel watch cases, our watch case manufacturer provides services with exacting standards assisting with the technical development, quality production and full product testing. They are a dedicated partner and an important asset to our long-term business strategy. The final production samples have been signed off and ready to be manufactured if we reach our Indiegogo goal.

 

 

 

 

 

2. Movement Manufacturer

 

 

Our Swiss partner manufactures and sells Swiss made quartz wristwatch movements guaranteeing precision, reliability and high quality. The movement has now been selected for 'No. 1905' and will be fitted by skilled craftsmen into the watch case.

 

 

 

 

 

3. Leather Workshop

 

 

Supplying vast quantities of leather from South America, our manufacturer has assisted us in selecting the highest quality vegetable-tan cow hides. The leather has been selected to ensure maximum strength and yet has been designed to soften and mould to your wrist almost immediately. The leather has been bought and is now in the hands of the strap manufacturer, ready to be cut. 

 

 

 

 

 

4. Strap Manufacturer

 

 

Based in the Lincolnshire countryside and using traditional methods of manufacture, skilled craftsmen will create our watch strap by hand. They will be cutting, splitting and embossing the leather to produce an item that reflects the quality of the watch case.

 

 

 

 

 

5. Book Printers

 

 

With over 19 years experience in the industry, our partners' expansive knowledge of the various types of printing means we understand all stages of production, from design and print to delivery. The book will serve as a vital component to compliment the story of W. T. Author, and will be signed by the team. 

 

 

 

 

 

6. Silk Screen Printers

 

 

Our partner specialises in handpulled waterbased screen printing and brings a wealth of printing experience. They have offered us a friendly, personal service yet still deliver quick turnaround and quality products. Each limited edition print (available in 5 different colours) is designed by W. T. Author and will be individually numbered and signed.   

 

 

 

 

 

7. Packaging Manufacturer

 

 

Our packaging manufacturer constantly aims to deliver quality cardboard packaging. They combine family business values with up to date production facilities. Their production teams have provided us with sound advice and access to an exceptional range of products and services. We wanted to get it right first time and by working closely with them, we have created a bespoke piece of packaging that reflects the quality of each individual product outlined above. We have just approved blank samples and are ready to approve the artwork ready for production. 

 

 

 

 

 

8. Musical Collaborator 

 

 

'Talk Less, Say More' has been instrumental in bringing all the design elements together in the form of a song that encompasses the very essence of our project. The track 'Seconds' is described by the artist below: 

 

 

 

"The idea is that it starts with an ambient drone, which gradually shifts into a single note striking at 60 bpm, like a second hand. Like a watchmaker, or indeed an author, it starts of with an environment, and in that environment he must create time (whether its measurement of, events, or feelings within time). The second hand strikes regularly on the E note throughout the track, keeping time. You'll notice the glockenspiel, also striking to the same beat, is getting pulled around and glitched like it's distorting time."- Talk Less, Say More

story:
Founded in October of 2012, WayBack Campus, L.L.C’s operating website www.wbcthrift.com  (WBC Thrift) is a membership thrift shopping website that allows the consumer to purchase any one of the levels available for an ultimate and unique shopping experience.  The levels of membership and details are as follows:

              Membership Level

 

        # of Items       #of Specialty Items

Costs of Membership

 

Enjoy Thrift

 

4

1

20.00

Adore Thrift

 

5

1

30.00

Live for Thrift

 

6

2

40.00

 

Items will not be for sale on the site, rather they will be free to the consumer.  Items will display as free in shopping carts, once memberships are paid, and the customer would only be responsible for shipping.   

Partnering non-profits will receive funding from this opportunity to futher fulfill their mission.  Revenue will be generated through the membership of the customers.

What We Need & What You Get

The $7,000.00 that we are asking for will be spent towards camera and camera gear, advertising, promotional items, clothing racks, and steam machines.  

The Nikon D7000 is a camera that we have found while doing research and it has received rave reviews from people who love photography and are business owners.  The graphics, video, and images are sharp and crisp. We feel this will be good investment since majority of the business depends on displays and offering the customer a true quality picture of available merchandise.  This camera comes with the 1 year warranty, body and lenses as well as carrier case, the full tripod (awesome) and a memory card and more. A reliable camera is needed so we can use and will not have to worry about function and low resolution.  Being an online retail business requires that the picture will look presentable and attractive to the customer. A high quality camera/camcorder will do that.  

Clothing racks, especially Z Racks are needed to store clothes.  Some clothes are delicate and need to be on a rack.  We need approximately 10 sturdy racks.  As clothes are ordered we will replace the clothes on the racks.  

Clothing Steam Machines are needed to rid wrinkles for garments. It is great for those delicate pieces.    

This cost is to stay current and publicize as well as promote the business as much as possible.  Advertising with Mail through USPS, radio broadcasting, newspaper articles, local magazine entries, and flyers are but a few ways we will market the business. We will also utilize social media (facebook ads) and google ads.

Items such as car magnets, calendars, pens, t-shirts, coupons, and gift cards and etc. are needed to further promote the business’s awareness. This is a way to also boost traffic to the site and create customer loyalty.  We will need tangible items to begin to promote my business.  As with advertising, promotions are extremely important as well. 

THIS IS WHERE ALL OUR CONTRIBUTORS COME IN...THANK YOU, THANK YOU!

We can't thank you enough for even considering helping to fund us.  We are geniunely trying to help non-profits who do not have enough access to routes of funding.  Helping us is truly helping them. Getting our name out there is providing visibilty to the merchandise they contribute, thus expanding the opportunity to recruit memberships.    

For contributing $40.00 to us, we want you to have a piece of WBC Thrift. Our contributors will recieve an emblazoned Live For Thrift Tee from our WBC Thrift Line!

If we do not reach the $7000 goal, we are still eternally grateful.  Any amount given is more than what we had.  The funds will still go towards purchasing items needed for the company.  Some items before others due its critical need. 

The Impact

We are a small organization in a backwoods rural area with one stoplight in our 'city', attempting to make a difference!  We have big dreams that involves helping others and there is nothing wrong with that.  We are NOT charging non-profits for participating in this opportunity.  This means that they will receieve all profit from this venture.  Nonprofits that contribute items will receive a particular % of the monthly generated revenue for one year.  We are passionate about helping these organizations.  With many of them, local and in rural areas, they have very limited resources.  We will be making a huge difference for them and you are at the CENTER!

 

We don't expect every hand to have a monatary donation, but just a hand. And for that in advance, we say thank you!  A hand up is just as good.  Please share this campaign if you can.  Word of mouth can move mountains.

If we do not reach the $7000 goal, we are still eternally grateful.  Any amount given is more than what we had.  The funds will still go towards purchasing items needed for the company.  Some items before others due its critical need. 


The Impact
We are a small organization in a backwoods rural area with one stoplight in our 'city', attempting to make a difference!  We have big dreams that involves helping others and there is nothing wrong with that.  We are NOT charging non-profits for participating in this opportunity.  This means that they will receieve all profit from this venture.  Nonprofits that contribute items will receive a particular % of the monthly generated revenue for one year.  We are passionate about helping these organizations.  With many of them, local and in rural areas, they have very limited resources.  We will be making a huge difference for them and you are at the CENTER!
 


We don't expect every hand to have a monatary donation, but just a hand. And for that in advance, we say thank you!  A hand up is just as good.  Please share this campaign if you can.  Word of mouth can move mountains.

story:
The Outer Senshi!

Fashion/Beauty Portraits inspired by the classic anime, Sailor Moon! I've already done the Inner Senshi, now onto the fan-favorites. The Outer Senshi! 

  • My name is Eric, I'm a Commercial Fashion Photographer in NYC, I've been featured in Vogue Italia, shot with Major Model Managment, and Ford Models!
  • I am one of the creators of Sailor Moon the Movie: The Independent Short, which reached over 1Million views on youtube!
  • Anyone who contributes will be apart of taking Sailor Moon to a new refreshing and creative stand-point, especially with the upcoming re-make of the Anime in late 2013!

What We Need & What You Get

  • I funded the Inners out of pocket and it wasn't easy - 2 months of hard work and planning! I need 600 dollars for studio space, a make-up artist, props (after all the Outers have amazingly epic weapons!)
  • The Perks: Anything from, tumblr/instagram/facebook shoutouts, prints, high resolution files, original props from the shoot and an e-vite to the photo shoot with the cast and crew!
  • In more detail, the funds will go to Studio Space, Lighting, Food/Transporation for the models/crew, Props!!!, Make-Up/Make-Up Artist, Wigs (I wish we were born with Teal hair, but we are not,) Colored Contacts.

Above the Goal!!

  • If I get above the goal I've asked for I will do some special characters... I don't know, anyone love SAILOR COSMOS? THE STARLIGHTS? GALAXIA? :D

The Impact

  • Sailor Moon has always been there for me, for my friends, for a lot of people around the world. It's what has made me the creative person I am today - every year I have found a way to create, design and conquer a new way to keep Sailor Moon alive, refreshing, hot, sexy, beautiful and overall fun for the fans! 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can’t contribute and I get it, you're buying so much Sailor Moon Merchandise, but that doesn’t mean you can’t help:

  • Ask fellow Moonies to get the word out and make some noise about my campaign!

story:
RaS Story

Thanks for checking out this project. My name is Daniel, the sole developer on RaS. I started this project as something small for basically myself to save huge amount of time renaming large amounts of shows and movies. I continued to add features to help me save more time by supporting more file types. Then saw it could be valuable to the outside world. I have released the current version of the application and put up a website for it. Anyone can go download and check it out! I hope to see this as a stable and popular product in the near future :)


What We Need & What You Get

Getting to $1000 should be enough to finish off a 1.0 stable version of the application, with installers for Mac, Windows and possibly Linux. Get a professional logo and do a little web marketing (Google Adword).


Helping this project, I will be able to continue put in great updates and eat at the same time! :)

Extra cash and I’ll be able to get in more outside help (website graphics), pay for services, pay for domains/servers or buy handy libraries (E.g. Windows 7 taskbar support). Every dollar helps! 


Even if this campaign isn’t successful, I will continue to work on the project, just not as much as I like.


Your rewards are seeing this already great application become the best. I hope to see this this expand to Android and iPhone, then every main OS will have access.


Other Ways You Can Help

If you like to help in other ways, there are a number of areas you can help!

If you have video editing skills, I would like to create a nice video explaining the ins and outs of RaS.

If you have graphics skills, new icons, and website graphics are needed.

If you have programming skills, there are a number of helpful metadata libraries one can build. For example I need a Java library that can read metadata from video files.


Thanks for your support!

-Daniel


Check out the website here: http://www.renameandsort.com

Download link here: RaS

story:
StrapMount - A simple GoPro mounting solution

Strapmount is a simple mounting solution for the GoPro camera. Strapmount is secured using a standard ziptie and is easily removed and reused. The ziptie can simply be threaded through the mount, allowing you to mount your camera almost anywhere it is possible to mount a ziptie. It is very simply and takes only few seconds. 

The GoPro camera simply slides into the mount, making it easy and fast to attach and remove the camera from the mount. We found that having to screw the camera on and off was to long a process. With the Strapmount you can simply just slide in the camera, and you are ready to go. 

The Strapmount is equipped with a soft rubber base, allowing the Strapmount to grip on slippery and curved surfaces. The Strapmount can be mounted on anything from a tree to a skateboard, the possibilities are endless.


Production

1. Injection moulded body in high quality plastic

2. A laser cut soft rubber base improving the contact area providing the mount with a stronger and more secure grip. 

3. Two reusable zipties will come standard in any Strapmount package. Reusable zipties can easily be unzipped using a lever. 

Zipties of any size can be purchased in any hardware store or warehouse. They are cheap, strong and comes in any length needed. 


Risks and challenges

Our team consists of experienced designers and experts of making a product like this come to life. 

Quality of the product and shipment is our main challenges. We have been working hard on finding a high quality manufacture with the skills of making the strapmount as high quality as possible.

We have contact with an experienced manufacture located nearby our studio. After running a few tests on prototypes, we can assure you an end product of high quality.

All projects carry some risks of schedule slips. We have planned everything down to the last detail, and with a successful funding, we will be ready to get you Strapmount shipped, as soon as possible. 


    Please help us back this campaign, and share with your friends


    Free worldwide shipping on all perks!

story:
The Vision

Envision 100 million people uniting around the world to celebrate the birth of a new era for humanity with great love and fanfare – an historic day of global unity.

We’ll link across the world in moments of song, prayer, meditation, dance, and cultural expression over a 24-hour cycle. We’ll share laughter, perform acts of generosity and commit to global cooperation.

It will be a potent collective rite of passage marking humanity's entry into a new era in which we are consciously evolving together. Our goal is to reach a critical mass of people - 1% of the world - committing to a positive future together.

That is what a movement of tens of thousands is activating for Dec. 22, 2012 – an unprecedented Birth Day celebration of our creativity and common purpose to co-create a better human civilization. This will lay the tracks for many years of focused efforts on positive societal change.  

Renowned evolutionary leader and bestselling author Barbara Marx Hubbard is acting as our visionary voice, traveling the world to engage people in the movement. She has partnered with Stephen Dinan, founder of The Shift Network, with 200,000 members worldwide, on activating this vision.

Respected members of the Welcoming Committee have joined with them in mobilizing this movement and will appear at different global events.  Here are these 12 esteemed evolutionary leaders who have collectively sold more than 100 million books and touched countless lives:



The purpose of this Indiegogo campaign is to raise the funds necessary to launch the web TV platform, and provide the technology for a 24-hour global webcast linking events from around the world on Dec. 22 and then to turn it into a Birth 2012 Highlights Show and DVD. It engages you as an active co-creator in this historic day and allows you to participate in special ways.

An Historic Webcast

Imagine on December 22 that you can watch live celebrations from stadiums, churches, community centers, parks, and living rooms from around the world through a singular webcast that allows millions to feel and see ourselves as a single human family.

And imagine that in addition to the main webcast, we can watch video feeds from hundreds of locations – from Peru to China - allowing us to see and feel how interconnected we are. We're also envisioning ways for you to offer your Birth Day wishes and intentions for humanity.

Some Birth Day "hubs" will be small and intimate, while others will feature renowned speakers, artists, musicians, and cultural leaders.

Dozens of major cultural and music events are in various stages of production by partners and allies, including in Los Angeles, San Francisco, Philadelphia, Tucson, Byron Bay (Australia), Teotihuacan (Mexico), and Maui.

For example, in Mexico, Don Miguel Ruiz of The Four Agreements is developing a large ritual event at the culturally significant Teotihuacan pyramids.

The Birth 2012 webcast will move from time zone to time zone, focusing at the apex of each around noon local time, beginning in New Zealand and ending in Hawaii. We'll carry some of the most important  offerings from each. And then, for two minutes at noon local time, we will join globally in a moment of connection through song, prayer, meditation, sounds, music, or silence. 

These moments will help punctuate and unify the 24-hour global Birth Day ritual - like the positive equivalent of contractions.  Imagine as tens of millions join together in this sacred way the sense of connection that will emerge, as well as a wave of  love for the world.

The global events will be woven together not just with technology but through a Story of Our Birth, narrated by Barbara Marx Hubbard, speakers, and artists who take us through our billions of years of history to the critical moment we find ourselves in as a human species and then point us forward into a brighter future.

Some of the Amazing Events on That Day

Here are some examples of the exciting initiatives that will be woven together by our global broadcast:

The Good Earth Singers are launching a 99 day tour on Sept. 13th to rally choirs worldwide to sing an African song at the same time on Dec. 21st, which will help to kick off the 24 hour cycle. Their goal is 15 million participating in the simultaneous song.

One Billion Oms is aiming to have the largest number of simultaneous Oms ever when it is 12 noon in India - a wave of blessing to pass around the world.

Chris Deckker, the founder of EarthDance, which has 350 locations worldwide that celebrate a global dance at the same time, will be activating their networks for a global dance celebration at the end of the 24 hour cycle.

Ministers from dozens of Unity churches are planning their own whole track of Unity Birth 2012 activities, with their congregants celebrating worldwide.


Our Team

Charlie Gay - CEO of FaNetwork.tv, which will do our Facebook broadcast.

Rick Lukens - CEO of United Earth Networks, former International Director for Live Aid, U.S. - Soviet "space-bridges"

Mikki Willis - CEO of Elevate, producing our videos and Birth2012.tv, in partnership with Good Life Networks.

Barnet Bain - Storyteller, producer of What Dreams May Come

2300 grassroots "ACE" leaders, who have gone through a 12-week training to create their own "hubs" for this Birth Day.

Every day we learn of new events and activities - hopefully soon including yours!

Let's Reach Critical Mass

Our goal is to reach a critical mass of humanity (1%) who are committed to birthing a healthy, sustainable, peaceful and prosperous world. Our sense is that this group can act as a tipping point for the culture as a whole. 

We see the large-scale celebration on Dec. 22 as the start of massive collaborations in the years to come to work on co-creating this new era.

By supporting this Campaign, you become a supporter of this global event, helping to build the connections and infrastructure for the shared web platform, as well as Birth 2012 Highlights Special and DVD that will unite the best moments of this day.

You can review more about the full campaign at www.birth2012.com and activate your own local hub or sign up for the weekly Birth 2012 Catalyst ezine.

You Can Be a Co-Creator!

To make our vision a full reality, we’re opening up a unique possibility for you to support the birth of this vision AND to get access to some of the key leaders, along with special benefits.

We have an amazing team and events activating around the world. Now we invite you to help us activate the campaign on the next level, helping to build the technology platform for the webcast, and the resulting DVD with your direct support.

The more that you contribute, the better your perks and the more professional a production we can create with feeds from around the world!  With dozens of events already activating globally, we WILL apply your contributions to this work and the only difference is the scale on which it will happen.  The more we each spread the word, the more amazing the result.

Your name will always be “in lights” as a supporter of this important movement that is spreading light around the world.

This Indiegogo Campaign will run until July 29.  So make sure to invite your friends so we can make (and exceed!) our goal. All the money raised will support the global web and media infrastructure plus coordination to make this day historic.

Joining the Campaign in Deeper Ways

If you’d like to participate in deeper ways, visit www.Birth2012.com and subscribe to our weekly Catalyst ezine, start your own local event or Hub, or get the Birth 2012 and Beyond bestselling book (reached #4 at Amazon in May, #1 in Personal Transformation).  You’ll be able to find and collaborate with other people worldwide.

Create Your Own Event

We're inviting people to get creative with your own unique local events and hubs! Convene your friends and activate your own hub, sending the video feed to our shared web hub for the global events.

Going Forward Together

We don't see the Birth Day as the end, but rather the beginning of something long-term - a unified conscious change movement that amplifies what is working in the world.  Unlike past global events, we will focus on getting the grassroots tools and support in place for the connections, friendships, and alliances forged from this major planetary event to turn into long-term collaborations.  We're already hatching a vision for Emergence 2020 - giving us 8 years to grow our positive visions into full manifestation. It's time!

story:
Flypack Matte Black 

Your Perfect Travel Tool

Dimension - 18"x 12.5" x 4.5" (Expansion 5.5")

 

Crafted with our signature Matte Black Hyperlight

Include a Free Organizer - Retail Value -$30

 

Remember when was your last time you had to pack for your trip? And how was it? Did you look good?

As a professional bag maker, we ask ourselves this question every day. 

Since 2015, we started to make travel bags tailored for globetrotters, we studied their behaviors, invested heavily on tooling and prototyping, and we did all this to ensure every product we launch is perfect. 

As a successor of our previous model BRIEFPACK, this Flypack was designed for frequent travelers and adventurers. You have a busy lifestyle. You travel a lot, work hard, and enjoy your personal life. The bag can convert into three different styles based on your needs: A briefcase for your daily work which fits everything you need: a 13" to 17" laptop, any sized iPad, electronics, books, all your cables, and everything you need for your day of work. It can also convert into a backpack for when you are tired of holding a bag; you can convert it anytime, anywhere. When you travel, flypack can easily be attached to your luggage and convert into a carry-on, it meets all the size requirements for any flight in the world. The luggage style compartment can fit enough for a day or two of supplies,  did we mention you do not need your toiletry bags anymore? Well the traditional bulky toiletry bag takes up so much space in your luggage, the flypack has waterproof compartments to hold your washing supplies.  

With thousands of bags to choose from, why did you pick us?  Check out our bio below. 

Our secret weapon relies on our fabrics - exclusively designed for VENQUE

 

 

 

 

 

 

Delivery Date : March 20th, 2019

PRODUCT WARRANTY

At VENQUE we stand behind all of our products.  If you are not 100% satisfied with the quality, simply send it back and we will refund you.

CUSTOMS & DUTIES INFORMATION

We cover all the customs and duties; we will refund you the difference.

SHIPPING POLICY

You will receive a tracking link with your shipping details within the first 24 hours of your order being shipped. Due to the cost of international shipping, we will use the most cost effective shipping methods, which means it may take from 5-7 business days to arrive. 

Your order will be shipped from our facility in Toronto, Canada.

It will take 5 days within North America.

7 Days to Europe

7-9 Days to Asia 

9-10 Days to South America 

10 Days for anywhere else 

Risks and challenges

This is our Seventh campaign. With five successful campaigns under our belt, we fully understand the entire process and have learned from our experiences. In our first campaign we did not properly estimate the production time and ended up delaying the shipping date. We would like to thank our backers as they were all very patient.   
Today, we have partnered with the best factory and timely freight partner, we will fulfill our rewards on time.   
However, things happen, and we will ensure communication to keep our backers informed.

Well the traditional bulky toiletry bag takes up so much space in your luggage, the flypack has waterproof compartments to hold your washing supplies.  With thousands of bags to choose from, why did you pick us?  Check out our bio below. Our secret weapon relies on our fabrics - exclusively designed for VENQUE      Delivery Date : March 20th, 2019PRODUCT WARRANTYAt VENQUE we stand behind all of our products.  If you are not 100% satisfied with the quality, simply send it back and we will refund you.CUSTOMS & DUTIES INFORMATIONWe cover all the customs and duties; we will refund you the difference.SHIPPING POLICYYou will receive a tracking link with your shipping details within the first 24 hours of your order being shipped. Due to the cost of international shipping, we will use the most cost effective shipping methods, which means it may take from 5-7 business days to arrive. Your order will be shipped from our facility in Toronto, Canada.It will take 5 days within North America.7 Days to Europe7-9 Days to Asia 9-10 Days to South America 10 Days for anywhere else Risks and challengesThis is our Seventh campaign. With five successful campaigns under our belt, we fully understand the entire process and have learned from our experiences. In our first campaign we did not properly estimate the production time and ended up delaying the shipping date. We would like to thank our backers as they were all very patient.   Today, we have partnered with the best factory and timely freight partner, we will fulfill our rewards on time.   However, things happen, and we will ensure communication to keep our backers informed.

story:
This is Marco. Born in the heart of Porto, he as a past of drug addiction. Some years ago he was living on the streets. A helping hand from SAOM pulled him out. He integrated one of their training programmes to work in the restaurant and catering business. For two years he works as kitchen assistant in one of SAOM’s restaurant, Torreão.

We create sneakers that fund solutions to help socially vulnerable and homeless people getting their lives back on track. 

We’ll act locally, in our hometown, Porto. In cooperation with the portuguese NGO SAOM, that has, since a long time, several programmes to help socially vulnerable people. Their purpose is to help these people to improve their self-esteem, working and housing conditions, and achieve new goals of social inclusion.

1% of our sales will contribute to support these programmes and help these People to rebuild their lives through education, learning new skills and getting a professional diploma that later will guide them to a stable job.

Because we have no doubt that everybody can choose to have a second a chance…

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Pedro Maçana:  www.linkedin.com/in/pedromacanalkdin/
Daniel Gonçalves:  www.linkedin.com/in/danielgoncalvesdg/

 

 

 

 

     

         

 

 

RISKS & CHALLENGES

 

We have the chance to be in Portugal! The Porto region is famous worlwide for its great tradition in shoemaking. We've built a knit and simple supply chain. All the shoe components are sourced and production takes place within a 70kms radius in Porto. Being close to our producers and suppliers is a big advantage because we can visit them oftenly and build lasting relationships and work hand-in-hand to ensure the best quality to our sneakers.

The most common risk in manufacturing shoes is production delays. The manufacturing process relies on multiple components coming together at the same time.

However, we have carefully thought through our production scalability at different volumes with detailed scenario planning and generous time leads built into our timeline to avoid delays for any of our backers. 

We have a fantastic team of very experienced suppliers in place, we’re working with a highly experienced factory and we have an exceptional fullfilment partner on board. 

Together we will work around the clock to deliver on time for you. 

We will also keep you updated with regular updates throughout the campaign - all the way until your pair of WAYZ arrives at your door.

Our doors are always open and, if you have any questions, please just get in touch.

story:
SHORT SUMMARY

Picture someone wearing a lot of skull designs – on their jacket, shirt, pants, all over. You’d know immediately what image they were trying to project. Now, do you picture that same person fitting into a professional environment?

High-paying workplaces often spell sartorial compromise. But there’s still a personality beneath every go-getter and team player. What if you could wear just one skull, in a strategic place where it looks smooth and subtly stunning? Could they pull it off in a professional ensemble?

French Yuppie recognizes the need in each person, yuppie or otherwise, to give a nod to their rebel soul, no matter what social context is holding them down. That’s why our new line is sure to get a look of admiration when noticed topping off your workday ensemble. It’s called “Cranium.”

3D-printed to our precise standards, our rings are cast in .925 Sterling Silver. We feature six varieties – five featuring the skull, and one fleur-de-lis whose contours hint at the cranial. Pick your favorite, or splurge on the entire collection if you’re all about skulls.

These rings retail at $220. But contributors to this campaign will get discounts the public will never see again – nearly 30% off.

The savings compound the more you contribute. And, for the distinguished buyer who can’t bear to split up this collection, we have an extra special offer. Receive 3 rings and one of our high-craft leather-and-sterling-silver bracelets for free – up to a $50 value.

Want to make it your own? Get it engraved on the inside, up to 13 characters. Looking for a bit of a different shade? We can cast these designs in gold or titanium. For an extra price, you can claim these custom features for a truly one-of-a-kind ring.

THE COLLECTION

 

EXTRA PERKS

 

WHY WE NEED YOUR SUPPORT

As you can see, French Yuppie already has a system in place to produce sleek and tasteful sterling silver rings. However, that system can be better and faster.

French Yuppie is reinvesting its profits toward in-house production equipment. This means we can test out more new lines faster, offer you an expanded array of inventory, and offer them to you at a lower price.

These special discounts are my way of giving back to a community that believes in our vision. We can’t wait to build a network with people who shop crowdfunding sites for new fashions – some of the smartest and most savvy around. You can join this network with any small contribution. Our aim is to link you up with the styles you love.

SPREAD THE WORD

Skulls in the workplace? There’s a lot of meat there for a lively debate on social media. Use a link to our campaign on social media to illustrate that debate – especially if you picture yourself in something like French Yuppie. We appreciate the buzz that can only come from the world’s most stylish shoppers like you.

frenchyuppie.com

/FrenchYuppie

/frenchyuppie

FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

Q: How much does shipping cost?

All shipping is free but please note that international orders may be subject to customs charges.

 

Q: When do I decide on my ring size?

We will be in touch with you to get the details of your order, including ring size and ring choice. All of these details will be collected towards the end of our campaign.

 

Q: When will I receive my ring(s)?

We will do our best to start shipments in October 2016. This may vary depending on your ring choice and customization. (Delivery time of rewards / perks are subject to best efforts and are not guaranteed.)

 

Q: How to find out my ring size?

You can find your ring size online. Try this link FindMyRingSize.com to measure your ring size instantly or you can download and print this guide

 

Q: I'm interested in becoming a stockist. How can I reach you?

Drop us an email at hello@frenchyuppie.com and we will be in touch with you.

RISK & CHALLENGES

We personally conceptualize and design all our accessories, so we have control on most of the process and consolidated access to the suppliers. If this project gets funded we assure that everything will go according to plans and that each rings will be delivered in their highest possible quality.

story:
HI, WE'RE VENIM. WE MAKE CUSTOM DENIM JACKETS.

We're here to change the denim game, for the better. With over two decades of combined experience in the apparel and Fash-Tech industries, we thought it was about time that the iconic denim jacket caught up to speed with today's discerning shoppers.

WE THINK YOU'RE PRETTY SPECIAL.

And we want you to wear it on your sleeve (literally). We believe that anything as essential as a denim jacket should meet your personal standards of quality, polish, and distinction, so we're offering you a way to collaborate on the design of your own VENIM jacket because we know that you've got something in mind.

DESIGNED IN SAN FRANCISCO, MADE IN LOS ANGELES.

It doesn’t get much more Californian than that, and with the best denim production standards in the nation, we wouldn’t have it any other way. We're proud to partner with transparent, environmentally-conscious, and socially-responsible factories in Los Angeles and we finish every jacket to your specifications at our studio in San Francisco.

CUSTOMIZATION FTW.

If you can do it yourself, then you probably don't need us. That's why we're focused on offering super rad customizable design features that you can't DIY or find anywhere else. 

Choose from a variety of classic denim washes, select your preferred button color, add striking finishes such as a metallic foil or vinyl racing stripe, and include functional accessories such as a removable waterproof hood or sherpa collar.

 

WE'RE PRETTY SURE YOU CARE ABOUT THE PLANET.

Same, here. That's why VENIM jackets are constructed from the excess yardage of other designer denim brands instead of milling our own denim. This saves millions of gallons of water per day, foregoing additional pollution caused by standard textile production processes.

Every jacket is made-to-order to reduce excess inventory and is shipped in 100% reusable packaging.

That being said, we've still got a long way to go when it comes to achieving our long-term goal of a circular product life cycle and we'd love your feedback on what you'd like to see more of (and what you could do without).

 

 

IN CASE YOU HAVEN'T NOTICED, WE ARE NOT A "HERITAGE" BRAND.

We choose to look forward, toward a future of thoughtfully-designed and produced goods that leave no room for waste or obsolescence. We are not nostalgic for the industries of yesteryear. We have a global vision, so we're not going to try to sell you an "All-American" brand. It's been done, already.

We also believe that while fundamental to the principles of great design, form, and function still need a little flavor. That's why we founded VENIM and we invite you to add your unique perspective to what's about to be your next favorite wardrobe staple.
 


 

THE QUALITY OF A $1,500 DESIGNER JACKET, THE FUNCTIONALITY OF A UTILITY JACKET, AND THE UNIQUE STYLE OF THE BADASS WHO'S WEARING IT.

 

YOUR OPTIONS FOR CUSTOMIZATION.

Start with a base jacket that meets your fit preferences, select from five denim washes, then choose your button color. Add bold, graphic finishes such as a metallic foil or vinyl racing stripe (with optional custom text) and purchase accessory add-ons with unprecedented performance features.

This is only the beginning of something beautiful as we continue to add and refine our custom options...

GET READY TO USE OUR SLICK AF CUSTOMIZATION TOOL.

Your control center for building the VENIM jacket of your dreams. It updates your customized preferences in real-time, giving you a holistic view of your design, total price, and estimated fulfillment time from multiple angles.

The best part? It's also mobile-friendly so that you can customize a jacket on-the-go (or from the comfort of your own spaceship).

 

UNISEX SIZING AND FIT.

We designed our jackets for humans. Are you a human? Fantastic. We're made for you. But because we understand that humans come in all kinds of shapes and sizes, we strive to do everything we can to accommodate as many body types as possible.

We're starting out with a range of three unisex sizes and two options of length to set a baseline for our customers, but our job will never truly be done until we perfectly fit every human being on this planet that we call home. After that? Mars. Definitely Mars.

 

 

 

"OKAY, BUT DO YOU HAVE MY SIZE?" - YOU, PROBABLY

Chances are, yes! We chose to start out with denim jackets as our hero product because when it comes to a denim jacket, it's more about the look you're going for than the actual size that you're wearing. Confusing? We know. But look at this way...

 

 

You don't have to be Rihanna to rock an oversized jean jacket and similarly, you don't have to be Daniel Craig to sport a fitted look that's a little more rock n' roll. "Fit" is a look, so seriously, you do you. But just in case, here's a size table that shows what people are most likely to wear, based on the size of other items in their wardrobe:

 

 

We will be asking for your help and feedback along the way to improve our fits and expand our size ranges, so thank you in advance for bringing sizing issues to our attention and for helping us build a more inclusive product and brand. If you still don't think we have the size you need, we have a solution for you. Check out the "Risks and Challenges" section at the bottom of this page.

 

WE HIT OUR FUNDING GOAL of $60,000 and can now reach our next milestone of producing 500 VENIM jackets, but we're still accepting preorders! The development is complete and we already have all the materials needed to make the jackets, so here's how your contribution will be spent:

But we want to sell out of every reward so that we can take it a step further! The more money we raise, the faster we can deliver your order, because it enables us to hire more fulfillment staff.

 

With extra funds, we can also start developing new accessory add-ons, like a detachable faux fur sherpa collar (just in time for winter) and we can begin working on collaborations with partnered brands and artists. Dope.

 

Once this campaign has ended, we will distribute a survey to get a better understanding of the styles, sizes, and washes that our backers desire. (Don't worry: It's okay if you change your mind about this, later!)

We will use this information to immediately place our first purchase order of 500 jackets from our factories in Los Angeles and to hire a kick-ass fulfillment team to help us complete and ship your order.

 

 

Once the first purchase order has been delivered to our studio, we will give all backers access to our Customization tool on www.venim.com. Here, you will be able to finalize all of the specific details of your desired jacket(s) and place your order with a unique checkout code that coordinates with your reward. This is also where you'll be able to purchase accessory add-ons to include with your reward shipment.

We will begin fulfilling orders in November and will complete all shipments by early December, then it's on to round two (for March delivery). We will be in frequent contact via email, Kickstarter, and through our website, but you can always check in with us by emailing us at hello@venim.com!

 

There are a limited number of rewards available, so we suggest that you pledge right now before everything sells out. Pledges of $295 and over are also available as a Gift Certificate, so consider giving the gift of VENIM to someone you know! 

 

BACKED BY OUR 30-DAY INDIEGOGO GUARANTEE

All Indiegogo backers will be eligible for free returns (or exchanges) on their custom denim jacket purchases within 30 days of item delivery. You heard that right: Free returns, even if a jacket has already been customized to your preferences.

Why? Because we stand by our product's quality and design, and our ability to cater to your ideal fit. We're willing to put our money where our mouth is and accept the risks that may come with returned inventory.

 


 

WE BELIEVE IN OWNING FEWER, BETTER THINGS.

Appreciating the planet means appreciating our belongings, and it's kind of hard to do that if we literally treat them like garbage. If we want to reduce our environmental impact, we must eradicate disposable goods and this means boycotting Fast Fashion, prioritizing the functionality and longevity of our consumer goods purchases, and investing in high-quality pieces that stay special to us. Responsible consumption starts at the register, not the recycling bin, so we designed a product that transcends time and fashion trends.

 

WE BELIEVE THAT HIGH EQ > HIGH IQ.

We can teach a man to fish, we can train an engineer to code, and with any help, our founder will eventually get the hang of cryptocurrency, but we can't instill life's wisdom with a one-week employee training session. So we prioritize emotional intelligence over intellectual intelligence when it comes to growing our team and community because we wanted to build a company where we connect with and understand our customers on an empathetic basis before going about serving them.

 

WE BELIEVE IN THE POWER OF AESTHETICS.

Function may come before form, but form still has a place in everything we do. Beautiful design and presentation is the natural succession to our innate affection for storytelling, creativity, and self-expression, so we like to keep things looking slick, whether it's a garment care label or a 12-story office building. Because if you're gonna do it at all, why not do it with style? We know it makes you feel good and that's our mission.

 

WE BELIEVE IN HUMAN KINDNESS.

Admit it. You are amazing. For this reason, you don’t have to be humble, but always be kind and always be thoughtful with your words and actions. Be kind to each other, be kind to others, and be kind to the planet whenever you can. We're here to remind you that kindness is a renewable resource that anyone can generate and yet the world still needs more of it every damn day.

 

WE MAINTAIN A CHILDLIKE SENSE OF WONDER.

Outer space is cool. Race cars are cool. Disco is life. We don't grow out of our playful fascinations, we grow into them in a way that doesn't compromise the polish and sophistication that comes with being a stylish, grown-ass adult. We invite you to look at the stars with us and dream big, because yes, there is yet hope for tomorrow.

 

Thank you. Thank you for being the gracious, supportive, thoughtful person that you are with the curiosity to seek out new products, services, and brands, and the courage to take a small risk in return for a big reward. You are the fuel to our engine, the disco ball to our dance floor, and you are already helping VENIM just by being here. We don't take it for granted.

If you're feeling extra generous, please take a moment to share this campaign with your friends and family. Spreading the word about us will increase the chances of us hitting our goal and bringing your reward to reality, so it's a win, win.

 

Aliens are real,  

P.S. Backing us on Indiegogo doesn't put you on our mailing list -  if you want to keep hearing from us after the campaign, sign up at www.VENIM.com!

Pledges of $295 and over are also available as a Gift Certificate, so consider giving the gift of VENIM to someone you know!  BACKED BY OUR 30-DAY INDIEGOGO GUARANTEEAll Indiegogo backers will be eligible for free returns (or exchanges) on their custom denim jacket purchases within 30 days of item delivery. You heard that right: Free returns, even if a jacket has already been customized to your preferences.Why? Because we stand by our product's quality and design, and our ability to cater to your ideal fit. We're willing to put our money where our mouth is and accept the risks that may come with returned inventory.  WE BELIEVE IN OWNING FEWER, BETTER THINGS.Appreciating the planet means appreciating our belongings, and it's kind of hard to do that if we literally treat them like garbage. If we want to reduce our environmental impact, we must eradicate disposable goods and this means boycotting Fast Fashion, prioritizing the functionality and longevity of our consumer goods purchases, and investing in high-quality pieces that stay special to us. Responsible consumption starts at the register, not the recycling bin, so we designed a product that transcends time and fashion trends. WE BELIEVE THAT HIGH EQ > HIGH IQ.We can teach a man to fish, we can train an engineer to code, and with any help, our founder will eventually get the hang of cryptocurrency, but we can't instill life's wisdom with a one-week employee training session. So we prioritize emotional intelligence over intellectual intelligence when it comes to growing our team and community because we wanted to build a company where we connect with and understand our customers on an empathetic basis before going about serving them. WE BELIEVE IN THE POWER OF AESTHETICS.Function may come before form, but form still has a place in everything we do. Beautiful design and presentation is the natural succession to our innate affection for storytelling, creativity, and self-expression, so we like to keep things looking slick, whether it's a garment care label or a 12-story office building. Because if you're gonna do it at all, why not do it with style? We know it makes you feel good and that's our mission. WE BELIEVE IN HUMAN KINDNESS.Admit it. You are amazing. For this reason, you don’t have to be humble, but always be kind and always be thoughtful with your words and actions. Be kind to each other, be kind to others, and be kind to the planet whenever you can. We're here to remind you that kindness is a renewable resource that anyone can generate and yet the world still needs more of it every damn day. WE MAINTAIN A CHILDLIKE SENSE OF WONDER.Outer space is cool. Race cars are cool. Disco is life. We don't grow out of our playful fascinations, we grow into them in a way that doesn't compromise the polish and sophistication that comes with being a stylish, grown-ass adult. We invite you to look at the stars with us and dream big, because yes, there is yet hope for tomorrow. Thank you. Thank you for being the gracious, supportive, thoughtful person that you are with the curiosity to seek out new products, services, and brands, and the courage to take a small risk in return for a big reward. You are the fuel to our engine, the disco ball to our dance floor, and you are already helping VENIM just by being here. We don't take it for granted.If you're feeling extra generous, please take a moment to share this campaign with your friends and family. Spreading the word about us will increase the chances of us hitting our goal and bringing your reward to reality, so it's a win, win. Aliens are real,  P.S. Backing us on Indiegogo doesn't put you on our mailing list -  if you want to keep hearing from us after the campaign, sign up at www.VENIM.com!

story:
Our Story

Hi, My name is Penny Miller and I am a Veteran, entrepreneur, nurse, inventor, and a typical mom: wearer of many hats. I invented this cool Keeper clip, which is patent(s) pending gift jewelry clip and clip on bow. 

The idea came out of a grrrrr moment when I was wrapping presents Christmas Eve of 2011 and ran out of tape.  

Frustrated, I thought to myself " why doesn't someone just make a clip on bow and I wouldn't need tape, the bag would be closed, present out of sight"  then I thought, "yeah why doesn't someone?" and so I did!

Everyone wants to have the prettiest present in the room and with gift jewelry, you surely will. It's super easy and very beautiful. 

In our attempt to improve the clip, we took it a step further. We made the clips key chains and ornaments too. Now, many styles even come with bottle openers. 

The Impact

The Keeper clip make anyone look great and support green giving by allowing all the wrapping to be re-used. The clip is the perfect compliment to any gift while making your life easier and the world greener. No compromise necessary.

What We Need & What You Get

We need to take the virtual designs we have created and turn them into real product.  

That requires 3D CAD drawings for each, and a mold with solid models.  Each one requires $1,000.00 to get into production.

We need those funds so we can bring the new designs to you.

In return, we will send you some of these amazing Keeper clips and let the world know how great you were in supporting us.  Be part of making the world a better place with style and function.

Have a campaign of your own on IndieGoGo?  Let us know and we will support you too.  This is a community after all.
