story:
Brief summary

How many times have you had to change in public, such as at the beach, people watching you wriggle every which way while trying to avoid baring all?

You grab a towel, wrap it around you, it falls and everything is visible! 

The Spaxe Dress has been created for YOU!

Slip on the dress from the bottom, pull it up and over your clothes. Then you can simply undress, hidden from prying eyes. In less than 30 seconds you are ready!


What we need and what you get

We have developed the Spaxe Dress to be easy to slip on and remove. We have also created various modern designs to please every one of you ladies; designs ranging from ethnic chic to your national flag!  

Due to the manufacturing process using superb textiles, the Spaxe Dress offers exceptionally vivacious colours that resist years of wear, repetitive washing at 90°, even bleach! 
The cutting of the Spaxe Dress has been conceived to complement all body types, whatever your cup size, whether you are tall or short, full figured or slim! Once your order has been confirmed we will advise you on which size to choose to ensure you have a magnificent dress that doesn’t trail on the ground. 


Do you like our project? Support us! How? 

To help us launch our production you can donate any amount from $5 up. Your name will be gratefully entered on our future website as a donor. You can also buy a t-shirt with our superb logo for $25. 

For the more rapid among you we offer the first batch of dresses at the special price of $45 each instead of $65. 

Don’t worry if you jump in a little late! We will make a second batch of 50 dresses available for $55 each instead of $65.

Are you a reseller, interested in the distribution of Spaxe Dresses in your area? 

The following packs are available: 

Reseller Pack 1: $800 for 20 dresses

Reseller Pack 2: $1,000 for 25 dresses

Reseller Pack 3: $2,000 for 50 dresses


Some of the reasons for slipping on your Spaxe Dress! 

After an exhilarating surfing session you need to change, but how? Slip on your Spaxe Dress and do so quickly and easily! 
Maybe you practise Yoga, out in the fresh air? If you wish to change after a good session then a Spaxe Dress is exactly what you need! 
Are you a model who needs to change between two shooting sessions? No time to find a changing room? Slip on your Spaxe and change in less than 30 seconds! Now you’re ready for your next shoot! 
Going camping but not thrilled with the idea of having to twist every which way to dress inside your tent? Slip on your Spaxe dress, get dressed and enjoy your holiday!
Each time you need to change in public just slip on your Spaxe Dress! With the attractive designs available you may even wish to simply wear it as a dress!


Shipping costs 

The shipping cost for Europe is $15. 

The International shipping cost is $30.


All Dresses


DEVELOPMENT




LABEL

Each Spaxe Dress is unique with its individual serial number attributed to you. 

Risks and challenges 

Our team has worked in the textile industry for over ten years! We have tried all the prototypes that you can see on our Facebook, Instagram and Twitter pages to ensure the best possible cut and enhance the body shapes of all women. 
We are used to working for exterior clients and have reduced the production risks to a minimum.  
We can dispatch the orders one month after the project end. 

Other ways of helping us

You can’t afford a dress or a t-shirt but you would still like to support us? We would be grateful if you shared our page with all your friends! Tell them about the Spaxe Dress – fashionable and useful! 
All our prototypes are made in Morocco (Northern Africa). 
By purchasing a Spaxe Dress you are helping around a hundred employees in Northern Africa to benefit from legal employment with respectable work conditions. 
We will therefore respect the following timeline: 

• Beginning August:  Launch of Indiegogo project. 
• End August: End of project financing, beginning of size and body type validation. 
• Beginning September: Production of orders received. 
• End September: Dispatch of all orders. 

FOLLOW US ON



Our great t-shirt for $25


GALLERY

  

 


OUR TEAM

story:
The classic yet modern design coupled with the functional expandable size and instant access pocket make it the one bag you can rely on, whether it is for business, photography and even the overnight travels.

Our daily routine is less of a routine and more of a set of activities that happen alongside the ones we were expecting that day. We found ourselves having to switch between one bag to another for primarily two reasons: size and design. 

That is why we set out to create a bag that would be by definition flexible, one that we could proudly take wherever you go. 

On average we use a bag on more than 300 out of 364 days so it’s time to take out the right one! 

The front pocket is always the handy option for quick access to your camera gear. Easily open it with one hand to take out your camera or switch between lenses.

Do you know that feeling when you pack your bag to the limit and then you find that there is an extra zip that you can open to expand your bag? Inspired by the larger travel luggage, we wanted to bring this convenient feature to our daily bag. 

Because there is no single ideal size, the 48Hr Classic adapts to your needs by expanding 70% from its original size.

Need to get out of town for a couple of days? Sure, just expand the 48Hr Classic and get packing for the journey. 

Often I would pack everything into a bag to get me there and then I would find that I needed another one to move around the city. 

We designed the 48Hr Classic to fix this problem so now you can zip up the expandable compartment and it becomes a compact messenger that you can carry during the day. 



Expand it to travel there and zip it back up for everyday use

It is time for a bag that combines a discreet exterior with a smart interior. Inspired by the classic briefcase shape, we began reimagining our expectations, from a design as much as a functional point of view. That is why the 48Hr Classic is everything you would expect from a premium, practical bag and much more. 

With this practical aspect in mind we created an elegant, stylish design that makes you feel comfortable wherever your day takes you. 

 The all leather strap will turn the 48Hr Classic into a backpack for a comfortable commute on your bike or long walks when you want to free up your hands.

Whether it will be your work bag, camera bag or carry on bag, or all these things, the 48Hr Classic is up for the task!

We value the process of handcrafting the 48Hr Classic as much as the final good and believe that we sometimes own products without knowing and appreciating the time, effort and skill that has gone into making every detail. That is why we want to be as transparent as possible and show you all the different steps that go into making your very own 48Hr Classic.

Each bag starts its life from premium hides of leather that are picked individually by us. One handcrafting process at a time your bag starts to gain shape. Our artisans pay attention to every detail producing a rich, unique leather bag. When we say unique we really mean it because every 48Hr Classic is handmade so each is different to the one before, each is imperfectly perfect.

Even more important than the design, the Temporary Forevers brand is about pledging towards something that makes you feel unique, makes you feel better for having a bag that you don’t see everywhere and if you ever do happen to come across someone with a 48Hr Classic Bag, we hope you will smile to them for having something different in common.

The classic yet modern design coupled with the functional expandable size and instant access pocket make it the one bag you can rely on, whether it is for business, photography and even the overnight travels.Our daily routine is less of a routine and more of a set of activities that happen alongside the ones we were expecting that day. We found ourselves having to switch between one bag to another for primarily two reasons: size and design. That is why we set out to create a bag that would be by definition flexible, one that we could proudly take wherever you go. On average we use a bag on more than 300 out of 364 days so it’s time to take out the right one! 
 

 
The front pocket is always the handy option for quick access to your camera gear. Easily open it with one hand to take out your camera or switch between lenses.
 
Do you know that feeling when you pack your bag to the limit and then you find that there is an extra zip that you can open to expand your bag? Inspired by the larger travel luggage, we wanted to bring this convenient feature to our daily bag. Because there is no single ideal size, the 48Hr Classic adapts to your needs by expanding 70% from its original size.
 
Need to get out of town for a couple of days? Sure, just expand the 48Hr Classic and get packing for the journey. Often I would pack everything into a bag to get me there and then I would find that I needed another one to move around the city. We designed the 48Hr Classic to fix this problem so now you can zip up the expandable compartment and it becomes a compact messenger that you can carry during the day. Expand it to travel there and zip it back up for everyday useIt is time for a bag that combines a discreet exterior with a smart interior. Inspired by the classic briefcase shape, we began reimagining our expectations, from a design as much as a functional point of view. That is why the 48Hr Classic is everything you would expect from a premium, practical bag and much more. Your essentials are always easily accessible when you need them.
   




 


 
 
 
 

 
 
 

All 48Hr Classic Bag backers will receive a leather shoulder pad. If you wish to get a 2nd shoulder pad with your reward, please add $10 to your current pledge and send us a quick message to let us know.
More often than not, we found that it’s better to be more elegant than your surroundings than the opposite. For example going to a business meeting with your gym bag will look more out of place than heading to the gym with your business messenger bag. 
With this practical aspect in mind we created an elegant, stylish design that makes you feel comfortable wherever your day takes you. 
 Now there is no need to switch between your office and casual bag 

 

   With our 13 or 15’’ laptop becoming an indispensable part of our lives, we made sure that you can carry it around in a separate padded compartment protecting it from outer elements as well as from other interior objects which may scratch it. 

 
 The all leather strap will turn the 48Hr Classic into a backpack for a comfortable commute on your bike or long walks when you want to free up your hands.Whether it will be your work bag, camera bag or carry on bag, or all these things, the 48Hr Classic is up for the task!
 

 

 
View of the back of the 48Hr Classic Bag
 
We value the process of handcrafting the 48Hr Classic as much as the final good and believe that we sometimes own products without knowing and appreciating the time, effort and skill that has gone into making every detail. That is why we want to be as transparent as possible and show you all the different steps that go into making your very own 48Hr Classic.Each bag starts its life from premium hides of leather that are picked individually by us. One handcrafting process at a time your bag starts to gain shape. Our artisans pay attention to every detail producing a rich, unique leather bag. When we say unique we really mean it because every 48Hr Classic is handmade so each is different to the one before, each is imperfectly perfect.                                                       Because Quality Matters
 The 24 & 48Hr Classic Bags are made from premium Italian full grain leather chosen for it's aesthetics, fibre strength and durability. The grain also has breathability, resulting in less moisture from prolonged contact. Rather than wearing out, it develops a patina during its expected useful lifetime. We carefully choose each hide and opt to leave most natural small marks as we believe it adds to the character and beauty of the leather. 
  Even more important than the design, the Temporary Forevers brand is about pledging towards something that makes you feel unique, makes you feel better for having a bag that you don’t see everywhere and if you ever do happen to come across someone with a 48Hr Classic Bag, we hope you will smile to them for having something different in common.
 
Thanks to our team of Kickstarter backers, the following extra upgrades will be included to all 48Hr Classic bags! UPGRADE 1: Zips – YKK Yes that’s right, your 24 and 48Hr Classic bags will now come with YKK zips! For those of you that are not familiar with the brand, they are one of the top zip producers in the world.  

 
 
UPGRADE 2: Improved Interior Fabric
The support of almost 700 backers meant that the quantity of materials needed increased considerably so now we had access to new producers and with that came a new range of materials. Although it is slightly more expensive, we decided to upgrade to a new lining that maintains the same feel, same colour but that is thicker at 245g/m2 which adds to its strength and durability over time.
 


 
 
UPGRADE 3: Extra Material for Increased Rigidity
This is something that we spent a lot time on and in the end we thought it would be best to also add this upgrade to increase the stiffness and rigidity of the faces of the bag while keeping their softness. Now there will be two materials between the exterior leather and the interior lining rather than just one as we had initially. This material acts as a strengthening mesh that was only used on the bag at the stress points such as the handles to prevent the leather from stretching too much over time.

story:
Engineered to take on any challenge. No unnecessary parts just raw 3D printing power combined with effortless user experience. Highly precise, consistent and truly affordable.

Engineered to be simple and intuitive. We made an extra effort to give you a product that could fit in your desktop, workshop or even the kitchen, while being able to match all of your expectations.

 

Cartesian style architecture alongside an extremely robust frame to ensure reliability and longevity.

2.5 hours. That's all it takes to get the Blocks Zero ready for action. Featuring a step by step assembly manual you just have to grab a cup of coffee and learn all about what makes the tiny giant tick!

 

   
   
 


Zero's robust build alongside a max. layer resolution of 40 microns puts it in a league of its own within kit 3D printers.

It features a maximum printing speed of 60 mm/s making it one the fastest 3D printer kits out there!

   

 

 

   

 

After having almost ran out of time we decided to extend our campaign and to celebrate xmas and the new year’s we are adding two new perks!! 

  1. Blocks Zero Fully Assembled Early Bird
  2. Blocks Zero Fully Assembled

It has also came to our attention that sometimes flexible funding campaigns do not deliver the perks!

Blocks was established in 2014 and since then we have sold hundreds of machines like the Blocks One or the Custom (check www.blockstec.com). We want to reassure you and explain why our team’s decision was to opt for the flexible funding. For us this is more of a pre-order and a chance to let you know about us than required funding.

So every single contribution will be delivered, even if we don’t meet our funding goal!!

 

Blocks Zero Prints

 

Video Reviews & Unboxing

 

 
 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nNqqO2Jmav8
 

Be among the first to get a brand new Blocks Zero and check out how much you can save! Production is already underway, the first kits will start to ship out in February 2017

 

 

All together our team has more than 10 years of experience in manufacturing 3D printers. Find all about us below.

He is the man who steers the ship. He has a background in biotechnology engineering and is our best at setting the bar up high. His efforts make us all challenge ourselves every day. He is also our spokesman working hard to get the word out about the tiny giant.

The lead engineer behind the development of the Blocks Zero. Alexandre is a Electrical Engineer that has loved 3D printing ever since he knew it was possible. An inventor at heart and the best 3D printing specialist there is. At we least think so. We thank him for always having a solution for any development challenge.

PhD in Electronics and Computer Engineering. To put it in simple way, he is the man in charge of developing all of our software and firmware needs. Without him Zero's click-of-a-button functionalities like mid-printing filament change wouldn't be possible.

Every Blocks Zero has passed through his hands. Nuno takes quality control very seriously, over-seeing all components we get from our suppliers and making sure every 3D printer that comes out of production is nothing but working perfectly. He is a Mechanical Engineer.

Help us get the word out there. Share or like the tiny giant on facebook! We sure thank you!

 

If you need to learn more about the Blocks Zero email us at info@blockstec.com and we will tell you all about it!

story:
CAMPAIGN RAISED!

TO SHOP Online: www.toucane.co/

Worldwide delivery


English: To purchase, click one of the perks on the right!

*After contributing you will be able to choose colour and size. For 2x1 you can buy different sizes and colours.

**If you have any questions, you can reach us at support@toucane.es or leave a comment here.

***Toucane Unics will arrive Spain July 22nd! So you will receive them as soon as possible


Español: Para comprar, ¡pulsa en las recompensas de la derecha!

*Después de contribuir puedes elegir el color y la talla. Para el 2x1 puedes elegir diferentes colores y tallas.

**Si tienes alguna duda, por favor, contáctanos en support@toucane.es o déjanos un comentario aquí.

***Las Toucane Unics llegarán a España el 22 de Julio! Por lo que las recibirás lo antes posible!



EN: Toucane is an original brand based in Madrid, Spain, dedicated to an original lifestyle with an edge.

We started out with an idea:  we would reinvent the casual shoe.


ES: Toucane es una marca original nacida en Madrid, España, enfocada a un estilo de vida original y diferente.

Empezamos con una idea: reinventaríamos la zapatilla tradicional.



EN: We noticed all shoes had the same white soles, perhaps a shoe with something different here or there, but none of them had a real pronounced uniqueness.

So we thought, why not make some good looking shoes for people who want to stand out from the crowd? Why not be different?

Maintaining style and quality without sacrificing affordability, we would design a noteworthy shoe.

Toucane shoes are unique, like…well, like Toucans. We are singular and colorful. We are original!


ES: Nos dimos cuenta de que todas las zapatillas suelen tener las suelas blancas sin ninguna diferencia realmente pronunciada.

Así que pensamos, ¿por qué no hacer zapatillas diferentes para gente que quiera destacar entre la multitud? ¿Por qué no se diferentes?

Manteniendo el estilo y la calidad, a buen precio, diseñaríamos una zapatilla original.

Las zapatillas Toucane son únicas como... los tucanes. Somos singulares y coloridos. ¡Somos originales!


    


EN: Toucane's are made of two pieces of dyed canvas clothe, cut, emroidered and printed to achieve that original look.

The soles are vulcanized and 100% natural rubber, which provides greater elasticity, strength and comfort. They are dyed in Pantone colors to mesh perfectly with the upper canvas body.

Are you willing to risk missing out on the colored sole trend?


ES: Las zapatillas Toucane están hechas de dos piezas de canvas teniñas, reforzadas, cortadas, bordadas y estampadas para conseguir ese aspecto original.

Las suelas son vulcanizadas 100% de goma natural, lo que proporciona mayor elasticidad, resistencia y comodidad. Unas suelas teñidas en colores para combinar a la perfección con el cuerpo de la zapatilla.

¿Te vas a quedar fuera de la tendencia de las suelas de colores?



EN: This first production comes in 4 different colores:

ES: Esta primera producción con 4 colores diferentes:

EN: Our color combinations are matched with you in mind. From days you want to stand out more with our Citrus or Cadmium pair, to days where you need a classier look with our Evergreen or Pompeian pair.

ES: Nuestras combinaciones se adaptan a cualquier momento, desde días en los que quieres destacar más con un par de Citrus o Cadmium, hasta días en los que necesitas un look más clásico con nuestros modelos Evergreen o Pompenian.


EN: Stand out from the mass produced shoes. Take that step towards originality. We want you to experience Toucane, a quality product at a good price. And your pledge will help start it.

ES: Destaca entre la masa. Da un paso hacia la originalidad. Queremos que experimentes Toucane, un producto de calidad a buen precio. Y tu compromiso nos ayudará a comenzar.

*Transportes incluidos para España. Si te encuentras fuera de España, por favor, añade los costes para tu país (mira la tabla más abajo).


EN: Why just 29€? Why 50% off?

Because we trust Toucane and want to get this project started. We want to thank your support. Get your pair now, our discount is limited!


ES: ¿Por qué solo 29€? ¿Por qué un 50% de descuento?

Porque creemos en Toucane y queremos agradecer a las primeras personas que nos ayuden a convertir esta idea en realidad.

¡Hazte con tu par de Toucane ahora, nuestros descuentos son limitados!

EN:

ES: ¿Por qué elegir Toucane?


EN: Launch the crowfunding campaign to get the first 4 colours sold on this promotion.

Take advantage of the discount and be one of the first to wear them at the best price.

If we get this goal before 15th of July, we will start sending the orders before the crowdfunding campaign is finished!!


ES: Conseguir recaudar esta cantidad para la venta de los primeros 4 colores con la promoción de esta campaña.

Aprovecha el descuento y se uno de las primeros en llevar unas Toucane al mejor precio.

Si este objetivo se cumple antes del 15 de julio, empezaremos a enviar los pedidos antes de que la campaña crowdfunding finalice!!


EN: We will start producing and include 2 colours more. These two new models will arrive one or tow months later than the initial colours.

6 combination in total.


ES: Empezaremos a producir dos combinaciones de color más. Estos dos modelos llegarán uno o dos meses después que los modelos iniciales.

6 combinaciones en total


EN: We work with one of the best manufacturers of shoes.

The shoes will arrive Spain by late July, after inspection, our team will pack and ship each pair to its correspondent client.

You will receive your Toucane at home between the 1st and  5th of August. If everything goes fine you will receive them earlier (15th of july). We will stay in contact.

Whole process is supervised by an external control quality company.

Once you have ordered we send you a message asking the color and size you wish to receive.


ES: Trabajamos con uno de los mejores fabricantes de zapatillas.

Las zapatillas llegarán a España a finales de julio, y después de la inspección, nuestro equipo se encargará de enviar cada paquete a su correspondiente cliente.

Recibiréis las Toucane en vuestra casa entre el 1 y 5 de agosto, aunque si todo va bien puede que las recibáis antes (15 de julio). ¡Permeneced atentos porque iremos informando!

Todo el proceso es supervisado por una empresa de control de calidad externa.

Una vez realizada la compra te enviaremos un email preguntándote la talla y el color que deseas recibir.

                                     

       


                                 

                                                   

    

EN: Help us to spread the word about Toucane shoes! Mention us at dinner, to your family, your friends and on any form of social media and blogs you follow!

We have more cool ideas, if we reach the first goal, we promise to continue making unique products for unique people like you.


ES: Ayúdanos a dar a conocer nuestra campaña: a tu familia, tus amigos y a cualquiera que sigas en redes sociales y blogs.

Tenemos más ideas molonas, así conseguimos nuestro primer objetivo, prometemos seguir haciendo productos únicos para personas únicas como tú.


                       www.facebook.com/toucanecompany

                        @Toucane_co

                        toucane_co

                        Toucane co 


EN: Let's make a cool Toucane community, we want you to be part of it! Join our lifestyle and chat with us. Tell us your opinions about our shoes or let us know your ideas.


ES: Hagamos una comunidad de Toucane, ¡queremos que formes parte de ella! Únete a nuestro estilo de vida y cuéntanos tus opiniones sobre nuestras zapatillas, ideas originales o experiencia. 

    


EN: No part of this project can be complete without you, so we just want to say thanks in advance. 

             

ES: Este proyecto no podría completarse sin tu ayuda, así que te damos las gracias por adelantado.



EN:

Similar to many Indiegogo projects, the challenge of Toucane is delivering our product on time. In a timely manner. Our team will make as much as possible to cumply the shipping times, but we have to take into account possible contingencies beyond our control.

Contracted quality control inspectors will also be at our production site to insure your orders. 


ES: Al igual que muchos proyectos en Indiegogo, el desafío de Toucane es entregar nuestras zapatillas a tiempo. Nuestro equipo hará todo lo posible para que esto sea así, pero tenemos que tener en cuenta posibles imprevistos ajenos a nosotros.

Inspectores de control de calidad también estarán en nuestro lugar de producción para asegurar vuestros pedidos. 

1. How can I choose the colour of my Toucanes? Once you have placed your order, we will send you an email asking you what size and colour  of Toucane Unics you want to receive at home.

2. How do I pick my size? Below you will find a chart where you can look up your size.

3. Am I suppose to manually add shipping costs if I'm not in Spain? Yes, you have to add shipping costs on top of your selected perk. 

International Shipping Costs - You must add it to your contribution. If you forgot to do so, choose the $1 perk and contribute the proper amount.

Look at next tab to know shipping costs to your country:


4. Help! What to do if I forget to pay for shipping costs? No problem, just click CONTRIBUTE NOW and put in the actual amount you need to pay. Then select "No perk, I just want to contribute."

 

EN: Visit us at our web or follow us on Twitter, Facebook, Instagram and Pinterest.

ES: Visítanos en nuestra web o síguenos en Twitter, Facebook, Instagram y Pinterest.

For 2x1 you can buy different sizes and colours.**If you have any questions, you can reach us at support@toucane.es or leave a comment here.***Toucane Unics will arrive Spain July 22nd! So you will receive them as soon as possibleEspañol: Para comprar, ¡pulsa en las recompensas de la derecha!*Después de contribuir puedes elegir el color y la talla. Para el 2x1 puedes elegir diferentes colores y tallas.**Si tienes alguna duda, por favor, contáctanos en support@toucane.es o déjanos un comentario aquí.***Las Toucane Unics llegarán a España el 22 de Julio! Por lo que las recibirás lo antes posible!

story:
Project summary

Wear&Toss™ means biodegradable, sustainable clothing, economically and environmentally friendly, to be worn, to be enjoyed, and to be disposed of responsibly and with no regrets.

Creativity is the economic engine of the future and it is in everything we do at Wear & Toss® where our customer is at the center of all we do.

Eco-Friendly is the extraordinary element of innovation developed by Wear & Toss® for the textile industry that has yet to find a truly efficient and effective solution to the environmental impact of its products.

Sustainable Development means for the textile industry sustainable, non-conventional products:

1) The use of raw materials derived from natural sources.

2) By employing environmentally responsible, simplified yet automated technological processes in the construction of the garments.

Green Technology in the supply chain and the processing of the Wear&Toss® cloth compared to the traditional cotton supply chain, allows for considerable savings in terms of resource use and the release of harmful substances into the environment, representing the new frontier of eco-friendly clothing. In figures: - 85 % of cultivated territories occupied, - 95% of the water required in the production process, - 75% of carbon dioxide emissions, - 94% of chemicals used during the entire production chain.

Economical A small price to pay (approx. 2€ RRP per T-shirt) frees our customer from strong economic ties to the item of clothing easing disposal. 

New Life Style A real revolution in life style liberating the consumer from the cleaning cycle tasks; wash, consumption, recycling.

Use the clothing item’s life cycle is greatly reduced, dictated to mainly by the seasonality of fashion, and the wear and tear and soiling of the item. The item’s low cost favours repurchase.

Fast Fashion Wear&Toss® is the simple solution for "Fast Fashion": In this age of unbridled consumerism, what is new and original today, is old tomorrow. Wear & Toss® has come up with the first example of biodegradable disposable clothing.

Packaging pocket-sized packaging facilitates storage and transportation.

Free Time The washing machine and iron are no longer necessary, thanks to Wear & Toss® clothing item’s reduced life cycle giving you a substantial increase in free time, raising to the nth degree those very concepts of wellness and renewal.

Applications The Wear & Toss® technology can be applied in many sectors, from fashion to sport, from work wear to military uses, from cosmetics to bio-medical, representing a great opportunity to explore new markets and review so new ones.

Competitors The economic crisis, the lack of innovative textile products and the awareness and need of "green" products are favourable to quick market entry and penetration. Today, there is no direct competitor with a product with similar characteristics.

We mean to make the brand name Wear & Toss® a leader, unique and original, in eco-friendly textiles and stay ahead of the competition.

The Idea

Often the best ideas come from looking at daily life from a new point of view. The Wear&Toss™ project started in August 2008 when Filippo De Martin, holidaying with his family, realised that an inexpensive single-use t-shirt was the solution to the problem of his kids clothes getting dirty and needing to be washed and/or the need to travel with a lot of changes. An ecological t-shirt that would be bought wherever you travel and which can be recycled after use.

That was the moment the Wear&Toss™ project came to life, a project which is now fully under way and ready to meet and satisfy the needs of today’s consumer.

Biodegradable Single-Use Clothing

Wear&Toss™ is a new concept for inexpensive ecological clothing designed to be worn and disposed of simply and quickly. The product is a genuine revolution in life style: wear-use-recycle.

Wear Sustainability

Suitable for use in a range of sectors – fashion, sport, workwear, medical – the Wear&Toss™ project makes use of innovative materials and production techniques which reduce running costs while guaranteeing excellent quality and zero environmental impact.

Fast fashion? Sustainable fast wear!

In the era of right now and rampant consumerism what’s new and original today is already old tomorrow and ready to be changed. The W&T project is ahead of its time and leads the way to future consumer models by presenting the first biodegradable single-use clothing.

 

        

A new revolution 

Every revolution starts with a belief and the WEAR&TOSS™ project is, first of all, just this.  A belief based on an explosive concept that turns the status quo on its head and brings tomorrow’s dreams to life today. A discovery with a huge impact which will have an extraordinary effect on everyday life.

Just like a work of art, it’s not simply the sum of its parts that makes this project so special. The WEAR&TOSS™ project isn’t just another disposable product or cheap clothing concept. It’s this but also much more. It’s not only one of the many alternatives on the market but a real alternative to the market, a genuine response to fast fashion.


Think Green

Its ecological credentials are the first, most extraordinary, element of the innovation proposed by WEAR&TOSS™. While in other sectors the issue of the disastrous impact of its products on the environment has been faced, up to now this has not been true of the textile sector.

WEAR&TOSS™ is aimed at a new generation of consumers who, becoming increasingly dissatisfied with traditional products, are making respect for both the environment and workers essential factors when selecting a product.

WEAR&TOSS™ is sensitive to both nature and society (and in a broader sense to urban planning, architecture, design etc.) as it follows balance and beauty via a perfect combination of history, culture and innovation which come together to create freedom of movement and emotion. The freedom to choose a unique eco-sustainable product that actively involves the consumer in its creation and development in all phases of its manufacture.

More free time

Among all the domestic appliances that fill our homes the one that has had the greatest impact is the washing machine. Why is this?

After the second world war there was a time of immense growth and industrial rebirth so companies strived to come up with answers to the increasing demand for a better way of life by producing, among other things, a machine that would free the household of one of the most time-consuming tasks: washing clothes and linens. During these years existing washing machine models were improved in a way which also had a profound effect on the emancipation of women.

But progress doesn’t stop and now the incredible innovation that was the washing machine is about to be surpassed by a revolution of no less significance, ecological single-use clothing.

Not just the washing machine but also the iron and the clotheshorse will become less important as disposable clothing items become more common. This in turn will lead to more free time, leading to an improvement in wellbeing and freedom in the same way as the washing machine did in the last century.

Between Today and Tomorrow

The concept of sustainable development is based on a very precise aim, to improve economic and social conditions by integrating growth with a strong sense of environmental responsibility. The idea is to fulfill the demands of people today without compromising the ability of future generations to satisfy their needs.

Development models which work hand-in-hand with the environment, the economy and society as a whole can succeed only by promoting innovative production and consumer models that focus on utilising renewable resources, on the environmental impact of processes and on a careful analysis of the impact of these goods and services during their life-cycle.

                     

Wear&Toss™ is committed to protecting the environment and to promoting responsible consumerism by introducing radical changes to the textile sector which range from providing unconventional products to advances in technology and processing. The project is aimed at a global evolution of the concept of “sustainable clothing”.

Raw materials

Wear&Toss™ is an innovative family of fabrics that use fibres taken from renewable sources such as cellulose, beetroot, corn starch and sugar cane.

Compared to traditional fibres taken from fossil fuels, the fibres used by W&T have excellent biodegradability and compostability properties which is why they can be considered the fibres of the future.

These kinds of raw materials have already been used by some large commercial chains for the production of packaging and disposable plates, cups, gloves and clear plastic wrap.

Process

The production line and transformation of WEAR&TOSS™ fabrics is based on three key aspects: mechanisation, energy efficiency and respect for the environment.

The high level of mechanisation, capable of producing up to 100 items a minute, makes it economically viable to produce in loco and reduces the exploitation of workers from developing countries. The project also allows companies to reduce the enormous costs of international transport and therefore also the pollution it causes.

In the knowledge that the energy needs of a textile production company represent on average 30% to 50% of their total costs, W&T uses innovative technologies and machinery which use less energy and have zero environmental impact.

Disposal

The most revolutionary characteristic of the 100% biodegradable WEAR&TOSS™ product is that it can be recycled or composted.

Biodegradability is the ability of organic substances and some materials to decompose and be assimilated by microorganisms (bacteria) in the soil so as to become part of the natural cycle once again. Compost is a collection of highly fertile organic substances which derive from the biodegrading of organic materials (waste).

In a very short time WEAR&TOSS™ clothing disposed of in the ground or through recycling centres decomposes into water and carbon dioxide, two elements which are essential in the chlorophyllic photosynthesis of green plants. This process therefore contributes to maintaining the ecological balanceof the planet.

Wear&Toss™ vs Cotton

Is cotton a natural fibre? Yes it is. Is it a sustainable fibre? Absolutely not. This is because it is produced using processes which are harmful both for the environment and for humanity.

The 25 million tonnes of cotton produced each year have an enormous impact because of the use of pesticides (10-20% of the total used in all forms of agriculture), water consumption (about 2000 litres of water for a t-shirt) and transportation-related pollution (use of fossil fuels and C02 emissions).

Compared to the manufacturing processes used for cotton, the production line and transformation processes for the WEAR&TOSS™ fabric provide a significant saving in terms of the exploitation of natural resources and the production of harmful substances and therefore represent a new frontier in eco-sustainable clothing.

Versatile Product

As Wear&Toss™ fabric is made from a variety of fibre types it is suitable for use in a wide range of products. Extremely versatile and fully customizable, it is soft and light as well as very strong with excellent textile and mechanical properties.

                                                         SINGLE-USE

No more washing machines and irons. After use a Wear&Toss™product can be disposed of and recycled in the conventional way. The life-cycle of the item is very short.

                                                     ECO SUSTAINABLE

These are totally biodegradable clothing items from a production line created based on high environmental consciousness.Wear&Toss™ products, made from raw materials such as cellulose and corn starch, respect both the natural and human resources used in their production.

                                                        ISOTROPIC

Wear&Toss™ fabric is isotropic which means that is maintains the same properties and physical characteristics in all directions. This ensures it keeps its shape very well and clothing made from this fabric is both resistant and strong.

                                                 ELASTIC

One of the unique features of Wear&Toss™ fabric is its excellent elasticity (an intrinsic property of the material) which makes it extremely malleable and flexible in all circumstances without losing shape when under pressure.

       INEXPANSIVE

The revolutionary technology used by Wear&Toss™ reduces production costs when compared to more traditional cotton production. The products are so inexpensive that consumers will be happy to buy them again and again and will stop forming emotional attachments to their clothing items.

                                               STABLE

Wear&Toss™ products do not release fibres or dust particles as the microfilaments which make up the fabric are highly stable. The fabric is therefore ideal for use in medical environments where dust particles can potentially have a serious effect on clinical procedures.

                                               BREATHABLE

Wear&Toss™ clothing, irrespective of the kind of mix used, is very comfortable and provides maximum breathability. This means it allows the skin to breathe while limiting the build-up of sweat and promoting the rapid elimination of condensation.

                                               ALLERGY-FREE

The solid compact structure of Wear&Toss™ products provides excellent protection of the skin against allergens produced by dust mites as they are very efficiently contained by the fabric.

                                               MICROENCAPSULATION

The Wear&Toss™ fabric is ideal for the insertion of microcapsules that provide added value to the product and increase potential areas of use. The microcapsules can be of a variety of types, in particular with perfumed, pharmaceutical or antiseptic properties.

Infinite Applications

Light, comfortable and breathable, the WEAR&TOSS™ fabric is suitable for use in a wide range of sectors from fashion to sport, from workwear to military clothing, from cosmetics to the bio-medical sector, and represents a fantastic opportunity to exploit as-yet untapped markets or even to create new ones. 

The WEAR&TOSS™ fabric as a finished product can be manufactured with antibacterial, hydro-repellent, fire-resistant, and UV protection properties and therefore effectively responds to the needs of a diverse range of consumers (private, corporate or institutional).

                                          FASHION

In the Fashion sector where things are constantly changing the WEAR&TOSS™ fabric is absolutely ideal as it embodies the essential values on which the fashion sector is founded: seasonality and speed. In contrast with international catwalk fashion, W&T provides access to practical and inexpensive clothing that everyone can enjoy, from adults to children and business professionals to housewives, without having to give up on the style and character of global fashion trends.

                                         SPORT

Single-use t-shirts that can be disposed of after use.WEAR&TOSS™ sports underwear solves the problems of repeated washing of sports underwear as well as the weight of carrying many changes by introducing innovative odour-free garments that effectively neutralise the unpleasant effects of sweat.

                                         WORKWEAR

In sectors where work clothing is subject to intense use and quickly wears out, WEAR&TOSS™ clothing is an ideal solution. At the end of the day the used and soiled garment can simply be thrown away without the need to worry about tears, stains or abrasions.

                                         BIO-MEDICAL

Hospitals and private clinics, pharmaceutical companies, analysis labs, rehabilitation centres and rest homes are all areas where WEAR&TOSS™ products are ideal. This is because hygienic, sterile materials and clothing for both patients and personnel are essential so as to prevent bacterial and viral contamination. WEAR&TOSS™ products are much better for these uses than traditional cotton fabrics as they are more stable and offer higher levels of protection. The clothing can also be manufactured with micro-encapsulated vaccines and antibiotics.

                                        COSMETICS

Cosmofabrics – from a combination of fabrics and cosmetics via microencapsulation – is a fast-growing market. The nature of the WEAR&TOSS™ fabric makes it particularly suitable for containing active ingredients in the fibres (hydrating, repellent, deodorant etc) which are then released onto the skin in a controlled and progressive manner.

                                      CHARITIES

Large international charities like The Red Cross, UNICEF and the WFP deal on a daily basis with large-scale humanitarian emergencies often in remote locations where water or washing facilities are difficult to come by and effective sterilisation very hard to guarantee. WEAR&TOSS™ clothing, with a production line that can produce thousands of pieces in a very short time, is an effective solution to this problem.

                                     ACCESSORIES

Accessories can be produced for the automotive, household goods, sporting items, food and transport sectors.

                                     UNDERWEAR

Whether for business, study or pleasure the one thing you can’t do without on a trip is underwear. Undershirts, vests, lingerie and socks all take up space in the bag and then need to be washed. WEAR&TOSS™ is a practical alternative to traditional underwear, not just when travelling but also in everyday life.

                                     ISTITUTIONS

Large national and international institutions often need hygienic and safe equipment (canvas, blankets, accessories) and clothing items (uniforms, overalls, scrubs) which can be made available rapidly. WEAR&TOSS™ products provide a wide range of both finished and semi-finished products which require no washing or maintenance.

                                   MERCHANDISING

Promotional t-shirts that catch the eye and care for the environment. Companies and public bodies (hotels, restaurants, gyms, spas, museums, local government) will find WEAR&TOSS™ products can be used to support their communication strategies with personalised clothing itemsfor distribution at fairs, events, conventions etc.

W&T Brand Management

W&T is the main brand for the project which includes Wear&Toss™, T-Shirt Way™ and DayByDay™. Each of these products is different in type, sector and application. They are used to offer single-use clothing, accessories and semi-finished fabrics to families, companies and institutions. W&T is the part of the project dedicated to brand building and the development and co-ordinated, integrated expansion of each of the other brands.

The Wear&Toss™ brand presents a new family of ecological biodegradable fabrics derived from cutting-edge technological research. This has resulted in the registration of numerous international industrial trade marks in the sectors of materials, processes and know how.

With Wear&Toss™ products everyone, from new-born babies to pensioners, can have access to the most suitable clothing or accessory made from a disposable fabric, whenever necessary.

                                                         

DayByDay™ is the brand from the W&T project which aims to move into the mid-high end of the fashion market, a market governed by a single rule: what’s fashionable today will already be old tomorrow.

In this context the ecological disposable fabric used in Wear&Toss™ products is the ideal material for clothing items which should and must necessarily end their life within a single season.

The T-Shirt Way™ brand is used to promote a new type of shirt that goes beyond traditional cotton t-shirts both in terms of functionality and respect for the environment. It also comes at a very low price and with reduced packaging.

T-shirts carrying the T-Shirt Way™ brand will be widely distributed so as to reach traditional hypermarkets and shopping centres but also airports, railways, motorway service stations, post offices, stationers and tobacconists as well as at trade fairs and other events.


Goals

Each goal will be ‘unlocked’ as we surpass a certain funding threshold, as described below. Please help us spread the word, as achieving each level will help us accelerate our development and make the experience even better for all our supporters!


Project time line



Wear&Toss® in the press



FAQ

How much does a T-shirt cost exactly in the stores?

Our recommended retail price is 1.99$

Is it possible to wear and wash a T-shirt more than once?

A T-shirt can resist the rain and a couple of washes in cold water, including machine washing.

How is it possible to sell at such a low price?

Due to renewable raw material sources and highly automated processes in production, from blind stitched seams to innovative printing techniques.

What type of cloth is a T-shirt made of?

A T-shirt is made of a non-woven cloth (bonded fibres) using biodegradable fibres from renewable sources.

Is the cloth comfortable?

The cloth allows your skin to breathe, it is anti-static, smooth to the touch and it guarantees an excellent fit.

Is it convenient to buy a disposable T-shirt?

Let’s just consider the costs of maintenance of a classic cotton T-shirt from washing machine energy and water consumptions, to washing powders, and softeners, from drying to ironing, …). Let’s not forget also the cost of your time.

In how much time does a T-shirt decompose?

In normal conditions (indoor / outdoor) a T-shirt will completely decompose in 3 months.
story_txt:
Project summary
Wear&Toss™ means biodegradable,
sustainable clothing, economically and environmentally friendly, to be worn, to
be enjoyed, and to be disposed of responsibly and with no regrets.
Creativity is the economic
engine of the future and it is in everything we do at Wear & Toss® where
our customer is at the center of all we do.
Eco-Friendly is the
extraordinary element of innovation developed by Wear & Toss® for the
textile industry that has yet to find a truly efficient and effective solution to
the environmental impact of its products.
Sustainable Development means for the
textile industry sustainable, non-conventional products: 
1) The use of raw materials
derived from natural sources. 
2) By employing environmentally
responsible, simplified yet automated technological processes in the
construction of the garments.
Green Technology in the supply
chain and the processing of the Wear&Toss® cloth compared to the
traditional cotton supply chain, allows for considerable savings in terms of
resource use and the release of harmful substances into the environment,
representing the new frontier of eco-friendly clothing. In figures: - 85 % of
cultivated territories occupied, - 95% of the water required in the production
process, - 75% of carbon dioxide emissions, - 94% of chemicals used during the
entire production chain.
Economical A small price to
pay (approx. 2€ RRP per T-shirt) frees our customer from strong economic ties
to the item of clothing easing disposal. 
New Life Style A real revolution
in life style liberating the consumer from the cleaning cycle tasks; wash,
consumption, recycling.
Use the clothing
item’s life cycle is greatly reduced, dictated to mainly by the seasonality of
fashion, and the wear and tear and soiling of the item. The item’s low cost
favours repurchase.
Fast Fashion Wear&Toss® is
the simple solution for "Fast Fashion": In this age of unbridled
consumerism, what is new and original today, is old tomorrow. Wear & Toss®
has come up with the first example of biodegradable disposable clothing.
Packaging pocket-sized
packaging facilitates storage and transportation.
Free Time The washing
machine and iron are no longer necessary, thanks to Wear & Toss® clothing item’s
reduced life cycle giving you a substantial increase in free time, raising to
the nth degree those very concepts of wellness and renewal.
Applications The Wear &
Toss® technology can be applied in many sectors, from fashion to sport, from
work wear to military uses, from cosmetics to bio-medical, representing a great
opportunity to explore new markets and review so new ones. 
Competitors The economic
crisis, the lack of innovative textile products and the awareness and need of
"green" products are favourable to quick market entry and penetration.
Today, there is no direct competitor with a product with similar
characteristics.
We mean to make the brand
name Wear & Toss® a leader, unique and original, in eco-friendly textiles
and stay ahead of the competition.
The IdeaOften the best ideas come from looking at daily life from a new point of view. The Wear&Toss™ project started in August 2008 when Filippo De Martin, holidaying with his family, realised that an inexpensive single-use t-shirt was the solution to the problem of his kids clothes getting dirty and needing to be washed and/or the need to travel with a lot of changes. An ecological t-shirt that would be bought wherever you travel and which can be recycled after use.That was the moment the Wear&Toss™ project came to life, a project which is now fully under way and ready to meet and satisfy the needs of today’s consumer.Biodegradable Single-Use ClothingWear&Toss™ is a new concept for inexpensive ecological clothing designed to be worn and disposed of simply and quickly. The product is a genuine revolution in life style: wear-use-recycle.Wear SustainabilitySuitable for use in a range of sectors – fashion, sport, workwear, medical – the Wear&Toss™ project makes use of innovative materials and production techniques which reduce running costs while guaranteeing excellent quality and zero environmental impact.Fast fashion? Sustainable fast wear!In the era of right now and rampant consumerism what’s new and original today is already old tomorrow and ready to be changed. The W&T project is ahead of its time and leads the way to future consumer models by presenting the first biodegradable single-use clothing.         A new revolution Every revolution starts with a belief and the WEAR&TOSS™ project is, first of all, just this.  A belief based on an explosive concept that turns the status quo on its head and brings tomorrow’s dreams to life today. A discovery with a huge impact which will have an extraordinary effect on everyday life.Just like a work of art, it’s not simply the sum of its parts that makes this project so special. The WEAR&TOSS™ project isn’t just another disposable product or cheap clothing concept. It’s this but also much more. It’s not only one of the many alternatives on the market but a real alternative to the market, a genuine response to fast fashion.Think GreenIts ecological credentials are the first, most extraordinary, element of the innovation proposed by WEAR&TOSS™. While in other sectors the issue of the disastrous impact of its products on the environment has been faced, up to now this has not been true of the textile sector.WEAR&TOSS™ is aimed at a new generation of consumers who, becoming increasingly dissatisfied with traditional products, are making respect for both the environment and workers essential factors when selecting a product.
WEAR&TOSS™ is sensitive to both nature and society (and in a broader sense to urban planning, architecture, design etc.) as it follows balance and beauty via a perfect combination of history, culture and innovation which come together to create freedom of movement and emotion. The freedom to choose a unique eco-sustainable product that actively involves the consumer in its creation and development in all phases of its manufacture.More free timeAmong all the domestic appliances that fill our homes the one that has had the greatest impact is the washing machine. Why is this?After the second world war there was a time of immense growth and industrial rebirth so companies strived to come up with answers to the increasing demand for a better way of life by producing, among other things, a machine that would free the household of one of the most time-consuming tasks: washing clothes and linens. During these years existing washing machine models were improved in a way which also had a profound effect on the emancipation of women.But progress doesn’t stop and now the incredible innovation that was the washing machine is about to be surpassed by a revolution of no less significance, ecological single-use clothing.
Not just the washing machine but also the iron and the clotheshorse will become less important as disposable clothing items become more common. This in turn will lead to more free time, leading to an improvement in wellbeing and freedom in the same way as the washing machine did in the last century.Between Today and Tomorrow
The concept of sustainable development is based on a very precise aim, to improve economic and social conditions by integrating growth with a strong sense of environmental responsibility. The idea is to fulfill the demands of people today without compromising the ability of future generations to satisfy their needs.
Development models which work hand-in-hand with the environment, the economy and society as a whole can succeed only by promoting innovative production and consumer models that focus on utilising renewable resources, on the environmental impact of processes and on a careful analysis of the impact of these goods and services during their life-cycle.
                     Wear&Toss™ is committed to protecting the environment and to promoting responsible consumerism by introducing radical changes to the textile sector which range from providing unconventional products to advances in technology and processing. The project is aimed at a global evolution of the concept of “sustainable clothing”.Raw materialsWear&Toss™ is an innovative family of fabrics that use fibres taken from renewable sources such as cellulose, beetroot, corn starch and sugar cane.
Compared to traditional fibres taken from fossil fuels, the fibres used by W&T have excellent biodegradability and compostability properties which is why they can be considered the fibres of the future.These kinds of raw materials have already been used by some large commercial chains for the production of packaging and disposable plates, cups, gloves and clear plastic wrap.
ProcessThe production line and transformation of WEAR&TOSS™ fabrics is based on three key aspects: mechanisation, energy efficiency and respect for the environment.
The high level of mechanisation, capable of producing up to 100 items a minute, makes it economically viable to produce in loco and reduces the exploitation of workers from developing countries. The project also allows companies to reduce the enormous costs of international transport and therefore also the pollution it causes.
In the knowledge that the energy needs of a textile production company represent on average 30% to 50% of their total costs, W&T uses innovative technologies and machinery which use less energy and have zero environmental impact.DisposalThe most revolutionary characteristic of the 100% biodegradable WEAR&TOSS™ product is that it can be recycled or composted.
Biodegradability is the ability of organic substances and some materials to decompose and be assimilated by microorganisms (bacteria) in the soil so as to become part of the natural cycle once again. Compost is a collection of highly fertile organic substances which derive from the biodegrading of organic materials (waste).
In a very short time WEAR&TOSS™ clothing disposed of in the ground or through recycling centres decomposes into water and carbon dioxide, two elements which are essential in the chlorophyllic photosynthesis of green plants. This process therefore contributes to maintaining the ecological balanceof the planet.

Wear&Toss™ vs CottonIs cotton a natural fibre? Yes it is. Is it a sustainable fibre? Absolutely not. This is because it is produced using processes which are harmful both for the environment and for humanity.
The 25 million tonnes of cotton produced each year have an enormous impact because of the use of pesticides (10-20% of the total used in all forms of agriculture), water consumption (about 2000 litres of water for a t-shirt) and transportation-related pollution (use of fossil fuels and C02 emissions).Compared to the manufacturing processes used for cotton, the production line and transformation processes for the WEAR&TOSS™ fabric provide a significant saving in terms of the exploitation of natural resources and the production of harmful substances and therefore represent a new frontier in eco-sustainable clothing.Versatile ProductAs Wear&Toss™ fabric is made from a variety of fibre types it is suitable for use in a wide range of products. Extremely versatile and fully customizable, it is soft and light as well as very strong with excellent textile and mechanical properties.                                                         SINGLE-USENo more washing machines and irons. After use a Wear&Toss™product can be disposed of and recycled in the conventional way. The life-cycle of the item is very short.                                                     ECO SUSTAINABLEThese are totally biodegradable clothing items from a production line created based on high environmental consciousness.Wear&Toss™ products, made from raw materials such as cellulose and corn starch, respect both the natural and human resources used in their production.                                                        ISOTROPICWear&Toss™ fabric is isotropic which means that is maintains the same properties and physical characteristics in all directions. This means it allows the skin to breathe while limiting the build-up of sweat and promoting the rapid elimination of condensation.                                               ALLERGY-FREEThe solid compact structure of Wear&Toss™ products provides excellent protection of the skin against allergens produced by dust mites as they are very efficiently contained by the fabric.                                               MICROENCAPSULATIONThe Wear&Toss™ fabric is ideal for the insertion of microcapsules that provide added value to the product and increase potential areas of use. The microcapsules can be of a variety of types, in particular with perfumed, pharmaceutical or antiseptic properties.Infinite ApplicationsLight, comfortable and breathable, the WEAR&TOSS™ fabric is suitable for use in a wide range of sectors from fashion to sport, from workwear to military clothing, from cosmetics to the bio-medical sector, and represents a fantastic opportunity to exploit as-yet untapped markets or even to create new ones. The WEAR&TOSS™ fabric as a finished product can be manufactured with antibacterial, hydro-repellent, fire-resistant, and UV protection properties and therefore effectively responds to the needs of a diverse range of consumers (private, corporate or institutional).                                          FASHIONIn the Fashion sector where things are constantly changing the WEAR&TOSS™ fabric is absolutely ideal as it embodies the essential values on which the fashion sector is founded: seasonality and speed. story:
THANKS FOR YOUR SUPPORT! For a limited time you can still purchase a Mudra at our IndieGoGo prices by choosing your "perk."

We often think of jewelry as purely decorative. It’s pretty, it sparkles, it communicates taste. What if jewelry had holistic properties? What if jewelry could enhance your wellbeing?

Here at Kali Zoe Designs, we think about how unique jewelry designs can promote health. So we’ve made the Mudra. The Mudra applies pressure to the LI4 pressure point (that soft spot between your thumb and forefinger), a spot that is commonly known to alleviate headaches, pain, and stress throughout the body.

How Does the Mudra Work?

Slip the Mudra on to either hand. It relieves stress and is instantly relaxing. The pressure of the metal and stone is applied to a point on the body where nerves, muscles and ligaments come together. Endorphins, which act as natural painkillers, are released to the brain. No need to wear it all the time - it will do the trick after 10 minutes. 

Tell Me More!

It’s Innovative.

Kali Zoe Designs takes beautiful jewelry a step further. Our design is unique; never before have you seen a beautiful jewelry accessory that functions to enhance your well-being in addition to your aesthetic experience. It is jewelry with a job.

It’s Resilient.

Like the stones and metals it is made of, the Mudra will stand the test of time. It is cast in your choice of solid sterling silver or bronze and will always shine for you. Place the thumb clamp back in its firm burlap case between uses to keep it safe and handy. 

It’s Easy.

We wish we could have someone applying pressure to our hands at this point at all times - whether a friend, acupuncturist, massage therapist or ourselves… but hey, that’s not realistic. Use the Mudra for the same effects, wherever you are, whenever you’d like.

It’s Powerful.

Wearing the Mudra reminds you that you hold the power and agency to control your own wellness. It can also serve to alleviate a breadth of symptoms. The World Health Organization released a report that shows acupuncture effectively treats 31 symptoms, diseases and conditions over many studies. Our piece, the Mudra touches on the LI4 point. 

According to acupressure principles, pressure on the LI 4 point alleviates:

  • headaches and migraines 
  • mouth and toothaches
  • carpal tunnel issues 
  • digestive issues 
  • stress

It’s a Constant Reminder.

Most jewelry pieces have strong memories attached and are markers of events and time. Create a meaningful marker to honor your body and mind with the Mudra.

What is Acupressure?

Over 5,000 years ago the Chinese discovered that pressing certain points on the body relieved pain where it occurred and also benefited parts of the body that were more distant from the pressure point. Everyone, at some point, has used his or her hands to hold tense or painful points on the body (think: temples for headache).

Acupressure is the use of pressure (rather than needles, as used in acupuncture) on intentional points on the body to promote self-healing and reduce pain. There are many scientific studies from sources such as the World Health Organization and National Institute of Health that confirm the benefits of this Traditional Chinese Medicine technique.

How is the Mudra Made?

We start by hand; we end by hand.

 We sketch out our designs on paper and then model them on the computer. Digital 3D models become wax molds we sand and carve in our studio. Next, we work closely with local casting experts at Creative World Casting to turn a wax model into solid metal. We hand polish each Mudra and manually set each stone. We will also offer the reward of customized Mudras with decorative stones. 

At Kali Zoe Designs we love the process and obsess over every detail. We use ethically-sourced materials, keep production as locally-sourced as possible and choose each of our stones (such as turquoise, moonstone, topaz, garnet, amethyst, jade, hematite, rose quartz, moonstone, malachite, aquamarine, tourmaline, citrine, lapis, and tiger’s eye) by hand. 

We hope you find as much joy in choosing and wearing your own perfect piece(s), as we find joy in making them.

 What does “Mudra” Mean?

You may be familiar with some of the different hand positions used to set intention and focus at the beginning of yoga class - anjali mudra at the heart center or maybe chin mudra during a seated meditation. These gestures are called mudras, which is a Sanskrit word that means “seal.”

While we constantly use our hands throughout the day, in yoga, martial arts and many cultures’ dance traditions, the hands are considered particularly important energetic centers. In fact, in Ayurveda and traditional Chinese medicine, each finger is associated with specific organs, which helps us to regulate our health.

Additionally, the hands have an intimate connection with our brains, both through neural activity and mindful cognition. The way we hold our hands can influence how we guide our minds. This is why yogis have practiced hand mudras. Mudras are the perfect instrument to prepare the mind for meditation, since the mind follows the habits of the body.

About Kalí Zoë Designs

Kalí Zoë Designs, founded by sisters Callie and Arianna Spiros, is a jewelry design studio dedicated to holistic and theraputic intentions in wearable design. The studio is a testing ground for ideas they have acquired from diverse education such as The School of the Art Institute of Chicago, Tulane University, ISHTA Yoga and Sivananda Yoga.

It was only natural for these sisters to turn this passion project into a company, with the support of their educational institutions, entrepreneurial fellowship (Future Founders of Chicago) and family. They lived and worked on development of Kali Zoe Designs at a yoga ashram and studied meditation and yoga philosophy with global experts in meditation and Eastern philosophy. They also traveled to the Tucson Gem and mineral show to hand select the most amazing stones to decorate your jewelry, and relish every opportunity to learn more about jewelry design and manufacturing from local craftsmen and fine jewelry experts.

Now Chicago-based, Kalí Zoë Designs is excited about the launch of their very first product, the Mudra, here on indiegogo. After indiegogo they will continue to sell the Mudra on their website, and in a wide array of boutiques and stores while developing and manufacturing their next exciting jewelry designs.

Thank you family, thank you friends (new and old), thank you mentors, thank you yogis, and thank YOU!

Credits and thank you to John Lawrence Geary for his amazing music skills and to Sara Fisch for her above-and-beyond graphic design skills. 

Risks and challenges

We create each piece with our combined 4 hands from start to finish, with the slight exception of the translation from wax mold to metal. With this said, we have great control over the timing and potential risks of fulfilling your order.

This material and content is not intended to be medical advice, nor is it intended to be a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis or treatment of any individual and his or her particular health ailment or circumstance. You should consult your medical care provider with any specific medical questions. The Mudra should not be worn by women who are pregnant. The author does not guarantee that the information contained herein is in every respect accurate or complete.
story_txt:
THANKS FOR YOUR SUPPORT! For a limited time you can still purchase a Mudra at our IndieGoGo prices by choosing your "perk."We often think of jewelry as purely decorative. It’s pretty, it sparkles, it communicates taste. What if jewelry had holistic properties? What if jewelry could enhance your wellbeing?Here at Kali Zoe Designs, we think about how unique jewelry designs can promote health. So we’ve made the Mudra. The Mudra applies pressure to the LI4 pressure point (that soft spot between your thumb and forefinger), a spot that is commonly known to alleviate headaches, pain, and stress throughout the body.

How Does the Mudra Work?
Slip the Mudra on to either hand. It relieves stress and is instantly relaxing. The pressure of the metal and stone is applied to a point on the body where nerves, muscles and ligaments come together. Endorphins, which act as natural painkillers, are released to the brain. No need to wear it all the time - it will do the trick after 10 minutes. 


Tell Me More!
It’s Innovative.
Kali Zoe Designs takes beautiful jewelry a step further. Our design is unique; never before have you seen a beautiful jewelry accessory that functions to enhance your well-being in addition to your aesthetic experience. It is jewelry with a job.


It’s Resilient.
Like the stones and metals it is made of, the Mudra will stand the test of time. It is cast in your choice of solid sterling silver or bronze and will always shine for you. Place the thumb clamp back in its firm burlap case between uses to keep it safe and handy. 


It’s Easy.
We wish we could have someone applying pressure to our hands at this point at all times - whether a friend, acupuncturist, massage therapist or ourselves… but hey, that’s not realistic. Use the Mudra for the same effects, wherever you are, whenever you’d like.


It’s Powerful.

story:
Playful Kinetic Shoes

PK Shoes has been created by French people living in Hong Kong and specialized in manufactoring in Asia.

After producing goods for many brands, we have decided to build our own. 

This campaign will allow us to launch our first production and set up marketing and commercial tools in order to develop properly the brand in Hong Kong and France first.

Indeed, we already have a distribution network willing to purchase the brand, only the stock is missing...

PK Shoes are very light, breathable (mesh material), comfortable (reinforced insole), cool design and vivid colors. they are machine washable.

Compared to competition, the price is much cheaper, USD 40 for a pair in retail store.

If you contribute now, you will pay only USD 20 a pair, discount 50% !! (transport included)

If we don't receive the 30 000 USD don't worry we will make a special production just for our contributors.

If you have any questions or inquiries, feel free to contact us via our facebook page: www.facebook.com/PKshoes

story:
Short Summary

My name is Kelly a senior at Missouri State University majoring in Fashion Merchandising. The fashion Merchandising and Design Program at MSU, hosts an annual spring fashion show in April showcasing original designs of the fashion students, featuring the Senior Collection's original 5-7 piece collection. Since 2003, the merchandising students have produced the annual fashion show, but also start with a zero line budget. Through the course of 14 weeks, 32 fashion merchandise student's will work to raise over $10,000 to produce the fashion show. Producing this annual fashion show allows students a real world simulation, utilizing PR, Visual, and Styling skills learned in the classroom, allowing for students to build their portfolio as they approach graduation and secure a successful position in fashion.

This year's theme is Discover 2013. We are asking for your help and support, with your generous contributions the money raised will help support this student endeavor, and allow for the production of this New York rival fashion show. Our hope is to also award the fashion and design students with scholarship opportunities from the monies raised for the event.  

What We Need & What You Get

The show's budget is $10,000 to produce Discover 2013. For this campaign our goal is $1,000. The $1,000 will go towards expenses such as rental of the facility, runway lighting, DJ, along with other show costs.

As a contributor to the Discover 2013 fashion show you will be awarded many perks based on your contribution. All contributors will receive an advertisement at the show for over 1,000 guests in attendance. Over 1,000 guests in attendance will see your generosity. Other perks include free tickets to the show, free t-shirts, and even priority seating.

The merchandising students at Missouri State are hoping to exceed our $10,000 goal with your help.

The Impact

Exceeding our goal will allow us the opportunity to give back to the students in our department through scholarship opportunities to help them in the future. Over the past 10 years the students have raised just enough money to cover the expenses to produce the fashion show. We would like to change that this year!

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand not everyone is able to contribute at this time but if you could help us spread the word to all of your friends and family we would be very appreciative. Please use the Indiegogo share tools to tell everyone about the 2013 Discover fashion show! Thank you again and we really appreciate everyone in this campaign.
