story:
They are elegant.
They are made of paper.
They are playful.  
They are artistic.   
They are made in Italy.    
They are even washable!

About The Project

In 2010, we've begun to dream of an object in which concrete all our passions and work experiences. And as we have done lots and lots of things over the years, now we present you a bag with many and many features:

Culture 

It is where everything comes out from.
We respect the people who worked with us and the people who would support us. What it comes out are loved items with an elegant and innovative design, finished in each details.

Eco-sustainability

No leather employed, but cellulose fiber! 
A fine paper incredibly resistant, ductile and warm, washable at 30°. The other materials are cotton, brass, and a microfiber similar to velvet. Nothing more, nothing less. 
To get more info, visit our site at this page.

Exclusivity & the Worldwide Famous Made in Italy

The manufacturing is located in Bologna (Emilia-Romagna), where Gamberini Italia has also been conceived. The very skilled local craftsmen handmade cut and sew each textiles, work and impress brass, and finally number the Gamberini Italia bags.

Play

The cherry on the top is the appliqué, which make our bags very personal: play with them and you'll get thousands of bags in one! Through the system of the appliqué-holder, three easy moves would be enough to change your Gamberini Italia and reflect your mood and yourself.

Art

The appliqué are high-quality prints with works made by Italian artists or with icons of Italian culture. Italy offers so many pieces of art that the choice has been both hard and thrilling! Take a look in here. Like them? Want more? Be ready because every year new appliqué  will come out for an endless play and an exciting “fashion-artistic” collection!  



Why Indiegogo and How Does This Work?

Crowdfunding has revolutionized and democratized the system of idea development: now it is you to allow an idea to come through, if you find it good and inspiring. 
Indiegogo represents our and Gamberini Italia's first move toward the real world market. And you, before anyone else, will tell us if our project is worthwhile as we do believe.
Will you give us a kick to start?
For the next 30 days, you'll be able to make pledges helping to support this project, ranging from $1 to whatever you can afford without going broke or having to divorce. You can select one of the perks on the right, corresponding to the amount you wish to donate. This means you're not only awesome: you are also receiving stuff as proof of that!


Rewards & Shipping Costs

In exchange for your support, you'll be able to choose between all the items of collection Anteprima and also other many accessories, all very elegant and balanced. They're all listed on the right and shown below, so pick your favourite and remember that Collection Anteprima is Indiegogo Limited Edition - now or never!


Gamberini Italia - Collection Anteprima is 

                 Zòja: the Jewel – a refined “everynight” pochette
                 Bavóll': the Bauletto – the classical and new totebag
                 Maravaje: the Marvel – the elegant and functional everyday bag

    These three bags can't go without the appliqué. Choose your favourite one among the series below and we'll give you two secret too.

  • Réclame: “Grani di Sanità”, “Città di Fano”, “Veneto e Agrumi”.
    The three images of this series comes from the Bertarelli Archive of Milan, where many and many original posters are kept safe, holding the history of Italian style of the last centuries.

  • Fut: “Magellanic” and “King”.
    Fut is nobody else than Fabio Gamberini, one of the three people behind Gamberini Italia. The idea of these drawings was born from a childysh memory linked to the doctors' lounges, where pictures of flora and fauna were always welcoming you in Italy.

  • Contemporary Italian Artists: “La Minipini”, “Bebosoho”, “Marco About”. Three illustrations by three artists operating within Italy. Each one has his/her own style and thought. If you'd like to know more about them, look at the bottom of their appliqué or write us!

We decided to add to the perks' amount the average shipping cost without leaving it to you. They are damned insane, but this is the best we found in terms of price and security of delivery...  We report below how much they are just to be clear with you:

  • Europe                      $ 47,00 
  • North America          $ 54,00
  • Russia                      $ 61,00
  • South America         $ 74,00
  • Asia & Oceania        $ 81,00

The high cost of shipping made us decide to limit the lowest perks to Italy, otherwise the dispatch would cost more than the item itself. So Anna, the coin purse, and Sara, the shopper, are choosable just by people residing in Italy.
We are sorry for that. 

What We Need 

We're hoping to raise $15,000 to pay for the cost of perks' manufacturing (around 32-33%), the (insane) shipping costs (around 22%), cover the Indiegogo fees (that will take 4% if we reach the goal, or 9% if we don't) and the PayPal/bank fees (that will take between 3 and 5%).

What's left will be between the 36 and the 39% of the goal. It would be an important thing: many of happy you will be carrying our bags around the world, we will be happily enthusiastic because Gamberini Italia met your endorsement, our collaborator Giulia will be rewarded with happiness and extra-money, and perhaps we could afford a real website, the meeting place for our activities, the artists, and the public. But still, it won’t be a fortune as you can imagine...

Therefore, we have already been thinking of a stretch goal: $47,500! 
In this way, we will have almost $18,000: more Gamberini Italia items for you, more satisfaction for us, money for Giulia, money for a good website, money for paying the office rents and bills, and money to fund the artists' creativity and the research for sustainable materials!

The money won't cover any of our costs in the making of collection Anteprima: we have already happily paid for it out of our own pockets. And we are not trying to make a profit either: that will come later on, when we'll be launching the first collection the next year.

If you still have questions, don't be afraid to ask: you find us on Facebook, Twitter, Pinterest, Youtube and on this mail: info@gamberinitalia.it. 

Let the word blow up! 

Even if you're unable to contribute, you can still make a huge difference and help us to make Gamberini Italia happen by spreading the word about this campaign.
Please follow us in our socials: Facebook, Twitter, Pinterest, Youtube and use the share tools at the top of this page to post, pin, tweet, e-mail, and let people know about Gamberini Italia. You can even embed our campaign in your website or blog and that would be really great!  
And if you or some of your friends would like to write an article or a post for blog, magazine, newspaper or whatsoever, we are totally at your service. 



Who is Gamberini Italia?

Three are the main heads behind Gamberini Italia.
Ilenia Gamberini is the chief lady: she is primarily an event curator, but from time to time she is a manager, a designer, a website developer, a PR, a modelist, a mum and a friend. Well, she is THE multitasking skill of women. Her dedication and her smile are her secret weapons.
Marco Landini is like the bearing wall that it is not much noticed, but without it everything falls down. Calm and reflective, his main work is building houses and running a natural and ecological farm; his word and advice never failed to hit a bull's eye.
Fabio Gamberini has been like swallowed up inside Gamberini Italia by Marco and Ilenia, by his expertise which perfectly filled a void, and not least by his very suitable surname. His skills and experiences as an artist and graphic designer are perceived far and wide in the project, and so are his laugh and love of life.


And many other are the people who took or still take part to the construction of Gamberini Italia: Monica, Sarah and Laura, three PR scattered between Italy, China and USA; Maria Pia, Alberto e Marco, the three artists; Ramiro, Giulia and Arianna, three photographers with a different sensitivity; GiuliaSara – a duo of colleagues which has become one in the making of stopmotion videos; L.UN.A., the art university where GiuliaSara comes from, which support us in many ways; Guadalupe and Trinidad, two spanish girls interested in marketing and fashion blogs; Virginia, Paula and Sofia from Argentina involved in design and research of images; Gadoev and Halldis, two friendly company: one makes the video, the other offers the location in Bologna; Martina, an Italian artist and the model of the video; and in the end Fabiola and Giulia which wrote this and many other tests! 


Take part in the future of Gamberini Italia!

story:
Desmond is a 12-year old rising 8th grader who is a unique young fellow in many ways. Even though he was born with a rare birth defect which resulted in having his left leg amputated above knee at 9 months old, his determination to do ALL things has never prevented him from doing anything his heart desires.

As an avid lover of sports, he began playing various sports at a very early age with able-bodied kids.  But once we were able to get him a running leg ($20,000) through the assistance of a grant, Desmond found his true love in track in field. His new running leg allowed him to run like everybody else. He started out with 60m races and soon advanced to much more. He now runs the 100m, 200m, and 400m, along with field activities which include throwing the discus, shot put, javelin and the long jump. With track and field as his passion, he's been successful in setting national records. The National Junior Disability Championship Games is where Desmond competes and he's been successful in setting records, however Desmond wants more.

Take a look at this video: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kgsagEG2uFg

Desmond really wants to attend the Paralympic Games in London to witness this remarkable event first hand. He feels that attending an event like this could take his dream & drive to the next level.  He could see Paralympians compete in his favorite sports and possibly meet with some of these elite athletes. Many times Paralympians take the time to speak with emerging talent like Desmond hoping to inspire them even more. As a Paralympic Hopeful, he believes he will be ready to compete at the 2016 Paralympics in Rio de Janeiro making him possibly the youngest amputee to compete in certain events. This is why attending the games in London could be a huge motivator for him on this journey.

We’re hoping you could possibly help send Desmond to London this year. Event tickets, along with airfare and hotel are quite expensive (average $3500 for both of us) and financially challenging for us right now.  Therefore, your help would be greatly appreciated.
 
Lastly, Desmond tried out for this track team this year and he made it! Not only did he make history by becoming the 1st amputee to compete in middle school sports in Durham, N.C., but he also competed in the Regional Championships helping his team win the championship. It took a lot of courage to run before hundreds of spectators, none of whom look like him, but he did it with pride. He also hopes that he inspired other students with disabilities to get off the sideline and into the game...just like he did!

Thanks for taking the time to read about his journey. We know he’s destined for greatness, but with your help, hopefully we can help get him to the next level!
story_txt:
Desmond is a 12-year old rising 8th grader who is a unique young fellow in many ways. Even though he was born with a rare birth defect which resulted in having his left leg amputated above knee at 9 months old, his determination to do ALL things has never prevented him from doing anything his heart desires. As an avid lover of sports, he began playing various sports at a very early age with able-bodied kids.  But once we were able to get him a running leg ($20,000) through the assistance of a grant, Desmond found his true love in track in field. His new running leg allowed him to run like everybody else. He started out with 60m races and soon advanced to much more. He now runs the 100m, 200m, and 400m, along with field activities which include throwing the discus, shot put, javelin and the long jump. With track and field as his passion, he's been successful in setting national records. The National Junior Disability Championship Games is where Desmond competes and he's been successful in setting records, however Desmond wants more. Take a look at this video:  http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kgsagEG2uFg Desmond really wants to attend the Paralympic Games in London to witness this remarkable event first hand. He feels that attending an event like this could take his dream & drive to the next level.  He could see Paralympians compete in his favorite sports and possibly meet with some of these elite athletes. Many times Paralympians take the time to speak with emerging talent like Desmond hoping to inspire them even more. As a Paralympic Hopeful, he believes he will be ready to compete at the 2016 Paralympics in Rio de Janeiro making him possibly the youngest amputee to compete in certain events. This is why attending the games in London could be a huge motivator for him on this journey. We’re hoping you could possibly help send Desmond to London this year. Event tickets, along with airfare and hotel are quite expensive (average $3500 for both of us) and financially challenging for us right now.  Therefore, your help would be greatly appreciated.
 
Lastly, Desmond tried out for this track team this year and he made it! Not only did he make history by becoming the 1st amputee to compete in middle school sports in Durham, N.C., but he also competed in the Regional Championships helping his team win the championship. It took a lot of courage to run before hundreds of spectators, none of whom look like him, but he did it with pride. He also hopes that he inspired other students with disabilities to get off the sideline and into the game...just like he did! Thanks for taking the time to read about his journey. We know he’s destined for greatness, but with your help, hopefully we can help get him to the next level!

story:
AVERY BY WANG started out of designer Annching Wang’s frustration looking for the perfect, button-down shirt – what should’ve been a simple task turned out to be more labouring. With growing conscious values coming at odds with her fashion conscious self, she couldn’t quite figure out why, when our worlds are overbrimming with “stuff”, she couldn’t find a simple, Lauren Bacall-worthy shirt. In a world of too much and too fast, the search for the essential, of the pared down, was the start of a search for freedom through style – and Avery was born as a way to refresh the timeless tailored heritage of the menswear inspired shirt with new values of sustainability, play, and self expression.

THE CONCEPT
I am launching a capsule collection that consists of only 4 pieces. It is my response at reframing the world of design, so that we aren’t creating collections of junk and filler pieces, but instead thinking consciously about each individual item so that each is designed with care and heart. I want my clothes to make people look and feel good, using basic pieces to act as the building blocks of a wardrobe that express personal style and values.

THE PIECES
#1: RICHARD: The classic dress-up, dress-down shirt for everyday.

#2: JAMES: A polished version of the perennial tank top.

#3: HENRY: In short or long, this is the summer dress that you can layer, take from day to night, and go from casual to sophisticated.

#4: ALEXANDER: Inspired by the boyfriend shirt, this is the relaxed, so comfortable it’s like putting on PJs blousey shirt-dress.

DESIGN DETAILS
Design is a thoughtful process that with clothing requires a blend of artistry and engineering. Some of the details I'm incorporating into the pieces are pockets in dresses, a conscious effort to eliminate extraneous details that serve no purpose (aesthetic or utilitarian), and flattering, tailored cuts. The fabrics used are natural fibres - ranging from crisp 100% organic cotton poplins to organic cotton and hemp blends, to exclusive custom designed prints in cotton-silk. All pieces are manufactured locally in Canada, and are made to order to minimize waste and overstock. 
 

THE "BLOOM" PRINT
“The light of dawn has secrets to tell you”, a spin-off of the poem by Rumi, is the concept behind the debut collection for AVERY. Inspired by new beginnings, it’s fresh, light, and happy - a conscious act of defiance against an industry that often sells based on feelings of insecurity and false aspiration.

“Bloom” is an organic meets digital rendering of a spring/summer floral that is both raw and fluid, with a literal take on the phrase "the crack of dawn". This is where one world meets the next, where possibility fills into our lives with energy and beauty. As the first exclusive print designed for AVERY, it is only fitting that it is based on the concept of fresh starts.

MISSION
Design: I believe in living colorfully, and I love to play with ideas and color in my designs. I believe that design must be inspired. And I believe that emotional connection is vital in any act of creation. I treat my work like art that needs to be practical - to me, that intersection between beauty and utility is design.
Progress: I’m trying to progress towards a more ethical way of designing and producing fashion - 80% of the fabrics used in the debut collection are sustainable, and all are natural fibres. I print all my exclusively designed custom prints in a process that uses eco-friendly water-based pigment inks on natural fibres with no added chemicals.
Timelessness: These are clothes that grow with you, and won’t feel dated in a few years, as I found was the problem with many of the clothes I’ve bought over the years. I am now a firm believer that less is more, allowing people as individuals to form their own personal expression of style through the building blocks of timeless pieces.

WHO IS AVERY?
The woman I design for loves life, but maybe her bland or outdated clothes don't show it. Or maybe she loves clothes, but she wants to live more consciously. She might be aiming to step back from fast fashion, and closer to something that aligns with her growing sustainable values, and not just in terms of fabric, but in design as well. And she's sick of eco being beige, unpolished, and seemingly only appropriate for weekend wear or her workout. Maybe she's always complaining about not having anything to wear even though she has a closet full of stuff, or maybe she's feeling her sense of style start to drown with the sheer amount of choice we have out there. AVERY was designed to bridge the gap for these women, between their selves, styles, lifestyles, and values. To be honest, AVERY was designed with me in mind. I am that girl. And I know she might be you too. Or someone you know (if you happen to be of the male gender). 

WHEN DO WE GET TO SEE THE ACTUAL CLOTHES?
I'm currently in the pre-production phase, and am expecting samples to arrive over January and February, with a proposed timeline to finish being mid-February. I urge you to stay connected if what I'm doing piques your interest via Facebook or by joining the email list, as I'll be sending exclusive updates of the collection and campaign as things start becoming more concrete, including sharing photos and videos of the actual samples, as well as the mock-ups for rewards mid-way through the campaign. 

YOUR CONTRIBUTION

I've been saving up to launch this thing ever since I graduated from fashion school, but I know that lack of cash flow especially in the early stages is one of the top reasons businesses fail. Your contribution will help offset the costs of producing this first collection, including sourcing, pre-production and manufacturing costs. I'm saving money by doing all marketing and design myself, and working from my home studio. For the next collection, I am planning a fuller capsule collection of about 8 pieces with 2 exclusive prints, and that will require a larger initial investment, which I am planning for. So I need your help in offsetting the cost of this collection, and to show that there is a need for this kind of vision in the fashion industry.

Contributions start at $5, and comes with a perk ("reward") which you can view on the right (and many of them are exclusive to this campaign!), so that I can show you my appreciation for helping me get AVERY off the ground. 

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

HELP SPREAD THE WORD + LINKS TO CHECK OUT
1. I’m @AnnchingWang on Twitter (say hi!). If you want to help spread the word about this campaign, feel free to copy and paste the tweets below:

@AnnchingWang is launching a sustainable fashion line via @IndieGoGo. Get in on the dream: http://bit.ly/launchavery

@AnnchingWang’s itty-bitty collection of timeless inspired clothes is launching soon - make it happen on @IndieGoGo: http://bit.ly/launchavery  

I want my clothes to be better designed, inspired, and work for my lifestyle. Do you?

http://bit.ly/launchavery (CC: @AnnchingWang + @IndieGoGo)


2. Keep up to date by joining AVERY's Facebook page. You can like it for updates, behind-the-scenes peeks, and to join a budding community where style and substance live in synergy. 

3. If you have a blog or website, you can help spread the word by writing about this. (I'm accepting requests for all interviews!) And yes, I have lots of things to say about dream chasing, fashion, design, and entrepreneurship. If you'd like to get in touch for an interview either about this campaign specifically or about AVERY, I'd love to hear from you. Please email all inquiries to me directly at hello@averybywang.com.

Last but not least, our website will be fully live in mid-March, though you can head on over right now to learn more about us and read our blog. 

Thank you for your time - and remember, every bit counts, so please share this if what I'm doing resonates with you so that other people can learn about it too!

I hope you’ll join me in the journey in bringing this fashion dream to life. See you on the other side!

story:
WHAT IS PURPLEDIRT?  

PurpleDirt is a collective of artists and organizers based in Nicaragua and Canada that believe fashion is a platform for social enrichment and change. Our mission is to support Nicaraguan artisans striving for an end to poverty in Nicaragua. We create distinct, expressive jewelry using raw materials from Nicaragua and up-cycled materials from Canada and donate proceeds back into the community.

Our work draws on a tradition of Nicaraguan artists, musicians and writers who believe their art can provide a foundation for a better country. 

ROOTS

PurpleDirt is the brain child of organizer Erin Walker. Travelling through the old colonial city of Granada, she met talented and passionate craft artisans working in the market stalls. They made and sold handmade pieces that were simple, but imaginative and playful. They used common materials such as leather, wire and wood to create pieces uniquely Nicaraguan.

The artisans explained that, in Nicaragua, they were limited to selling their pieces on the main streets of local towns and cities to provide for themselves and their families. Their income is highly dependent on tourists and very unpredictable. They work with worn and rusted tools on inexpensive materials that were sourced locally.  Erin became interested in creating an organization to help them expand their skillset and earn steadier incomes so they could support their families and afford finer tools and materials.  

PurpleDirt not only supports the artisans and their families, but a  portion of each sale goes towards ending violence, hunger and disease in a country that has been stricken by political turmoil.

HELP US GROW

This fall, Mellinda-Mae Harlingten, head designer of Bones and Stones, will be heading down to Nicaragua to work with Nicaraguan artisans and co-create a line of jewelry inspired by humanity and love.

Your investment will go towards building a sustainable partnership with the Nicaraguan artisans, purchasing raw materials and creating our seasonal inventory with a portion of the proceeds donated to FINCA.

Help us raise the funds to support our PurpleDirt Jewelry Community Grow-Ops.

WHY NICARAGUA?

Nicaragua is one of the poorest countries in Latin America. From 1980 to 1990, the country was embattled in a civil war that precipitated an economic collapse in 1987. Today, unemployment is widespread and half the population lives below the poverty line - many on less than $1 American per day. Amongst the nation’s poorest, clean water is scarce and only 1 in 5 households have access to electricity. As in many developing countries, this poverty is concentrated among women.


WHERE ARE THE PROCEEDS GOING?

Our first partnership is with FINCA. FINCA provides financial services to the world's lowest-income entrepreneurs so they can create jobs, build assets and improve their standard of living.Many are single mothers who provide the sole source of income for their families. Most clients are storeowners, but their businesses also include manufacturing, services, farming, and fishing.

WHAT IS MICRO FINANCING?

In the most fundamental terms, microfinance is the brilliantly simple idea that small loans and other financial services, made available to individuals at the local level, can add up to big changes, globally, for billions of people.   For most poor people in the developing world, access to traditional financial services is simply not an option. Microfinance organizations, like FINCA, make small loans available to these hardworking individuals so the can begin, or expand, small businesses, and seek to improve their families’ quality of life. A steady income can allow a family to eat more often and add more nutritious foods to their diet; make improvements to their home; access healthcare services when needed; and, most importantly, keep children in school, an almost certain guarantee of a future lived outside of extreme poverty.  In addition, as these small businesses grow, they often create jobs for other family members and neighbors, fostering community-wide economic vitality, and helping boost developing economies worldwide.

HOW YOUR DONATION GROWS

On average, each dollar donated to FINCA International results in 3 loans being made with it in the first year. Each program participant usually repays his or her loan within four months. And each loan provides start up capital that will support a family that averages five people.

So each dollar given by generous donors like you touches the lives of hundreds of people in subsequent years. 


YOUR PERKS

PLEDGE BELIEVE: $300 and get your choice of ANY 5 bracelets plus 10% off all future orders! 

***************************************************************************************

PLEDGE BALANCE: $150 and get your choice of 3 of the bracelets below


******************************************************************************************

PLEDGE BEAUTY OF NATURE: $80 and get your choice of 3 of the bracelets below

*****************************************************************************************

PLEDGE GROWTH: $60 and get your choice of 3 of the bracelets below or

PLEDGE COMMUNITY: $40 and get your choice of one of the bracelets below

Silver Clasps: 

Gold Clasps:

story:
These days it can feel like our country has come to a boiling point. Common decency and love seem often to be eclipsed by hateful language and outright violence.

 

That’s why now more than ever, we need to band together. We need to rise above hate and show solidarity of love in action. We need to shine a light on the goodness of those around us.

Let’s love one another and prove, with our actions and our words, that Love Trumps Hate.

As an early contributor, you’ll not only help us cover the cost of getting the Love Trumps Hate bands made, but will also help us make a powerful donation to charitable organizations that work to overcome hate: 50% of our profits will go to the Southern Poverty Law Center*, an organization that thwarts the forces of hatred and prejudice that victimize our friends around the world.

 

 

*About the Southern Poverty Law Center: The SPLC battles racial and social injustice, working to undo the pain caused by the hundreds of active hate groups in the United States. They do so by teaching tolerance, fighting hate, and seeking justice for victims of hate crimes. They’re dedicated to fighting for immigrant justice, children’s rights, economic justice, LGBT rights and criminal justice reform. Learn more about their valiant efforts at splcenter.org.

story:
Hey y’all! I’m about to start working on a zine I’ve been daydreaming about for a minute - MISTERSISTER, a fashion mag devoted to redefining beauty through andro self expression… And I need your help! 

MISTERSISTER: issue one’s working title is currently “CRUELER THAN CRUELLA//MORE MAGNIFICENT THAN MALEFICENT” and will feature vampy photo spreads of lots of villainously radiant queer/trans folk from good-old North Texas with make up and styling done by your’s truly! But that’s not all - here’s what else you can expect out of the first issue of MISTERSISTER:

  • various bouts of dysphoria driven poetry
  • Tips on binding safely
  • cheap alternatives to cosmetics including skin/hair care
  • Interviews with queer/transgender Texas-based artists and musicians including the power couple behind Wiving, a Denton duo with heavy percussion, warping bass guitar, and vocals to eat your own heart out to
  • And MUCH, MUCH MORE
If you're got some change to spare, please toss it our way! Your cash will help with the expensive process of making and distributing a home-made cisnormativity-free beauty mag in color. Every cent is appreciated! Even if you can't donate, be on the look out for MISTERSISTER: crueler than Cruella//more magnificent than Maleficent coming soon to a queer punk's living room zine library near you!
story_txt:
Hey y’all! I’m about to start working on a zine I’ve been daydreaming about for a minute - MISTERSISTER, a fashion mag devoted to redefining beauty through andro self expression… And I need your help! MISTERSISTER: issue one’s working title is currently “CRUELER THAN CRUELLA//MORE MAGNIFICENT THAN MALEFICENT” and will feature vampy photo spreads of lots of villainously radiant queer/trans folk from good-old North Texas with make up and styling done by your’s truly! But that’s not all - here’s what else you can expect out of the first issue of MISTERSISTER:
various bouts of dysphoria driven poetry

Tips on binding safely

cheap alternatives to cosmetics including skin/hair care
Interviews with queer/transgender Texas-based artists and musicians including the power couple behind Wiving, a Denton duo with heavy percussion, warping bass guitar, and vocals to eat your own heart out to
And MUCH, MUCH MORE

If you're got some change to spare, please toss it our way! Your cash will help with the expensive process of making and distributing a home-made cisnormativity-free beauty mag in color. Every cent is appreciated! Even if you can't donate, be on the look out for MISTERSISTER: crueler than Cruella//more magnificent than Maleficent coming soon to a queer punk's living room zine library near you!

story:
Short Summary

  • Hi I am a gamer, maker and full time geek. I have been into gaming and geekery since I got my first 486 (computer with the power of a tamagotchi) and remember playing Xonix and Digger before the time color screens and 3D graphics
The geek world out there is HUGE and I want to bring a small slice of that Pie to the sunny shores of South Africa. The Geek market here is screaming for products like these and I want to be the one and only place to get ALL your geek apparel

We want to start off small in order to give the best quality products to our already waiting clients. We want to start off with a few custom designed shirts and get the AcidFibre name out there. Once we have the capabilities to produce more shirts at a time we will be able to get our gear to the masses.

But for this to happen we need your help. Now we know that a few dollars might not be that much but with the excange rate we will be getting a lot more for your donation than you might realise.

The designs that you see below are not the final product, but it will give you an idea of where we are going.

Now we are aware that you would like something in return for your investment but being in South Africa it’s going to be very difficult to get the needed stuff to all the overseas investors so in phase one of our project we don’t ask for a big donation and are currently trying to get a lot of smaller donations just to help us get off our feet. Every little bit will help us a lot!!!


  • I want to bring those childhood memories back to not only me but the community by Airbrushing custom T-shirts of times gone by
  • With your help I would be able to  buy the necessary equipment .
  • I currently only have two Airbrushes and does my stenciling by hand
  • some of the ideas



What We Need

  • your contributions will go towards upgrading my workshop (Garage)
  • this is what I need to make a success 
  • Electronic cutting Machine

  • a mini compressor

  • 2x Airbrushes 

a heatpress for curring the paint




Other Ways You Can Help


  • I am fully aware that not everybody can help financially but you can always help  by getting the word out and make some noise about my campaign.

story:
After the success of our first campaign, amazing feedback from our past 8 months of sales and a string of improvements we are ready to bring it up a notch (or two): Meet Al Capone, Red Baron and the Sundance Kid!
Working on Bændit™ technology we developed 3 new metal frames (gold, black and stainless) to work with all of our existing components.  We are launching them here on Indiegogo so you, our early supporters can be the first to get our BANDITS at a super discounted price (up to 40% off retail). 

AL CAPONE EDITION                RED BARON EDITION         SUNDANCE KID EDITION


As Always:

BÆNDIT is MODULAR!

All BÆNDIT pieces are interchangeable and work with ALL BÆNDIT  models. You can swap the colour, mix and match to create your perfect pair of sunglasses. With its Patented structure you can deconstruct them to fit even in the smallest of pockets.

A special 4 and 8 pin handmade alloy attachment, coated with a silicon layer, assures ultra tight and strong fit of the temples and bridge pieces inside the frames.

BÆNDIT is BENDABLE! 

     

BÆNDIT adapts to your lifestyle.  Wear them loose and comfortable until you need to kick it up a notch for that kite surfing or beach volley session, then just press BÆNDIT tight to your face and you are ready for action. BÆNDIT sunglasses will stay where you need them to be. 

This is only possible thanks to our hybrid metal/silicon polymer core moulded together to keep any shape desired.

Multipurpose and multifunctional, useful beyond sun protection!


RED BARON EDITION

Aviator shape brushed gold frames with Gold REVO lens.

Manfred Albrecht Freiherr von Richthofen, also widely known as the Red Baron, was a German fighter pilot with the Imperial German Army Air Service during the First World War. He is considered the ace-of-aces of the war, being officially credited with 80 air combat victories. BÆNDIT in this Aviator`s design remembers the Baron`s mastery, skill and passion for flying in its pioneering age.


SUNDANCE KID EDITION

Round shape black metal frames with Smoke Black lens.

Harry Alonzo Longabaugh, better known as the Sundance Kid, was an outlaw and member of Butch Cassidy's Wild Bunch in the American Old West. Together with the other members of "The Wild Bunch" gang, the Sundance Kid performed the longest string of successful train and bank robberies in American history. BÆNDIT in this shape celebrates the Kid`s nomadic spirit and carefree approach.


 AL CAPONE EDITION

Rectangular shape brushed silver frames with white mirror lens.


Alphonse Gabriel "Al" Capone was an American gangster who attained fame during the Prohibition era as the co-founder and boss of the Chicago Outfit. Capone`s mutually profitable relationships with the city's police and the mayor`s office meant that he was safe from law enforcement and politically protected. BÆNDIT in this edition reflects Capone`s entrepreneurial acumen and business vision. 




PREMIUM LEATHER NUMBERED EDITIONS


Numbered edition RED BARON Gold frames with Gold custom REVO lens and handcrafted vegetable tanned calfskin leather with burnished and hand painted edges temples and bridge.



Numbered edition SUNDANCE KID Black frames with Smoke Black custom lens and handcrafted vegetable tanned calfskin leather with burnished and hand painted edges temples and bridge.




Numbered edition AL CAPONE Brushed Silver frames with White Mirror custom lens and handcrafted vegetable tanned calfskin leather with burnished and hand painted edges temples and bridge. 




FRAME
In-mould electric welded 6 pieces stainless steal hand brushed structure with nickel free plating. 

LENS
Custom S20 Revo and BT lenses made specifically for BÆNDIT to work in the toughest of environments and filter out 100% of UVA / UVB / UVC. Made from Thermoplastic Polycarbonate composite for extra strength and durability.

 

TEMPLES & NOSE

CORE
BÆNDIT alloy, processed and engineered to reach exceptional reversible plasticity properties. Ductility and malleability performances allow the core of the temples and bridge to deform, hold position and move back to original when pressure is applied. This is further enhanced by flexibility of the silicon casing and the fact that it is bonded to the alloy core.

Additionally each temple and nose bridge piece is hand cut and 4 (temples) to 8 (nose) safety pins are hand welded to the main structure to work as a locking mechanism to the eye frame piece.

CASING
High Resistance Silicone-Rubber Elastomer cured and Injection molded with the alloy core to be permanently bonded. The molded Silicone casing provides the elastic capacity to follow the core in the deformation process and helps in the last 5% of returning to its original shape.

BOX
Made from recycled cardboard.

FEATURED IN: 

                           


BÆNDIT STORY

All ideas start with a disappointment. For us it was “foldable sunglasses”, while the concept of reducing in size an item that needs to be carried around all day is fantastic, there was a flaw. They fold leaving the lens on the outside, unprotected, effectively rendering the whole process futile. They cannot be carried in pockets or bags without having to bring an extra case to avoid annoying scratches. For normal sunglasses is even worse, lens are unprotected, they are space consuming and get in the way when not needed. 


This got us thinking, what if the whole structure could transform at will to protect the delicate parts and adapt to various situations and needs? How could we make them them useful also when they are not on your face? Fully flexible and bendable eyewear structure was born, BÆND IT.

We then went a step further: could it be possible to make them modular too? 

A revolutionary composite structure was conceptualised so that our eyewear can be separated and recombined in 5 pieces. 3 parts to allow the flexibility and 2 to carry the best lens in the market. After a year of engineering and testing BÆNDIT was finally born.

The modularity allows users to change colours and shapes to best fit your mood and style without having to buy multiple expensive sunglasses and the bendability keeps them right where you need them to be. Bændit, Revolution by Design. 

                               

  

How can I make clear what colors I order?

After you ordered a pair of BÆNDIT through Indiegogo we will send you an email. In this email you have the option to select the desired colors and you can change delivery addresses if required. When you buy BÆNDIT  as a gift, it is also possible to leave a personal note to the lucky receiver of this unique gift.

Christmas Special

Buy BÆNDIT  as a Christmas gift before the 24th of December and we will send a themed mail to the receiver of the present. You can select the Christmas option on your confirmation mail.  



   For any questions please email bandit@baendit.com we are ready to help.


Free Shipping

Free worldwide shipping!

Risks & Challenges

Nah, now we are good!

Product Information

How much are these new BÆNDIT models going to cost?

Al Capone, Red Baron and Sundance Kid will be sold for $149 and $249 (leather version).

What’s included in the BÆNDIT package?

2 Lens and frames modules, 2 temples and 1 nose bridge module, 1 signature cleaning cloth 1 Multifunctional bandanna and travel packaging. 

I contributed but didn’t get the email to choose my colour or style.

It can take up to 2 days for the email to be processed, please email bandit@baendit.com for any issue. 

Why only a 1000 USD goal?

This campaign is to thank the Indiegogo community for creating BÆNDIT, We would not be here without you and there are already so many goals and targets in life that if can very well do without another one.

story:
Turn heads, get stopped in the street – the bag you carry says a lot about you! An MC bag will get people talking and you’ll never see it on anyone else. Why? Because you can customise these premium, designer accessories to be EXACTLY the bag for you… 

 

 

CELEBRATE INDIVIDUALITY - CREATE OPPORTUNITY - EMPOWER PEOPLE

We are passionate about combining the bold creativity of African fashion with classic London style to create contemporary designs that are unique, elegant and luxurious. 

We're already creating jobs in Nairobi. Every pledge will help create more opportunities and contribute to a fund we are setting up to help local entrepreneurs launch their own businesses. 

Whether it’s a shop, a market stand or a new restaurant - entrepreneurship empowers people and creates long lasting stability in communities and happiness in families.

                                                            HANDMADE BY US

We design and craft all our own products in house, because of this we are able to deliver you exceptional quality handbags, made from the best materials without the price tag of international designer brands. We have experience, expertise and a proven track record. Our production manager, Mary Mwangi, has worked on projects for Vivienne Westwood and Stella McCartney.

African fashion is experiencing a surge in popularity. Catwalks from Milan to New York are alive with colour and African inspired design. With your help we can make this exciting look accessible to the world through unique and exceptionally well made accessories.

Our beautiful first range, Pendeza,has been enjoyed by people around the world. Pendeza, is made with an eco-friendly jute body and features a stunning hand stitched bead design. 

Our next collection is called Halisi, we have developed and tested countless samples to create three timeless leather designs. They will be handmade in luxurious calf leathers and finished with customisable Kikoy fabric linings. Now we need your help to bring these designs to life. We need to raise funds to expand our production facility in Kenya.

story:
That Story

 

My name is Lynthia, and I am the inventor of That Neck Pillow.

Around 2006, I started a business that had me traveling a lot. Even though I visited some beautiful locations such as Barbados, Antigua, the Dominican Republic, San Andres Island, and St. Lucia, I dreaded the long plane rides. After several months of middle seats, non-existent leg room, and a sore neck, I decided to buy a pillow at the airport.

Nothing changed - I had a sore neck and a massive headache. I told myself, “one of these pillows has to work." So I invested in several different versions of neck pillows. None of them gave me the support and comfort I was looking for. But I still had to travel!

I decided that it was time for me to design a better travel pillow, one that would really help ease the discomfort of traveling. After two years of designing and redesigning. I finally produced my first prototype, and That Neck Pillow was finally a reality.

That Neck Pillow is Made in America. 

It is made with the softest and most breathable fabrics. 

That Neck Pillow is also made with a premium and comfortable memory foam specifically selected to give you the most relaxing trip possible.

Our Pillow

What I created turned out to be so much more than a travel pillow.  

You can use it on the train, plane, bus, car, while relaxing at home, sitting up in bed reading, or even at the office. 

That Beach Pillow

To add to That Neck Pillow’s versatility, we decided to combine That Neck pillow with a beach towel using our snap and go design. Thus, That Beach Pillow was created. That Beach Pillow is perfect for laying out on the beach, or if you are just relaxing by the pool. It is water resistant and the cover can be machine washed. And of course, it provides the same strong and comfortable support as That Neck Pillow. Its ergonomic design ensures that you stay supported whether you are laying on your back or on your stomach.

That Beach Pillow is easily attachable to That Beach Towel. Enjoy yourself at the beach or pool!

That Beach pillow offers:

  • The Same Geometric Design offered by That Neck Pillow
  • Premium Comfort and Materials
  • Water Resistant Fabric Perfect for Poolside and Beach Adventures
  • Luxury Towel that Attaches to That Beach Pillow

That Neck Pillow Features

Now you might be wondering, what makes That Neck Pillow work? Here are some of the unique features:

  • The unique shape ensures that your neck is supported no matter your position.
  • That Neck Pillow is lightweight and has a built in handle, making it easy to attach to your carry-on, suitcase, or even your purse.
  • The cover is washable AND interchangeable. We even offer replaceable covers in a different color or fabric so you can customize your pillow on the go.
  • Luxury breathable material for a cool and relaxing trip

 

 

Testimonials

'This is truly a superior neck pillow.  I got this pillow as a gift and the first time that I used it was when I booked a 5hr economy flight.  I was skeptical at first but I was pleasantly surprised. I had the best neck support that allowed me to sleep all the way to my destination. I will definitely be using my neck pillow more often!'

-Marsha

'I fly a lot for work and on one of my business trips, I saw a lady with a differently shaped travel pillow.  I was curious about whether it works, and if it does, where did she purchase it. Well, for my next business trip,  I had my own That Neck Pillow. It is the best neck pillow that I have ever owned. It supports my head very comfortably and allows me to sleep through entire flights. I never have any neck pain when I reach my destination. It is just as comfortable for a middle or aisle seat as it is for a window seat. I highly recommend it for all of your travel needs.'

-Nicole 

 

St Jude. Children's Research Hospital

Recently I discovered that my daughter has cancer. We are doing our best and staying strong. We want our business to support research efforts by organizations like St Jude.

 For every That Neck Pillow sold we will donate one dollar to St Jude. Children's Research Hospital.

 

Support Our Campaign

Of course we want everyone to have their own That Neck Pillow, but if you cannot purchase one today, please sign up on our mailing list and share our campaign with your friends and family.

Please follow us on Facebook and Instagram for news and updates!

I will definitely be using my neck pillow more often!'
-Marsha

'I fly a lot for work and on one of my business trips, I saw a lady with a differently shaped travel pillow.  I was curious about whether it works, and if it does, where did she purchase it. Well, for my next business trip,  I had my own That Neck Pillow. It is the best neck pillow that I have ever owned. It supports my head very comfortably and allows me to sleep through entire flights. I never have any neck pain when I reach my destination. It is just as comfortable for a middle or aisle seat as it is for a window seat. I highly recommend it for all of your travel needs.'
-Nicole 
 

St Jude. Children's Research Hospital
Recently I discovered that my daughter has cancer. We are doing our best and staying strong. We want our business to support research efforts by organizations like St Jude.
 For every That Neck Pillow sold we will donate one dollar to St Jude. Children's Research Hospital.
 
Support Our Campaign
Of course we want everyone to have their own That Neck Pillow, but if you cannot purchase one today, please sign up on our mailing list and share our campaign with your friends and family.
Please follow us on Facebook and Instagram for news and updates!

story:
Our Story:

Hi! Welcome to BookLoot! This project is the brainchild of us; husband and wife super duo, Sara and Eugene.  With a little help from our daughter Violet of course. We are a quirky bunch and our addiction to the written word simply can't be helped. And we want to share it all with you! So we have combined our love of reading, our obsession for books and the thrill of mystery all wrapped into one fun package delivered to your door every month. 

With your help and our constant dedication we can make this the best YA book subscription box yet. Here is what you can do to help!

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

How you can help & What You Get:

The funds we collect from this campaign will help jump start the first two months of BookLoot. To purchase all the necessary items to make your box a unique and one of a kind experience. Such as: Shipping and printing material, website startup and maintenance, bookish goodies and book procurement. 

In exchange for your hard-earned money you will get the following: 

  • A newly released YA book - The book shipped will always have a release date within the month of the box being delivered. 
  • 3-4 handcrafted bookish goodies - We are especially excited to help promote small business owners and their amazing craftiness to provide you fun and unique items every month. *occasionally manufactured goods, i.e funko pops*
  • An an exclusive first publishing of our community submitted themed short story. - We are excited to be able to give aspiring/independent writers a new and unique platform to share and distribute their stories to a larger audience. 

All of this for just $29.99/month (shipping is not included). **This price is different from the Item Tiers offered in this campaign - See Items for more details**

BookLoot will also be available at discounted prices in a 3-Month, 6-Month and 12-Month subscription. **Set prices will be listed after this campaign is over.**

 

Risks & Challenges

Staying relative and unique to today's YA market and keeping your interest sparked is a challenge we are willing to accept. We plan to research the heck out of everything to make sure you are getting the best experience possible delivered to your front door! This is our first run at this box so there is a good chance we will run into some hiccups along the way, but please be patient with us as we get our barrings. We promise it will be worth it! 

Other Ways You Can Help:

Don't have the money right now? We totally get it, times can be tough. But here are other ways you can help to make our dream a reality! 

Share this IndieGoGo campaign with your friends and family. 

Follow and share us on Facebook, Twitter and Instagram to help spread the word. 

Share us with your friends and family by submitting your own bookish posts under #BookLoot 

Thank you! Thank You!

Thank you for stopping by and anything you can do to help us make this amazing dream a reality would be greatly appreciated and the best thing to happen in our lives! If you have any questions please feel free to contact us at www.bookloot.org

story:
Perfect For Everyday Wear,

Kind To The Environment 

Fewer things say comfort more than a super soft t-shirt. Unfortunately, the average cotton shirt requires 700 gallons of freshwater and tons of pesticides. The apparel industry is the second most polluting industry globally, and we’re here to change that. 

Last Bottle Clothing was created to combat the dirty apparel industry one shirt at a time. Our closed loop process utilizes recycled plastic bottles by turning them into super soft, durable t-shirts, perfect for everyday wear. When you’re done loving these shirts, you can return them to be recycled, completing our closed loop process of clothing manufacturing.

We promise an awesome shirt that’s ethically made in the USA and right for everything from hiking and biking, to Super Bowl Sunday, and everything in between.

Meet the Last Bottle Classic Tee.

 

  • Super Soft: Our shirts are softer than cotton and have a truly amazing feel. They are light weight and feel awesome against your skin. Who would have thought 100% recycled plastic bottles could feel this great? 
  • Durable: From hiking and biking to multi-day wear for camping, these shirts will keep you looking great and always feeling comfortable. The double enforced neckline and sleeves ensure long lasting durability and structural integrity. 
  • Sweat Wicking: Our fabric pulls away sweat from your body and keeps you cool. Wearing our tees under your suit for a big meeting? Biking around NYC in traffic? No big deal! 
  • Recyclable: When you're done loving your shirt(s), you can send it back to us and we'll recycle them into new shirts. This closed loop process helps us achieve maximum sustainability through our clothing lines.  

 

Last Bottle Clothing makes apparel out of 100% recycled plastic bottles. Our clothing, from the collection of plastic bottles, all the way through the process of turning those bottles into clothing, is all done in the United States by American workers.

Last Bottle Clothing assembled our core group of suppliers and developers within the United States, and all within a small region in the Carolinas, to keep our carbon footprint low. One supplier collects plastic bottles and recycles them into a fine, pellet like substance, while another supplier turns the pellets into a polyester type thread. A third supplier takes the thread and weaves it into reams of usable cloth. Our fourth supplier cuts the cloth into patterns and sews it into t-shirts.

The result is a pristine product, born and bred in the USA. Every piece of apparel Last Bottle Clothing creates removes an average of 13 plastic 500ml bottles from America’s waste stream, which would otherwise end up in landfills, on the roadside, or floating down waterways heading into our lakes and oceans.

Together with Last Bottle Clothing, you can help reduce plastic waste, decrease your clothing’s carbon footprint and revolutionize the apparel industry in the process.

 

We currently have four colors to choose from, in both unisex and women’s fit. Our Classic Logo Tee displays our logo ($34 Perk), and our Graphic Tee ($39 Perk) can be customized by selecting the shirt color and graphic of your choice. 

 

 

 

Our Awesome Perks/ Rewards:

Each of our rewards will help you rep the Last Bottle brand while also helping out the environment. Any 3 Pack or more of shirts is customizable with size, color or design. For example, you could get one logo tee and two graphic tees, or any combination you'd like. The decision is yours! Grab a different color/ design combo for everyday of the week and help with plastic pollution in the process. Win-Win. 

We offer FREE SHIPPING within the US.

Our international shipping rates are $9 for a single shirt, and $13 for any three pack or more of t-shirts. Water bottles are available for US backers only. 

 

We started Last Bottle Clothing with a seemingly simple goal: To make sustainable, fashionable clothing entirely from plastic bottles. We wanted our shirts to be soft, durable and perfect for the outdoor enthusiast and book worm, alike. Each of these shirts keeps an average of 13 plastic bottles out of landfills and oceans, so you can be proud to wear one and tell your friends the story behind your tee.

Aside from the shirt itself, we wanted to create an apparel supply chain with a small carbon footprint, and all within the US. Standard apparel travels thousands and thousands of miles before it ends up in stores or at your door, and at Last Bottle Clothing, we're changing that polluting figure. In addition to removing the wasteful nature of transporting clothing between countries, we believe in paying above average and fair wages to our construction teams, all of whom are located within a small radius of the Carolinas. 

Traditional clothing lines rely on cotton, an incredibly wasteful crop. Our shirts consume 500 times LESS water than an average cotton shirt, and are softer. The US wastes an enormous amount of plastic everyday, which takes centuries to decompose. We're utilizing this waste and making it into something that's sustainable, cool and looks great. When you're done loving your shirt(s), they can be returned and recycled again, creating a closed loop, entirely sustainable manufacturing process. 

We're passionate about the environment and about helping to solve the problem of plastic waste in our country. By purchasing a Last Bottle Clothing T-Shirt, you too can be a part of the solution to end plastic wastes in oceans, on beaches, and in forests. Join us today or help us spread the word!

What Our Customers Say

story:
LET YOUR BREASTS BREATHE AND BE HEALTHY, COMFY, AND SEXY!

ORDER TODAY: WWW.ECETICK.COM

Ecetick is bringing the world's most breathable and comfortable bra to women around the globe. This innovative patented technology has reinvented bra cups and revolutionized bras to free your breasts and give you more confidence. It has the first and only perforated bra cup made with non-toxic and eco-friendly material to enhance breast health and help the environment. It gives you the ultimate comfort, so you might never want to take it off.

Most bras on the market are made with cups that are are made of synthetic polyurethane foam (a petroleum-based product that often ends up in landfills). Did you know how TOXIC and dangerous they can be for your health? Don't let toxic chemicals and carcinogens get near your breasts again. Women deserve better bras.

TECHNOLOGY


 

WHY CHOOSE US

Looking for bras that are comfy, sexy, and healthy for your breasts? Our bras are made just for you!

To make your breasts ultimately healthy, our bras not only use patented non-toxic removable bra cup with 616 pores, but also have the combination of natural fabric, wire-free, and wide straps for ultimate comfort. 

NATURAL FABRIC 

100% cotton in the cups so no toxic chemicals will ever touch your breasts again. Cotton is moisture-wicking and much more breathable than synthetic fibers that are treated heavily with chemicals.

WIRE-FREE

Our bras do not have underwires not only for comfort, but also for health reasons. Our wire-free bras are fashionable and beneficial to all types of women, from teens during puberty to elderly, women who experience breast tenderness during menstruation, pregnancy, or breastfeeding, and women with any breast problems. Our bras are suitable for any woman who prefers healthy breasts.

FOR ALL KINDS OF ACTIVITIES

Our comfortable and supportive bras can be worn for work, yoga, light exercise, and leisure. We have bras and built-in-bra tank tops that can be worn on both of the inside and outside. They can also be worn for more than 8 hours and worn to sleep to alleviate breast discomfort.

REMOVABLE BRA CUPS

Our bras can not only give you enough support and coverage with our bra cups, but can also give you extra room and comfort without the bra cups. Additionally, our bra cups can give you a fuller bust silhouette that looks perfectly natural.

WIDE STRAPS

Our straps are about 1-2 inches wide to provide more comfort and prevent redness, soreness, and deep grooves in the shoulder. Wide straps also do not fall easily.

 

TESTIMONIALS

Many customers and we ourselves have tested our lingerie over the years, and we promise that we will bring you only the high-quality aesthetic bras that enhance your breast health. Check out what our early customers said.

“I had painful breast lumps for years while wearing wired bras. I took some Chinese medicine to get rid of them, but then they recurred several times. So I asked my Chinese doctors how to prevent them. They all told me the same thing: avoid wired bras. I spent a lot of time looking for wire-free bras, but they weren’t as stylish as wired ones until I found these. The bra cups made with non-toxic material is a BIG PLUS for me because I am very health conscious. They also don’t make my breasts sweat as much as a traditional bra does because of the breathability. So I bought 4 so far.

 

When they say you can wear it for more than 8 hours, they are not kidding. When I had school and a full-time job everyday, I wore the bra for more than 14 hours a day, and I was barely aware that it was even there! They are also not kidding when they say they are much more durable. I machine wash them every week, and they still look like new to me. Also, for me personally, my breast lumps have not come back again for 2 years so far. Thank you!” -HL (Read more testimonials here)

 

PRODUCTS

View all product details and order here

All ultimate bras are currently available in sizes Small, Medium, and Large.

SIZE GUIDE

MANUFACTURER'S BRA SIZE SUGGESTIONS 

Small: band size 32-34. Medium: band size 36. Large: band size 38. X-Large: band size 40. Our products can fit cup size A-C (may also fit cup size D and up to F according to our customers' feedback). Please refer to the size charts here for further size suggestions. If you wear larger cup sizes, please contact us for size suggestions. 

 

HOW WE GIVE

At Ecetick, we strongly believe in helping all women and improving women’s lives. We plan to partner with Living Beyond Breast Cancer, the highest rated non-profit breast cancer organization by Charity Navigator. Through your purchases, we will donate one percent of our sales (which can be a huge number with your support) to the organization. Every time you spend any amount, a woman fighting breast cancer is helped. 

Breast cancer is the most common cancer in women worldwide and second most common cancer overall. In the U.S. alone, about 1 in 8 women will develop invasive breast cancer over the course of her lifetime. In 2016, there are about 3 million women with a history of breast cancer in the U.S. In fact, the highest incidence of breast cancer was in Northern America, Europe, and Oceania. We hope that by donating, we will bring more hope and encouragement to these women and ultimately improve their lives.

 

WHO IS TALKING ABOUT US

FAQ

Would the colors I see on my monitor be slightly different from the actual colors of the products?

We have tried our best to photograph the products as accurately as possible. But please be aware that colors may vary in different types of lighting and with different monitors. 

How can I contact Ecetick?

We are always happy to hear from you! If you have more questions, please contact us at hello@ecetick.com.

story:
Vermin Supreme is your friend and best choice for president in 2012.

Vermin Supreme has been running for office for over 20 years, and now is your chance to help yourself to a future of a free pony, time machine research, harnessing the power of zombies for energy, and the mandatory toothbrushing law. We are raising funds to get one thousand protest posters made and stickers in addition to offsetting Vermin's costs... & pony piñatas if enough change rolls into the digital pringles can. Everyone attending the RNC in Tampa and DNC in Charlotte needs to know of Vermin's campaign and presence!

What We Need & What You Get:

The $2000 goal is the BARE MINIMUM needed to print 1000 large, heavy stock Vermin posters, and any additional sum will be used to purchase stickers and offset campain costs.

The posters are derived from a sketch by Seth Tobocman (http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Seth_Tobocman), Formatted by Rob Chabebe (http://www.eyebodega.com).

By donating to the Vermin Supreme Campain...

You can feel good in that you didn't donate to a president without taste in fashion.

You guarantee ponies jobs in the future, and the controlling of the zombie problem.

You've helped a seasoned performance artist execute his most successful presidential run to date and in turn passively inspired others to think for themselves. 

There are other ways to help, if you have no duckets to toss:

REGISTER TO VOTE and vote for VERMIN 2012! it's free

 Follow Vermin Supreme on Twitter: http://twitter.com/VerminSupreme

 Subscribe to Vermin Supreme on Facebook:http://www.facebook.com/vermin.supreme.1

 Come to the RNC and DNC rallies! (info on facebook)

 

Donate a kidney: http://www.kidney.org/

 

or simply spread the word about PONY 2012!

  

Check out the trailer for "Who is Vermin Supreme?": http://www.kickstarter.com/projects/1234068001/...

Donate a kidney: http://www.kidney.org/
 
or simply spread the word about PONY 2012!
  
Check out the trailer for "Who is Vermin Supreme?": http://www.kickstarter.com/projects/1234068001/...

story:
OUR STORY

As a petite woman myself, I know the struggles that short women face when it comes to shopping for that great pair of pants, dress or top and the extra expense that goes along with getting it fit to your body proportionately.  If I kept all the tailoring receipts for all my garments all these years, I would probably be a millionaire by now.  

Petite Epoque was created to give short, petite women all over the world the attention they deserve by creating a line specifically catered to fit proportionately and give fashion looks and trends that are feminine, functional, high quality, transitional and versatile. The line gives a feeling of relief by eliminating extra costs for alterations or tailoring by focusing on and recognizing correct proportion sizes.  This is done by providing shorter lengths on skirts, leggings, jackets and dresses as well as attention to detail and the comfort it gives the wearer. It is catered to short, petite women of all ages and petite sizes and whose heights are within 4'9" to 5'4". The problem with other companies who carry “petite sizes” is that they make their clothes for women who are tall and skinny and these companies did not keep in mind that the average size of women is 5'4" which is technically 'petite'. Standard American sizes are based on a woman whose height is 5'6", with Petite Epoque our sizing is based on a short, petite woman who is 5'0". Hence, Petite Epoque is every short woman's dream line. It recognizes a void in the marketplace for a better fit and size. The line specializes in women's jackets, leggings, skirts, dresses and tops. It hopes to  venture into cocktail and evening wear in the near future. 

WHAT WE NEED AND WHAT YOU GET

In order to get this line fully off the ground, we need a total of $30,000.  This money will go towards manufacturing costs, marketing, business administration etc.  The minimum we would need to produce 2-3 pieces of the line is $10,000 which is why we are starting out at our minimum amount.  Of course we hope to exceed much more than $10,000 in order to fulfill our goal.  

REWARDS:

$5 FOUNDING FAMILY

$10 - 10 FASHION TIPS AND TRICKS TO LOOK TALLER: A GUIDE FOR PETITES 

$15 ECO FRIENDLY NOTEBOOK WITH PEN

$15 CAN COOLER

$20 UMBRELLA WITH OUR LOGO (19" LONG)

$30 PETITE EPOQUE TOTES (ONE SIZE 11 x18")

$30 Petite Epoque T-shirt, WHITE SIZE: (XS, S, M, L)


$30 PETITE EPOQUE TANK, BLACK SIZE: (S, M, L, XL)


$50 ROXANNE TOP, BLACK, SIZE: (XS, S, M, L) 
RETAIL: $125

$70 CAMILLE JEWELRY - SMALL PHOENIX PENDANT 
                    (ADJUSTABLE 16"-18 1/2")

$75 NANA LEGGINGS, BLACK, SIZE: (XS, S, M, L) 
RETAIL: $150

$75 BETHANNY SKIRT, IVORY/BLK, SIZE: (0, 2, 4, 6, 8, 10)
RETAIL: $150

$95 BRIDGET DRESS, BLUSH/BLK, SIZE: (0, 2, 4, 6, 8, 10)
RETAIL: $200

$95 JEZEBEL DRESS, NAVY, SIZE: (XS, S, M, L)
RETAIL: $200

$95 SAVANNAH DRESS, IVORY/BLK, SIZE: (0, 2, 4, 6, 8, 10)
RETAIL: $200

$120 MARILYN TRENCH, BEIGE, SIZE: (0, 2, 4, 6, 8, 10)

RETAIL: $225



SIZE GUIDE
                         XS                             S                             M                            L
                    00   -   0                   2  -    4                     6  -  8                   10  - 12  
BUST          32       33                34      35                36      37            38 1/2      40  
WAIST        24       25                26      27                28       29           30 1/2      32
HIP             35        36               37       38                39      40            41 1/2      43

$300 BEHIND THE SCENES PHOTOSHOOT - LIMITED 3 SLOTS

$1000 DINNER FOR 4 AT BEAUTY AND ESSEX

THE IMPACT
We are making a huge impact in the fashion industry by supporting domestic manufacturing and therefore, all garments are made in the USA.  Supporting domestic manufacturing helps create jobs and keeps money here in the US.  
The petite market impacts the retail business in many ways!  Here's why:  Petite women represent 70% of the female US population.  The average height of a woman is now only 5'4", which is technically petite.  The petite women market is growing 8.6% annually.  With that said, there are over 600 MILLION petite women in the world!  And lastly, petites represent 10 BILLION of buying power in retail.  This is exactly why this brand is needed today in the fashion industry for petite women to have enclusivity. 
RISKS AND CHALLENGES
Every business has some risks and challenges.  In our case, our biggest problem is obtaining fabrics.  Since we are a small start up company and do not have a lot of capital, we are forced to purchase only low minimum goods.  Therefore, it's very hard to source fabric companies who are willing to work with our small orders.  There are a few out there who do cater to companies like Petite Epoque, however, the fabrics are limited.  Even still, we are able to manage to work with what we can and still present a line with high quality fabrics and great styles.

Luckily, I have many contacts in the industry and have made good relationships with fabric vendors and manufacturing companies who believe in the line and  are willing to work with us.

In addition, another obstacle is that there are not a lot of petite retailers yet.  Our solution is to start selling online as well as at small boutiques.  Petite women are forced to buy apparel knowing that it will need to be tailored after time of purchase;  I don't know about you, but that is such a hassle.  Not only are you paying for a garment that is probably way over your budget, but on top of that, you will have to pay extra to get the fit you want.  Petite retailers or brands that do carry petite sizes are still not proportioned to a petite woman's body.  Most petite retailers petite sizing is made for a tall, slender woman.  With Petite Epoque we have examined every detail of our garments to make sure that it is tailored to fit a "REAL" petite woman.
In conclusion, Petite Epoque hopes to revolutionize the petite fashion industry by opening the doors for petite women all over the world to products that are specifically created to cater to their fashion needs and lifestyle.  It also hopes to gain recognition and prestige in the fashion industry by delivering styles that are liberating for petite women.  It is time for short, petite women to have the looks they deserve!
As a thank you, we are also donating part of the money raised to a good cause, Amma.org.  For years I have volunteered at Amma's Soup Kitchen in NYC and believe in its profound organization.  It is an An International Network of Charitable Organizations that is active in 40+ Countries, Collectively Known as Embracing the World.  "Embracing the world exists to help alleviate the burden of the world's poor through helping to meet each of their five basic needs - food, shelter, education, healthcare and livelihood - wherever and whenever possible."
