story:
Mid-campaign update!

Friends! We are able to contribute our first $1,000 to the Hope Alliance and it was all thanks to YOU just by believing in our cause and joining the Pterys community.

We are inspired by the initial interest that our sunglasses have had on our Indiegogo campaign and will continue using that momentum to take our cause globally. 

Join the Pterys community by purchasing and rocking a pair of these trendy and stylish sunglasses!

What's with the name?

Pterys (pronounced “terries”) is named after an eye disease common in tropical areas called pterygium (pronounced “terry-gee-um”). It’s the disease that motivated Sagar to found Pterys. Watch our intro video about it:


Who are we anyway?

Well, let us tell you. Brace yourself because it is pretty interesting!

We sell wooden sunglasses. Yes, we just said that. WOODEN sunglasses. Mind = blown! The shades we sell are hand-made from fine exotic woods, offering a look and texture unmatched by other materials.

We started when Sagar was on a medical trip in Haiti. While there, he was astonished to learn how many Haitians were afflicted by a preventable eye condition known as Pterygium. To improve the lives of those patients, he decided to find a way to donate sunglasses that will prevent Pterygium. And Pterys was born!

What is this Pterygium thing?

Pterygium (pronounced terry-gee-um), also known as “Surfer’s Eye”, is a fleshy growth occurring on the whites of the eye and is much more common than people think. 1 out of 4 adults living in tropical regions actually have it! It causes symptoms of irritation, redness, watery-eyes, and can even impair vision if it becomes severe enough. It’s like having sand in your eyes all day, every day.

Pterygium is caused by UV-light, wind, and dust - all things that are extremely common in tropical regions such as Haiti. Most patients abroad are given eye drops for this condition, but eyedrops only temporarily treat the symptoms and pterygium remains problematic.

The best approach is prevention! Early use of UV blocking sunglasses helps prevent Pterygium.

Now I’m interested. Tell me more!

After returning from Haiti, Sagar and his team went straight to work on hand-crafting prototype wooden glasses. Since those humble days of working in a parking garage, Pterys has come a long way. We have spent the last year perfecting our designs and we are now excited to present 3 frames that are made of Rosewood and Zebrawood. Our frame names are Rose Wayfarer, Zebra Wayfarer, and Rosewood retro. All the frames come standard with polarized lenses, and springed hinges. Oh, and they also float!

We are asking you to help fund the manufacturing of our first line of sunglasses. With your help, we hope to raise enough funds to put the final touches on our designs, produce the shades, and deliver them to your beautiful face. And the best part is, not only will you be one of the first to be rockin’ a pair of Pterys, you will also support The Hope Alliance in the process!

How will Pterys use my money?

Well first of all, we will use it to deliver some awesome wooden sunglasses to your fine face! Pterys is committed to preventing Pterygium abroad. We donate 10% of each and every sale to The Hope Alliance, a non-profit organization working in Haiti, Peru, and Guatemala to provide Pterygium prevention education and protective eyewear.

Every time you buy a pair of Pterys, you are investing in the livelihood of person abroad and his or her family. Ptery’s are hand-crafted from wood to provide an environmentally friendly, lightweight, and durable frame for UV-protective lenses. We hope you enjoy your Pterys and spread the word!

Okay…so what do I do now?

Well, you’ve read this far so you must be interested. Your first task is to choose your frame. Can't decide? Well then buy all three! Take a look at the pictures below and you will see the frames we are offering. In case you forgot already, they were Zebra wayfarer, Rose wayfarer, and Rosewood retro. We have set up tiers for contributing so that everyone has a chance to participate.

The Reward levels (perks):

  • $10: The Philanthropist: We will donate $10 to The Hope Alliance.
  • $49: Early Bird: Get your Rose Wayfarer, Zebra Wayfarer or Rosewood retro at an extra-discounted rate (remember these babies will retail for $80!) (limited to first 45 buyers, so get ‘em while they last!)
  • $59: Fashionably Late: Missed out on the chance to be one of the early birds?? No problem, you can still get a single pair at steal price of $59, still $20 off the retail value!
  • $159: Party pack: Can’t decide? Well buy all three! Get a Rose wayfarer, Zebra wayfarer, and Rosewood retro.
  • $299: Wholesaler: Can’t get enough? Be a baller and get 2 of each (6 total), enough for your whole crew!

More Pics!!!

Tell me more about The Hope Alliance

The The Hope Alliance is a humanitarian organization working in developing countries to empower the people there to create positive and sustainable changes in the lives of their families and their communities.

They have a number of project abroad including a special vision program that since 2001 has provided more than 45,000 pairs of glasses to children and adults! In 2012, they started the Pterygium Awareness Project to spread the message “Save your sight, block UV light” and to teach those at risk of Pterygium to wear hats and UV blocking glasses. They believe that prevention is the only answer to help maintain the vision of tens of millions of people. And they travel several times a year to Haiti, Guatemala and Peru to practice what they preach.

Purchasing a pair of Pterys will help the Pterys community collaborate with The Hope Alliance’s vision program with the goal of preventing pterygium abroad.

We want to have our cake and eat it too

At Pterys, we believe that doing good and running a business shouldn’t be mutually exclusive. We aim to create a platform that allows buyers of our stylish and genuine wooden sunglasses to improve eye-health abroad. We are confident that there is no connection stronger than one formed after having a positive impact on an individual's health. It’s karma - what goes around comes around!

While in Haiti, Sagar learned of a Haitian proverb: “Men anpil chay pa lou” - many hands make the load lighter. Though our individual impacts may be small, with your help we hope that together we can make the load lighter for those less fortunate.

FAQ

Can I do a story on Pterys or get more info about the company?

  • Sure! We have been blown away by the support we have received. We don’t spend any money on advertising so the only reason we are here is because of you all spreading the word! We are happy to provide more info. Email us at info@pterys.com.

When will I get my stuff?

  • The glasses will ship in December. 

How much is shipping?

  • Free! Well...not actually, but we’ve included the shipping cost in the price of the sunglasses. International shipping costs extra.

I would like know how this is reaching out to the people who actually need it!

  • Great question! We donate 10% of the revenue from each pair sold to The Hope Alliance. Please see the above information for more details.

What size are your glasses?

  • Take out your tape measure. Our wayfarer frames are 15.5 x 5 x 15 cm (representing the front of frame, height, and temple length). Our retro frames are 16 x 5.5x 16 cm. They all come with flex hinges that allow the side pieces to go out allowing them to fit every head type.

What kind of lenses do the sunglasses have?

  • They come standard with polarized lenses (that block UV light).

I want more than 6 pairs of glasses!

  • Well thats amazing! We would be ecstatic to provide you with a bulk order. Please email us at info@pterys.com.

Who took your sweet pics and made that awesome video?

  • We were fortunate enough to have a wonderfully talented photographer and videographer assisting us. Natalie Marie took all our shots and can be reached at https://www.facebook.com/NatMariePhotos. Allan Thompson shot our video and can be reached at https://www.facebook.com/oneeightproductions.

Do you sell burgers?

  • No….we do not. Nor fries.

story:
What is BeWooden?

By putting together gained experience in design, art and craftsmanship, a group of friends decided to create products characteristic of its uniqueness and exceptionality. Our philosophy goes with responsible use of wood as a renewable material that has been known for centuries.
The connection of modern design and traditional craftsmanship guarantees products of the highest quality. The recovery of an almost forgotten handicraft and lifetime warranty completes the principle of our philosophy.

We create a story about precise craftsmanship and values that are common for each of our products.

The sensuality of nature and original texture of wood will make you stand out in a crowd and highlight your distinctive style.

As an eco-friendly company we use mostly excess material from local woodworking shops. 

With honest craftsmanship, we restore beauty of almost forgotten crafts thus providing the highest quality of each product.

Our products are not only about style, but also about quality. This is why we decided to provide lifetime warranty for all our products.

We Need Your Support!

Thanks to your support, we will be able to expand and design new products. We prefer providing jobs to people in our region thus saving the history of old crafts instead of massive production and child labor. Together we can prove that honesty and quality are still appreciated.

We show the beauty of wood and its potential as a renewable material. Help us build a strong yet social responsible company. 

And most of all – thanks to you – we will give the world unique style of nature!

Share our story, support us and become a part of it!

How can you support us?

Pick a perk and highlight your style or bring joy to your loved ones. Christmas is just around the corner!

Become a part of our story. Receive a set of 9 wooden stickers. Stickers are durable and look perfect on your phone, laptop, window or wherever you decide to put them. 

A new forest for a greener world.

By using mostly excess materials, we can build a forest for a greener world!

You will own a tree that will hold your name forever plus we will take a picture of it and send it to you. What a great memento or gift!

The wallet Note is for people who prefer a slim wooden wallets & card holders, carrying only the most important things. Unique design, convenience and quality – these are the three most important things for us.

Two pockets can hold up to 9 cards and bills or up to 25 business cards!

The wooden wallet is a unique accessory for everyday use. The wallet has one big pocket for bills, a pocket for coins and three slots for up to 9 cards.

Set of all four wooden cufflinks for everyday gentleman.

All 8 bow ties from first and second edition for a convenient price. 

BeWooden every day.

Wooden Note wallets for your store or firm. With special wholesale discount. 10 pieces of your choice.

Wooden wallet for your store or firm. With special wholesale discount. 10 pieces of your choice from types Virilia, Tenebra, Lineari and Red Virilia.

Exclusive set of wooden accessories for stores, firms or new distributors of our brand. Set includes:

10 pairs of cufflinks – of your choice
10 pieces of bow ties perk one – of your choice
10 pieces of bow ties perk two – of your choice
10 pieces of dollar wallets – of your choice
10 pieces of wooden wallet – of your choice


FAQ

When do I receive my product?
First phase of orders are shipped within a month, second phase within two months. We will contact you via indiegogo. We want to make sure you will receive your products before December.

Is the wooden bow tie comfortable for everyday use?

The wooden bow tie is very comfortable and you will be surprised by its lightness. It does not tie down its owner in any way. Thanks to fastening with adjustable length, it fits perfectly to every neck. The only difference between regular bow tie and wooden bow tie is in its unique and original look.

What is the size of bow ties BeWooden?

The wooden bow tie is 12 cm wide, which is about the same as regular bow tie. Shape and length is different for different types of bow ties. Bow tie for children is 10 cm wide and matches the young gentleman’s style.

What is the quality of wooden wallet?

Just like all of our other products the wallet is made by hand. You do not have to be afraid of cracking it up, we tested it for you! The wood is quilted with real bovine leather which makes it even better looking!

Is the wooden wallet comfortable for everyday use?

It was our goal to create a wallet that won’t limit its owner in any way. This is why we created various types of wallets so everyone can pick his favorite. Small dollar wallets are designed for people who carry mostly only cards and bank notes while bigger wallets are for people who need to have everything with them. You can choose between the smaller dollar wallet and the bigger classical wallet.

What is the size of wooden wallets?
The wooden wallet with place for coins is 9x12cm (3,5x4,7 inch) big and thin only 1,1cm! (0,4 inch)

The dollar wallet is 7x11 cm (2.7x4.3 inch) big and thin only 0,6 cm! (0.2 inch)

Are silver cufflinks real?
Wooden cufflinks Apis made from real silver have real-silver proof identification on its body. 925 – a hallmark of goldsmith and symbol of Assay office. 

What material was used for cufflinks from perk 6?
Wooden cufflinks from perk 6 are made from modified steel and hand made wooden parts.


Spread the word about the variety of products we offer and help us to reach as many people as possible. Thank you for your support!


Contact

If you didn’t find your answer above please contact us on we@bewooden.com


Thank you for your time and for sharing our campaign!
Ctirad, Patrik, Jakub

   

BeWooden is style of nature.

and you will be surprised by its lightness. It does not tie down its owner in
any way. Thanks to fastening with adjustable length, it fits perfectly to every
neck. The only difference between regular bow tie and wooden bow tie is in its
unique and original look.

What is the size of bow ties BeWooden?The wooden bow tie is 12 cm wide,
which is about the same as regular bow tie. Shape and length is different for
different types of bow ties. Bow tie for children is 10 cm wide and matches the
young gentleman’s style.
What is the quality of wooden wallet?
Just like all of our other products
the wallet is made by hand. You do not have to be afraid of cracking it up, we
tested it for you! The wood is quilted with real bovine leather which makes it
even better looking!
Is the wooden wallet comfortable for everyday use?It was our goal to create a wallet that
won’t limit its owner in any way. This is why we created various types of
wallets so everyone can pick his favorite. Small dollar wallets are designed for people who
carry mostly only cards and bank notes while bigger wallets are for people who need
to have everything with them. You can choose between the smaller dollar wallet and the bigger classical wallet.
What is the size of wooden wallets?The wooden wallet with place for coins is 9x12cm
(3,5x4,7 inch) big and thin only 1,1cm! (0,4 inch)
The dollar wallet is 7x11 cm (2.7x4.3 inch) big and
thin only 0,6 cm! (0.2 inch)
Are silver cufflinks real?Wooden cufflinks Apis made from real silver have
real-silver proof identification on its body. 925 – a hallmark of goldsmith and
symbol of Assay office. 

What material was used for cufflinks from perk
6?Wooden cufflinks from perk 6 are made from modified steel and hand made wooden parts.

Spread the word about
the variety of products we offer and help us to reach as many people as
possible. Thank you for your support!

Contact

If you didn’t find
your answer above please contact us on we@bewooden.com



Thank you for your time and for sharing our
campaign!Ctirad, Patrik, Jakub


   
BeWooden
is style of nature.

story:
A Best Friend For Banjo

Who is Banjo you ask? Banjo is the light of my life and I am his mother.
Banjo is 3 years old. He is non verbal and has no receptive language. Banjo has Autism! 
Banjo will hesitate and avoid any interaction with us human folk yet put an animal in front of him and his eyes light up, he flaps, he jumps, he laughs and delights in whatever fury four legged friend stands before him. 

Banjo has received a letter of offer from Smart Pups for an Autism Assistance Dog. This would be life changing for our family, especially Banjo. The Smart Pup is specifically trained to assist children living with Autism and their special needs. Contributing to this campaign would be contributing to the independence of this little soul and giving him the gift of a constant companion and best friend.

What We Need & What You Get

It costs around $25000 dollars to raise and train an Autism Assist Dog. We (the receiving family)  are required to fund a minimum of $15000 to go towards the training of these special animals.

Once we have raised our contribution of $15000 a Smart Pup will be purchased and it will begin to be trained for the specific needs of Banjo. 

I am setting up a facebook page 'A Best Friend For Banjo' so you can follow Banjo's journey to receiving a Smart Pup - Autism Assistance Dog, and beyond. 

If we are unable to reach our entire goal with this campaign we will continue to fundraise until we have reached it. It will just mean a longer wait until Banjo can be united with his best friend. Be assured, we will not give up on this goal.  

The Impact

*Smart Pups - Autism Specific Skills

Disrupt particular behaviours on your command either by “nuzzle”, “lap”, “kisses” or “over” depending on what works best for your child.

 [Nuzzle –nuzzle the child with his nose; Lap –rest his head on the lap of the child; Kisses – dog licking; Over – the dog will lie across the child as the pressure of the the dogs body can be soothing and calming]

To wear a harness to which your child can be secured to gain some independence from holding your hand when out and about and assist with any urge to run.

*Smart Pups- General skills

To be reliable and well behaved to be able to live in the house with your family

To reliably respond to Sit, Down, Sit Stay, Down Stay, Come, Heel and Stand

To be House trained and trained to go to the toilet on command

To do tricks such as High Five, Shake, Roll Over, Play Dead etc. to allow your child to be able to play with their assistance dog

Sleep beside your child and help them relax at night

Smart Pups are certified for Full Public Access granting them admission to accompany you and your child through shops, in restaurants, at school etc.

Other Ways You Can Help

Please share and help make a Smart Pup Autism Assistance Dog a reality for Banjo.

Thank you!

story:
In today's fast-paced world, we need to stay organized, avoid clutter, and look our best. Traditional wallets are designed for an older time, when pockets were stuffed full of cash, coins, loyalty cards and photos of your grandma. 

Tribe Wallet 4.0 breaks the mold, with minimalist engineering that will slim your pockets and start conversations. 

The elegant design is perfect for travel, events, and everyday adventures. You will never want to leave the house without it. 

Criminals are using wireless skimmers to
steal private data from credit, debit, and ID cards. 

Tribe Wallet 4.0 shields RFID chips in your cards from transmitting, fully protecting you from wireless data theft. 

Seriously easy and addictive. Just pop the cards up from the notch, pinch at the bottom and your cards will fan out like a peacock for quick access to any card. 

Need a place to hold that spare key? Use the money bars (on the front and back) to hold your extra's securely. You can store cash, keys, coins, and receipts behind the bars. It's super tight and won't let anything go. 
 
 

>>> PRESS KIT <<<

 
 

>>> PRESS KIT <<<

story:
My Name is Angel Alcalá, I was born on October of 1991 in the town of Brawley, CA & raised in Tepatitlán De Morelos, in the province of Jalisco, México, and moved to Las Vegas in 2003. I have had admiration towards the arts since early in my life, but I would like to pursue a career as an installation, and performance artist as well as a fashion designer, but I'd like to be referred as a "Multidisciplinary Artist" I draw most of y inspiration for my work from the internet, art movements (Baroque, Dada, Minimalism, New Aesthetic) and History, as well as load my work with as much symbolism as I can possibly process. I dream of one day being a well-known within the international art & design industry, and support the arts in every way possible just the way they helped me to find purpose to my life.

 

     This event is the most ambitious and elaborate even I have set up on my own. It will be the Launch for my Brand ANARCHALA.

 

     Based on the ideals of 'anarchy', ANARCHALA is a conceptual idea that goes against
the mainstream ideals & standards of art & fashion by challenging the social perception of what is art & fashion, often combining both of the crafts and their numerous disciplines to evoke a certain emotion and to challenge the viewer to experience the world from a different point of view.

 

     With your monetary support, I will be able to purchase the necessary supplies & amenities to achieve a professional show, as close as the name-brand international fashion shows. some of the items include:

 

Fabric
Shoes
Accessories
Sewing Supplies
Painting/Dying Supplies
Hair & Makeup Team
Set Design
Invitations & Show Programs
Look Books for Clients
Hor Dourves

 

     I also plan to share this event with talented local up & coming designers, to help them kick-start their artistic endeavors in the art and fashion industry.

 

     If you cannot help with a monetary donation,I completely understand, it is tough for all of us out there, but you can simply SHARE this page to all of your friends in your social media sites, co-workers, and loved ones. I believe there is a strong sense of community support among the Las Vegas population, and I would be eternally grateful for those of you that help out getting the word out there.

story:
Discover Where The Unmistakable Good Taste of Italian Style & Ethics Become One.

Our Dream: Innovation + Italian Tradition need Your Help to expand out of Italy!   Step One: USA EDITION !!!

Opificio V Milano was born in September 2013 in a small italian city between the lake of Como and Milano with the purpose to create great shoes.

We only trust in Italian artisans, specialists that perpetuate a unique tradition, who use the best quality materials, which they cut, work, and sew by hand. Every single object becomes a unique piece and in all its details reveals a centuries-old tradition of craftsmanship and of great attention given to each step.

The selection of materials is the focus point of our collections: We strongly believe that innovation could help us to improve our every day objects. So We choose only the best materials available with one condition: these must be cruelty free. 

Today it is possible to have style, craftsmanship and to be also ethical.

We started this campaign because We need Your help to grow outside Italy, and need some  funds to presents our collections in :

1) America

2) Australia 

3) Asia 

We wanna start from USA, so we need to spend one month or more (if we can) around major cities to show our shoes.  What remains from sales ( - costs of products and Indiegogo's fee) will be used for:

- Flight from Milan to New York then from New York to LA for 2 people and return

- Rent a Minibus

- Hotels

- Sending shoes

If You can't help us with a donation, please share with all your friends this campaign...first of all to all your veg* friends ;-)

You know....sometimes life is hard....veg* life is a little bit harder...but with a stylish italian shoes on your feet everything is much easier...!

See our Perks:

They are made of durable cellulose fiber washable at 30 ° in the washing machine.
Use them as containers, as pot covers, as breadbox, as holding objects .. when You do not need any more You can fold them and put them back in the closet. 
For this production we chose a partner particularly attentive to the environmental impact of their work.  

Here some example of how You could use them:

        

Feminine, comfortable and .... with a touch of magic ... the boot keeps the foot temperature during the cold winter days ... for our "always cooled" feet ! 

Choose the "must have" of this year "above the knee boot" or the more Traditional "below the knee boot" ... . and save 100 Euro !

Colors Available: Black, Grey/Brown or Burgundy

Go on the site www.opificiov.com and choose 2 or 3 models You like, don't worry if You don't find your size, We will produce it for You!


Your dream came true! You are now the designer and We are Your Genius of the Lamp!  You are at the very center of the process, and the future shoe will be created according to the morphology of your foot. We will send You an easy auto-measurements file, don't worry...it is very easy and We will create first a prototype You will try on before the final shoes is made.
After 6 months of work, bespoke shoes are ready to be delivered to You. Each pair comes in a box customized with Your the name.

story:
Apollo Litestyle is a customization creative LED-Tecknowledgy company that illuminates your shoes and your style. Our audience are those who appreciate self-expression and a great pair of kicks. We know your shoes are more than just things that protect your feet. They are the foundation of your style. Do you know anyone who’s got true style and wears a bland pair of kicks?

 
We wanted light shoes that fit our own personality and style. We couldn't achieve our goal by manufacturing shoes, so we just modified our own. We lit up our favorite shoes and fell in love. We know you’ll love it too.

Our PURPOSE is to light up YOUR style, celebrate those who are not afraid to strut their stuff, and create the things we love. Empower, express and celebrate your unique style.


We create LED circuits and install them in the bottom of your shoes! The transition is seamless. The circuit is thin enough so you can’t tell that anything was installed, but the LEDs are bright enough to command the attention of an entire room of people. The main components of our LED circuits consist of:

  • Light Emitting Diodes (LEDs)
  • CR2032 batteries
  • Mini Rocker switches

Note: Even if we don't reach our funding goal, you will still get your perks!   This is our passion and we light up shoes everyday.



It’s as easy as 1-2-3...4

  1. Choose your color, pattern, and LED count on our website.

  2. We'll email you a shipping label. Package your shoes in a box, slap the label onto it, and send it to us. 

  3. Your shoes will undergo our LED installation process.

  4. We send your shoes back to you. Turn on your style!


Shipping and handling is included in our service.  As of right now, we only are taking orders and ship within the US. Over the months following the Indiegogo project we will email shipping labels to our supporters. Simply package your shoes in a box and send them to us. We'll handle the rest!



Your pledges will go towards creating a manufacturing operation for a faster turnaround time; more options for customization; and a place to show off your style on our website!

  • Inventory and Machinery - We need lights! Your contributions will be used to buy enough LEDs, batteries, switches, and all the components needed to customize shoes for the masses. Approximately $15,000 will be used to order machinery such as drill presses and industrial spot soldering machines.  

    As of right now we install everything by hand, which can take several hours.  With your help, we can create an operation that will allow shoes to be customized in less than an hour and returned to you days after we receive them.

  • Research and Development - Yes, we have big plans for our customization options. We want to offer more LED colors, but adding more colors requires more money. Also, your pledges will be used to increase the impact and water resistance of our circuits.

    Our circuits are water resistant and can handle activities such as skateboarding, jumping, running, and dancing. However, we have damaged the circuits during our high impact tests. Our goal is to create circuits that can handle more force and be immersed in water without taking damage.

  • Adding Shoes to the Lineup - We want our circuit to work for any shoe, however they’re only compatible in shoes with thick soles. Basically, they need a good foundation. Your pledges will help us buy newer and thinner LEDs, allowing us to light up any shoe!

    We also plan to give you the ability to choose your circuit layout.  That means you’ll be able to pick where you want each LED to be laid out during the ordering process.

  • Website Design - And finally, we plan on building a community where you can show off your sweet kicks. This works by creating a page where all of our customers can upload their own pictures and style info. This way, inspiration is easily searchable. Looking for shoes designed by longboarders? Search the style page!

 


As of right now we only have a few customization options available. We have 6 LED colors and 2 different circuits fresh out of the oven and ready to go. For supporting us, here's what you can receive:



Walking shoes with solid soles work best.  Choose something you can be active in! Also, the sole should be AT LEAST 3/4 inch thick!  If the soles are too thin, the LEDs will slip out (TOMS are a little too thin). Feel free to send us pictures of your shoes. We’ll help you make a decision.  Here are a few more guidelines:

    • Clean
    • No Nike Frees or dress shoes
    • Best if insole is removable or easy to remove.
    • No cleats

Not sure if your shoes are compatible? We'll answer your questions. Email us at info@apollolitestyle.com

These shoes are too worn out.

*Note: It's difficult to install lights in the tips of shoes with long toe boxes (see below). We do not want to risk damaging the shoe. To solve this, we install clusters of lights in the heels of this particular shoe type.

Shoes with Long Toe Boxes (Front Tip of the Shoe)


Everyone has their own style. We want to express and encourage that on our website. To do that, we plan on giving all of our customers a "spot light" on the site to showcase their talent and style. Here is an example:



These circuits were made to show off your style. However, keep in mind that there is advanced circuitry underneath your sole. Here are some suggestions for activities that look awesome with some color:



We are artists, average Joe’s, gamers, hooligans, and some of us are engineers. We love thinking creatively and are constantly looking for ways to make things fun. We embrace individuality, but find it hard to be unique and special when everyone else is unique and special too. Modifying our shoes is an outlet for our creativity, and we want to help people illuminate their style.



The circuits have been tested and we know the product is ready to market. Value it as a premium.

  • No long term exposure to water

These circuits were made to show off your style. However, keep in mind that there is advanced circuitry underneath your sole. Here are some suggestions for activities that look awesome with some color:
We are artists, average Joe’s, gamers, hooligans, and some of us are engineers. We love thinking creatively and are constantly looking for ways to make things fun. We embrace individuality, but find it hard to be unique and special when everyone else is unique and special too. Modifying our shoes is an outlet for our creativity, and we want to help people illuminate their style.

The circuits have been tested and we know the product is ready to market. Value it as a premium.

No long term exposure to water

story:
I have always wanted a step-and-repeat for Samba Fogo.  To me, it is a visual representation of how far we have come as a professional performing arts company.  We have been taking pictures in front of our Sponsor Banner for years because we are a visually exciting group.  The next level is a step-and-repeat to enhance the quality of our photographs at our events and continue the growth of Samba Fogo.

What is a step-and-repeat?: Think of Sundance Film Festival, or any of the product launches or movie premiers you have seen photographed.  A step-and-repeat is what people and celebrities are standing in front of when they get photographed.  Ours will have our logo many times over and give people at our events the chance to have their own celebrity moments with our performers.

CHALLENGE:

Our biggest challenge for this project: time! We are under pressure to raise the funds and get this baby printed in time for our show, opening April 17th. We have found a local print shop in Utah to do it for us, but we need the funds first!  WE ARE HOPING TO GET 50 PEOPLE TO DONATE $10 EACH IN JUST TEN DAYS... PLEASE HELP US DO IT!

story:
Short Summary

TriOwl™ born to offer customers TWO unique elements and a call to action experience: 

  • Purchase a piece of clothing made with 100% Peruvian Pima Cotton, the best and finest cotton in the world. 
  • TriOwl will DONATE UP TO 50% OF ITS NET PROFITS to rescue abandoned kids in Latin America.     

Made with 100% Peruvian Pima Cotton

TriOwl™ garments are 100% made with the most exclusive and refined cotton in the world: the Pima Cotton, a type originated and grown primarily in Peru. Pima is considered one of the superior blends of cotton. The exclusive Peruvian Pima cotton is a hypoallergenic product that benefits from the most extraordinary features. Its length, texture, and softness make it the most fresh, comfortable and durable cotton fiber in the world.​  

Racerback Tank (Available in Black, Gray, White, Tan and Army Green) (Sizes: XS, S, M, L, XL)

Short Sleeve Tee (Available in Black, Gray, White, Tan and Army Green) (Sizes: XS, S, M, L, XL)

Long Sleeve Pocket Tee (Available in Black, Gray, White, Tan and Army Green) (Sizes: XS, S, M, L, XL)

Slit Tee (Available in Black, Gray and White) (Sizes: XS, S, M, L, XL)

Trapeze (Available in Black and Army Green) (Sizes: XS, S, M, L, XL)

​We are convinced that a business can be a way to show love to others

TriOwl™, Clothing With a Purpose, is committed to participate actively in a huge project to help orphans, abandoned and extremely poor kids in Latin America, donating a scale from 10% to 50% of its net profits to TriOwl Homes Foundation for the maintenance and management of homes with Foster Parents. These homes will provide them with everything they need to achieve success in life, including an education based on values that bring them closer to the love of God and form them spiritually, in order to live a happy, rewarding life.

Short Sleeve V-Neck (Available in Black, Gray, White and Navy) (Sizes: S, M, L, XL, XXL)

Short Sleeve Crew-Neck (Available in Black, Gray, White and Navy) (Sizes: S, M, L, XL, XXL)


Classic Polo (Available in Black, Navy, Royal Blue, White and Grey) (Sizes: S, M, L, XL, XXL)

Henley (Available in Black, Gray, Navy and Army Green) (Sizes: S, M, L, XL, XXL)



The Impact

All countries in the world face different social issues. The major social challenge in Latin America are “Street Kids”: orphans, abandoned and extremely poor children who do not have a family to raise them as good citizens. Studies claim there are as many as 7 to 8 million “Street Kids” in Latin America.

TriOwl™  will fund TriOwl Homes, orphanages that will operate as homes, with voluntary foster parents who will “adopt” orphan Street Kids. 

Foster Parents will move to TriOwl Homes in Latin America (Perú, Guatemala, Bolivia, Nicaragua, etc.). They will be mentored based on biblical principles and trained by licensed professionals who will design a model, with psychological and educational counselors who will be consistently in contact with foster parents in each TriOwl Home.

Homeless kids will enjoy the love and care that parents can give them. Clothing, food, and education will be provided, and the kids will be transformed in a positive way by becoming an example of love and success.

Risks & Challenges

Our crew is made up of seasoned business leaders, fashion designers, and supply chain experts with over 30 years of entrepreneurial and manufacturing experience, so you can rest assured that TriOwl garments will exceed your expectations.

We have selected providers and manufacturers who will ship within 60 days of successful project funding, so that you can enjoy your garments starting March of 2016 or earlier.

*** What you are looking at are models and samples, so you can count on the final product to be better in all aspects and details--such as a tiny embroidered logo of our nice Owls on the bottom of the garments.

You will love your TriOwl clothes since it is of extreme importance to us that, from the very beginning, our customers trust that each time they purchase any of our products, they can be sure that every TriOwl piece will always be a synonym of high quality.

Other Ways You Can Help

In the close future, when TriOwl begins commercial activities, we will create TriOwl Homes Foundation, an organization with the capacity to receive donations directly from institutions, companies or people.

story:
Who Is Zombease And What We Do

Zombease.com is dedicated to providing the best Zombie and survival/preparedness related information available today. This includes gear reviews, medical guides, DIY or Die Trying projects, news reports, survival guides, and much more. No matter what comes your way, undead or otherwise, I will make sure that you make it through the day.

What We Need & What You Get

I'm celebrating 2 amazing years helping others learn to outlive the undead, along with building an amazing community of fellow survivors and like-minded anti-Zombie aficionados. Help me continue to do what I do best, assist others in their survival, and celebrate the amazing success of the Zombease.com over last two years.

All funds raised on Indiegogo will go directly towards fullfilling the reward levels and taking care of the operational expenses needed to help keep Zombease growing.

A look at some of the rewards you can claim:

  • Limited Edition made-to-order Zombease T-shirt (S, M, L, XL, 2XL, 3XL, and 4XL. Sizing determined at the close of pre-orders).*
  • Limted Edition made-to-order Zombease Hoodie (S, M, L, XL, 2XL, 3XL, AND 4XL. Sizing determined at close of pre-orders).
  • Zombease sticker packs.
  • Signed "Thank You" letter from Zombease founder and primary writer, Jake Sepulveda.

*note that design many vary slightly due to pressing constraints.

Funding - It's friends and fellow survivors like you that make a real difference in the world, Zombease wants to continue to be a part of that. Pre-ordering/pledging today, will help Zombease continue to grow as I research and develop new and exciting ways to outlive the undead, survival the seemingly unsurvivable, and help the world experience what it means to be a survivor first-hand.

Other Ways You Can Help

We know that not everyone can contribute financially, but you can still help. Share our campaign and website with your friends, family, and fellow survivors and don't forget to visit us at http://zombease.com.

Remember... we're all in this together, and together we can make it out alive!

Find Zombease online at:

Facebook - http://www.facebook.com/zombease

Homepage - http://www.zombease.com

Youtube - https://www.youtube.com/user/Zombease

Twitter - https://twitter.com/Zombease

story:
HOW I GOT STARTED: 

The Wing Maxi was created as a direct result of a problem encountered by its founder: The pain of experiencing accidents every month during monthly menses. In 2014, Veronica Berry set out to fix the problem and The Wing Maxi was born. Our goal is to relieve women of a few tasks by delivering The Wing Maxi, along with other comforts, to your doorstep- to simplify your life and bring more delight to every day. Our dream is to re-define the "feminine hygiene brand" and create something - with you - that's better for all women, everywhere.


THE HARSH REALITY:


                                         PERIODS SUCK! 

                                                

 Having accidents while on your period sucks even more! More than 10,000,000 women suffer from heavy menses each month, making it difficult to go about their daily lives. Almost half of women with heavy periods said they have to change their tampons or pads seven to nine times a day during the day and 76% have to wake up 1 to 3 times during the night.   


THE PRODUCT:

The solution is The Wing Maxi. A uniquely designed, patent pending maxi pad that eliminates accidents for women.

                                                  



FUNDING GOAL:

Our goal of $30,000 will allow us to:

Approximately $5,000 will go towards rebuilding a working prototype.

Approximately $5,000 will go towards FDA Regulation.

Approximately $15,000 will go towards manufacturing cost and building inventory.

Approximatelt $2,000 will go towards Beta Testing.

Approximately $3,000 will go towards Indiegogo fees.


Stretch goal of $100,000:

Extend our Beta Test market.

Build out inventory for ecommerce site.

Re-build ecommerce site and online store.

Build app.


THE IMPACT:

Your pledge will help us prove proof of concept for the product. We have conducted extensive customer discovery for the past 3 months and our discovery shows women are interested in a solution that eliminates accidents. We also discovered that women want convenience and confidentiality, therefore, we will be offering a subscription based service that allows women to shop for products in the comfort of their home and have it delivered directly to them.


RISKS AND CHALLENGES:

The greatest challenge we currently face is difficulty gaining the funding we need to start our ecommerce store without beginning the business with large amounts of debt. Our vision for The Wing Maxi is to be the standard pad for women with heavy menses around the world. This dream will move forward with your support.


OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP:

Obviously, dollars are important but so is your ongoing support. Please forward our campaign on to your friends and family! Share the word!


THE TEAM:

Veronica Berry, Founder and Creator of The Wing Maxi

Dr. Tyndal M. Jones, R.N., M.D, Medical Advisor

Janis Berry, CFO


We're committed to servicing women for years to come and are excited to bring this product to market. With your help, we can make this dream a reality.


Be Yourself, Know Yourself, Love Yourself!

Veronica Berry

story:
Featured In:

                

About the project

We present to you VIDI Watches project. We have designed our first line of watches called Hero. These are attractive, contemporary and affordable wristwatches, which will contribute to a complete styling giving it a personal touch.

During our Indiegogo campaign you can order these watches and be among the first to have them at a much lower price, than they would cost at retail. There is also a fantastic packaging which we designed specially for the VIDI watches. Plus, you have a chance to get a free Hero watch during our Indiegogo campaign. 


Do you like original things?

If your answer is yes, then these watches are right thing for you. Large cases, easy-to-read numbers, paired with leather straps, these watches can be worn on different occasions. The choice is yours. These watches will certainly not remain unnoticed on your arm.

We are especially proud of our Globall™ packaging in which will be placed VIDI watches. This packaging is the result of months of research, and a bunch of sketches searching for the right design. Our Globall™ packaging seeks to show how ordinary things can be beautiful. 

VIDI Globall™ packaging

VIDI watches are first available in three different colors: Steel, Gold and Black/Brown. These watches are something that you can use as well for work or everyday life.

VIDI Steel Hero watch

VIDI Gold Hero watch

VIDI Black/Brown Hero watch

That's why we do all this, for people who love and appreciate original things as we do.

Note! The photos in campaign are computer renderings of watches and packaging. These photos show how the Hero watches and Globall™ packaging will look like. 


We need your support!

To launch VIDI Watches and start production of the watch Hero, we need at least $10000.

With the funds we receive, we will be able to follow through the design process until completion of the product. Any additional funds will be used to help us develop a new line of VIDI watches. 

So, please help us to reach our goal. 


    Why the name Hero for wristwatch?

    This wristwatch is inspired by heroes. According to what they got their name. Dedicated to all the small and big heroes from real life, who daily do good and brave deeds.

    We all have our heroes that we love, respect and admire them for their work. That hero can be your friend, neighbor, someone from your family. Or maybe just you. All of us at some point of our lives want to be heroes, to do something we'll be proud of. These watches will remind you on that.


    Specifications for Hero watch:

    • Case material: 316L stainless steel 
    • Case width: 45mm excluding crown
    • Case thickness: 14mm
    • Movement: Japanese Miyota
    • Crown: 6 x 9.5mm
    • Glass: Mineral glass
    • Strap: Finest genuine leather (with steel buckle)
    • Strap width: 24mm
    • Water resistance: 10ATM / 100m / 330ft
    • Warranty: 1 year 

    Your Hero watch will be delivered with a 1 year warranty in our unique and amazing designed Globall™ packaging.


    Referrals: Chance to get a free VIDI watch!

    This is great opportunity to get a free Hero watch from us!

    Indiegogo has some great tech that helps us track where our backers come from. With this technology we can give you rewards for spreading the word!

    In order for Indiegogo's tracking technology to work, you have to use the Share buttons up at the top of our campaign (right under the main campaign picture) and you have to be logged in.

    Note! You don't have to be a backer to earn rewards! Just be sure to be logged in when you share our campaign, using the share buttons. 


    About the first watch company from Montenegro 

    We are coming from Montenegro, very small country in South East Europe. Montenegro is best known for its beautiful and untouched wild nature, tourism and quality wines.

    VIDI Watches project is founded with the idea to offer original, high quality, but also affordable watches.

    The idea was born over a year ago, as the result of a great love for watches. On this project worked a lot of people of different professions, with one purpose: to make a phenomenal watches for people who appreciate authentic stuff.

    Our dream is that one day our watches are available worldwide, by improving innovation and retaining originality. 


    Frequently Asked Questions


    1. When will I get my VIDI watch?

    Our goal is to ship the watches to our supporters in January 2015.

    2. How can I choose color of my watch?

    We will send out a survey after the end of campaign.

    3. I forgot to pay for international shipping. What should I do?

    We suggest selecting the $1 perk to do that. For shipping inside Europe please add $10, for outside Europe please add $20 to your contribution.

    4. What's the warranty?

    Warranty period of the watch is 1 year. In case of any problems, send your watch to us for repair or replacement.

    5. From which material will be made Globall™ packaging?

    It will be made from high quality plastic materials.

    6. When will be finished website for VIDI Watches?

    We have already started with the development of our site. We hope that by the end of our Indiegogo campaign will be completed.


    Thank you!

    We would like to thank every backer for any contribution and any assistance in the realization of our project. Please share our project on Twitter and Facebook. 

    Spread the word and tell your friends about VIDI Watches project!

ago, as the result of a great love for watches. On this project worked a lot of people of different professions,
with one purpose: to make a
phenomenal watches for people who appreciate authentic stuff. 

Our dream is that one day our watches are available worldwide, by improving innovation and retaining originality. 

Frequently
Asked Questions

1. When will I get my VIDI
watch?
Our goal is to ship the
watches to our supporters in January 2015.
2. How can I choose color of
my watch?
We will send out a survey
after the end of campaign.
3. I forgot to pay for
international shipping. What should I do?
We suggest selecting the $1
perk to do that. For shipping inside Europe please
add $10, for outside Europe please add $20 to
your contribution.
4. What's the warranty?
Warranty period of the watch
is 1 year. In case of any problems, send your watch to us for repair or
replacement.
5. From which material will
be made Globall™ packaging?
It will be made from high
quality plastic materials. 
6. When will be finished
website for VIDI Watches?
We have already started with the development of our site. We hope that by the end of our Indiegogo campaign
will be completed.




Thank you!
We would like to thank every
backer for any contribution and any assistance in the realization of our
project. Please share our project on Twitter and Facebook. 
Spread the word and
tell your friends about VIDI Watches project!

story:
Hemheist is changing the way women view themselves and how they shop online, one fashionable garment at a time. As a result, we hope to inspire an industry to push forward in a more conscious direction. 

From the desert of Arizona, I moved to LA when I was 19 and became a fashion designer. I started out by designing for other companies, then I started my own clothing line. With a little bit of luck and tons of hard work I was able to get my line into stores like Macy's, Nordstrom, Dillard's, Anthropologie and others.

Then something happened. I realized that I was not in control of my destiny. I was not working in a way that made a positive impact in the lives of others and, specifically, those who produced my designs. 

I knew I needed to make a change. Hemheist is that change.  

I also learned quickly that the typical required measurements of a model in the fashion industry were really unattainable for most women. So many of my friends and family had such a hard time identifying with what they saw in the fashion industry as "beautiful." I decided that I could not contribute to these impossible standards.

So here we are now, we need your support so we can finally launch Hemheist.com properly, make a much needed change in the fashion industry and inspire other corporations to make more conscious decisions with their business models.

We need the support of at least $25,000.00 to help with the following needs:

  • Produce our first collection of clothing for women of all sizes.
  • Have a kick a** photo shoot that includes a true representation of the various sizes that real women are. 
  • Enhance and add some personalization features to our website.
If we don't reach our goal, the funds will at least go to the new all size inclusive photo shoot to get the website as close as possible to showing our true vision.

    You can contribute to our journey and receive some beautiful styles made by our fair labor team. All the garments are available in Sizes P, S, M, L, XL, 1X, 2X, 3X, 4X

    Together we can make change in an industry that needs it. Here are some other ways your contribution will help:

    • We have plans to implement programs that will give back to the economic growth and contribute to the overall well-being of the underrepresented.
    • We are partnering with experts that are aligned with our dedication to social impact and can lead us on our journey to create change for the better.

        I have have had success selling my designs with my last company, so your support will not go to waste.

        If you can't contribute to this campaign, there are other ways you can help:

        • Put the word out and make some noise about this campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and other social media platforms. Don't forget to use the Indiegogo share tools at the top of this page right below the video :) It makes it quick and easy!
        • Please follow us on our social channels.

        "I think @Hemheist has won me over! Clearly I am in their target audience."

        "@Hemheist disrupting online fashion to help women of ALL SIZES. Yes, Please!"

        "It's not like I don't want to lose weight, but why do I have to feel bad while I am trying? Seeing models like me will help me feel better."

        Shoot an email over to info@hemheist.com.

        Thank you so much for taking the time to review our campaign. 

        Together, we can help empower women to embrace what they see in the mirror and improve the lives of the underrepresented that are making the products that we love.

        With Love & Determination,
        Jackie Gutierrez

story:
About Kaiwerx Studio, Kai Wolter and the Launch of Biomorphic Adornment.

 

The creator of Biomorphic Adornment

☆ I am Kai Wolter of Kaiwerx Studio. I'm an artist metalsmith, and I create contemporary jewelry and sculpture. I studied metalsmithing and jewelry at the University of The Arts in Philadelphia and attended Cranbrook Academy of Art for ​a Masters in Metalsmithing. 

 

☆ Kaiwerx Studio was established in Santa Fe, New Mexico in 2008 for the creation of my hammered biomorphic sculpture. I have been learning and creating in metals for over 25 years. Over these years of study and making, my work has been exhibited internationally, and I have  taught metalsmithing and sculpture.

Since graduate school, I have focused on making sculpture, created about and in relation to the body in a large series of hammered, organic abstraction sculptures called Epidermal Planes.

Biomorphic Sculpture-Epidermal Planes

☆ For the past year, I have worked on a large body of work in sculptural jewelry and developed Kaiwerx Studio’s first contemporary jewelry line:

BIOMORPHIC ADORNMENT

 

 

 

 

Biomorphic Adornment 

Bold, sensuous, organic, modern primitive statement jewelry

 For those in search of unique style and personal expression with an appreciation for handcrafted contemporary jewelry.

 

 

 

 

 

 

  


 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

➢ Kaiwerx Studio and the sculpture of Kai Wolter website, www.kaiwerx.com  

➣ Kaiwerx Studio on Instagram page at https://www.instagram.com/kaiwerxwolter/

 

Design and Natural Motif

☆  While a teenager the inspiration for creating began as I fell in love with adornment and jewelry making. With an acquired awareness and appreciation for the qualities of uniqueness and individuality, and an intense desire for working with my hands, I began my search for what is beauty and art.

From an empirical analysis of the natural world and a reverence for the beauty of nature, with explorations in the morphology of biological form and an immense passion for making with my hands, I set out to create objects that exemplify the human connection to nature and the expressive spirit.

☆ My passion for making evolved from the creative process and the creative problem-solving that comes with making unique objects. The desire to make, is to experience the growth and transformation of material into form. The metamorphosis of raw material into creations that appear to come alive is when the making of objects is the most exhilarating.

 

Imagination of Sensation

☆ With the Biomorphic Adornment Line, I am creating sculptural jewelry inspired by nature, that reflect a visual symbiosis with the body. Sculpture for the body with a vitality and sense of wonder. The Biomorphic Adornment line offers designer statement jewelry that merges organic form with contemporary design, for jewelry with a sense of timelessness combined with the sensuous, vitality of nature, for a look that is a unique and personal expression of the wearer.  

 

 Biomorphic Adornment- Tendril Collection

 

☆ Over the last year I created many of the designs that make up the Tendril Collection, the first collection of the Biomorphic Adornment Line. The Tendril Collection explores an abstracted tendril form as a sculptural line that visually corresponds with the body. Sinuous tapered lines or branches wrap around the wrist or the neck. Shimmering, dangling tendrils hang from the ears or a necklace.

☆ The Tendril Collection was created in the pursuit of beauty of organic form combined with contemporary design and high craft. With a variety of designs, in all forms of jewelry, ranging from signature pieces such as the Tendril Bracelet and one-of-a-kind statement pieces, the Tendril Collection was created for men and women in search of evocative style and individual expression with an appreciation for handcrafted contemporary jewelry.

    

The Tendril Collection. Visceral Nature, Sensational Vitality

☆ For examples of most of the Tendril Collection see the gallery below the video ☆

★ It is now time to take Kaiwerx Studio to the next level.The next stage is to launch the Biomorphic Adornment line and the first collection to the masses.

I am excited to introduce Kaiwerx Studio's Biomorphic Adornment: Tendril Collection to the men and women of the world. 

This is where I am seeking you for your generosity and support. ★

✾Please support Kaiwerx Studio by contributing to the Biomorphic Adornment Line Launch campaign!✾

 

Imagination/Techniques/Process/ Craftsmanship

☆ The stunning jewelry in this collection are handcrafted in bronze, sterling silver, and brass. With  accoutrements in natural stones, wood, shell, and fossils. The Tendril Collection was inspired by the sensation of the natural world and made by hand from nature.

The direct metal techniques used to create these objects are traditional methods of metalsmithing such as hammer forming, forging, and fabrication. My favorite process is hammer forming, therefore much of my work pertains to the transformation of material through forming and forging with hammers.

The metals are prepared and patterns cut, then hammered over steel and wood forming stakes and anvils. The hollow-forms created are then joined through welding and soldering. Other materials I incorporate are varied set natural stones such as hematite cabochons and raw crystals, carved wood forms, fossils such as trilobites and ammonites, shell, and sometimes found objects. These additional elements contribute to the dynamic of the sculptural jewelry forms.

          

 

The Studio Biz!  -What your generous contributions will be going towards.

Kaiwerx, The Art of Kai Wolter

☆ Kaiwerx Studio is a one person metalsmithing practice, yearning to grow. In my modest studio in the mountains I have worked long and hard to hone my skills and create designs that I feel are a true expression of my imagination and passion for nature and beauty. And now I want to share this creativity with you. I developed the Biomorphic Adornment line with dreams of beautifying the whole world. 

I am here now to ask you to support Kaiwerx Studio’s next stage plan, to launch the Biomorphic Adornment line to the world. To do this I am raising funds to market the Kaiwerx brand. These funds would go into establishing and promoting brand identity which would include an advertising campaign, acquiring relationships with sellers and stockists, that would sell and distribute the line, and creating a loyal clientele base with connoisseur's of adornment around the world. Your generous contribution will water the seed and make Kaiwerx Studio grow into a successful creative business.

 

What Kaiwerx Studio Needs & What You Get by donating.

☆ Kaiwerx Studio needs to raise $18,750 that will be allocated towards the expenses of moving into the next stage, The launch of the Biomorphic Adornment line with the first collection: The Tendril Collection.

Your contribution to this goal will allow me to reach the world fashion market with the Biomorphic Adornment line, promote the Kaiwerx Studio brand identity, by creating an advertising campaign and expand production for a higher sales volume and in return plant the seed to grow Kaiwerx Studio. 

❖ The allocation of the $18,750 is as follows: ❖

  • Marketing expenses include brand identity, packaging, promotion, and advertising. This includes hiring a marketing or sales representative, this expense would include many of the listed expenses in a bundle. For example, the marketing representative would do much of the advertising and promotional responsibilities, etc. The largest allocated portion will go towards marketing expenses.
  • Business expenses including online store/website (Shopify - e-commerce store/shop) maintenance and upkeep, social networking presence, transaction fees, and other business functions such as photography, packaging and shipping. Also includes, exhibition expenses such as entry and booth fees, transportation and display for trade shows, fairs and trunk shows.
  • Studio expenses toward production, research, and development in design. This also includes expansion of production facility such as acquiring tools for higher production. Updating and revising equipment and tools, repairing, tuning up, and upgrading.
  • Materials, including making most of the designs in silver.
  • In the future hire artisans to keep up the demand of a higher production volume demand.

Your generous contribution will also help make possible the future expansion of Kaiwerx Studio to include new jewelry collections, accessories, and objects for the home. I look forward to the growth and success of Kaiwerx Studio Jewelry and Metalsmithing and I hope you will support me on this journey.

⬇︎⬇︎ Scroll down for details on PERKS for your contributions ⬇︎⬇︎

⬇︎⬇︎⬇︎

❈ Thank you immensely for your contribution & support! ❈

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP KAIWERX STUDIO ACHIEVE THE GOAL AND GROW:

MAKE SOME NOISE FOR KAIWERX STUDIO

☆ Whether you contribute to the crowd fund for Kaiwerx Studio or not, you can still help me reach my goal. Emailing your friends and associates and referring them to my Indiegogo page is one way. The same is true with your social media pages. Tweets with a link to Indiegogo or posts on Instagram with the link will go a long way to bring people to my page.

☛  Indiegogo provides other ways with their SHARE TOOLS.  Check it out!  ☚

 

☞ ☞ ☞ ☞ ☞ ☞ PERKS ☜ ☜ ☜ ☜ ☜ ☜

❊  Check out these great perks for your gracious contributions:  ❊

➨$40.00 Contribution- Kaiwerx Studio Logo T-Shirt in your choice of black on white or white on black. 6 x 6 inch Kaiwerx Studio logo design.

                  

   

➨$55.00 Contribution- Kaiwerx Studio Biomorphic design T-Shirt. Kaiwerx Studio name and Biomorphic Sculpture detail image on front of white T-shirt.

 

➨$95.00 Contribution- Duel Perk!! Both the Kaiwerx Studio Logo T-Shirt in your choice of black on white or white on black, and the Kaiwerx Studio Biomorphic T-Shirt.

 

➨$100.00 Contribution- Your choice of cast iron Point Pendant on popcorn gunmetal chain. Two tones to choose from and varying sizes. Be sure to indicate specific choices when donating.

☟ There are only 7, so get one while you can! ☟

 

➨$120.00 Contribution- Hand Forged Brass Keychain with .925 silver link, small. 

☟ Choose one of the three. ☟

➨$145.00 Contribution- Hand Forged Brass Keychain with .925 silver link, large. 

☟ Choose one of the three. ☟

 

➨$200.00 Contribution- Small Bronze Tendril Pendant on gunmetal chain. 4 inch Tendril Pendant on 24 inch long chain.

➨$250.00 Contribution- Medium Bronze Tendril Pendant on gunmetal chain. 5.5 inch Tendril Pendant on 24 inch long chain. 

 

➨$300.00 Contribution- Bronze Tendril Cuff Bracelet, the signature design of the Tendril Collection. A single Tendril Bracelet made to your size, for men and women. Hand forged bronze. These are each individually hand made, no two are exactly alike.

 

➨$500.00 Contribution- Silver Tendril Cuff Bracelet, the signature design of the Tendril Collection. A single Tendril Bracelet made to your size, for men and women. Hand forged .925 silver. These are each individually hand made, no two are exactly alike.

❊ Get the Tendril Cuff Bracelet in .925 Silver.❊            ❊ Or the Branch Tendril Bracelet in .925 Silver. ❊ 

 

➨$325.00 Contribution-Medium .925 silver Tendril Pendant on gunmetal chain. 5.5 inch Tendril Pendant on 24 inch long chain.

 

➨$450.00 Contribution-Bronze Branch Tendril Cuff Bracelet, the statement piece bracelet design of the Tendril Collection. A Branch Tendril Bracelet made to your size. Hand forged in bronze.

 

➨$500.00 Contribution- Duel Perk!! Bronze Tendril Cuff Bracelet, the signature design of the Tendril Collection. A single Tendril Bracelet made to your size, for men and women. And the Small Bronze Tendril Pendant on gunmetal chain. 4 inch Tendril Pendant on 24 inch long chain. Hand forged bronze.

➨$550.00 Contribution- Duel Perk!! The Bronze Tendril Cuff Bracelet, the signature design of the Tendril Collection. A single Tendril Bracelet made to your size, for men and women. And the Medium Bronze Tendril Pendant on gunmetal chain. 5.5 inch Tendril Pendant on 24 inch long chain. Hand forged bronze.

➨$575.00 Contribution- Silver Branch Tendril Cuff Bracelet, the statement piece bracelet design of the Tendril Collection. A Branch Tendril Bracelet made to your size. Hand forged in .925 silver. 

➨$5000.00 Contribution- Biomorphic Sculpture of Kai Wolter from the Epidermal Plane Series. Small range size. This is the small size sculpture available from the Epidermal Plane Series. Please go to the website link for detailed information on each sculpture in the Sculpture Gallery of:  www.kaiwerx.com

1

➨$7000.00 Contribution- Biomorphic Sculpture of Kai Wolter from the Epidermal Plane Series. Medium range size. Choose from three options of medium size sculpture available from the Epidermal Plane Series. Please go to the website link for detailed information on each sculpture in the Sculpture Gallery of:  www.kaiwerx.com

1  2  3

➨$8000.00 Contribution- Biomorphic Sculpture of Kai Wolter from the Epidermal Plane Series. Large range size. Choose from three options of large size sculpture available from the Epidermal Plane Series. Please go to the website link for detailed information on each sculpture in the Sculpture Gallery of:  www.kaiwerx.com

1   2  3

➨$9000.00 Contribution- Biomorphic Sculpture of Kai Wolter from the Epidermal Plane Series. Large range size. This is the large size sculpture available from the Epidermal Plane Series. Please go to the website link for detailed information on each sculpture in the Sculpture Gallery of:  www.kaiwerx.com

1

 

☆ To see more of my work in jewelry and sculpture and see what's happening at Kaiwerx Studio, please visit my Instagram page at https://www.instagram.com/kaiwerxwolter/

If you're interested in seeing more of my sculpture work, please visit the sculpture of Kai Wolter Gallery on my website, www.kaiwerx.com

story:
OUR BRAND

Hi Everyone! 

As many of you may know we, Amy Surette and Giana Forgione, started a company called PLATFORM. Our main intention is to open a creative space, primarily for east coast dancers, to have a consistent training environment, explore different styles, and provide them with the correct tools to help influence their overall aesthetic on social media. PLATFORM is more than a space for dancers to develop their creative capacity. We are continuing to incorporate multiple artistic passions of ours into our company/brand, beginning with  “PLATFORM THREADS” our newest clothing line. 

To give you all some background, dancers in LA have the opportunity to train in beautiful studios and work directly with a videographer in class to get on camera experience before working professionally on set. They leave class with professionally filmed content that’s specifically branded with the trademark of the facility they train at. Dancers are then able to use quality filmed content to grow their social media platforms. New York has begun similar training styles but lacks some of the newer technologies and advancements such as lighting, special effects, and overall aesthetics. As dancers from the east coast, this is something we always wished we had access to, so it’s our goal to bring it here for the dancers who don’t have the opportunity to go elsewhere.

OUR MISSION

Aside from the training facilities, a lot of LA dancers show up to class wearing something “stylish” and “trendy” with the knowledge that they’ll be on camera. We understand that class is for training and you shouldn’t have to show up in full glam, however, New York is a fashion capital and we want to embrace it through dance. What if we designed clothes built for comfort and practicality that looked good in and out of the studio? Most importantly, what if we designed an all inclusive clothing brand not just for dancers, but for anyone who likes comfort and style?! This is what brings us to introduce you to PLATFORM THREADS - Athleisure Line. 

COVID-19 IMPACT

Across various industries, companies have had to adapt their operations to comply with social distancing protocols and stay afloat during an economic downturn. These conditions have made it difficult for many existing businesses to survive and even more difficult for new ones to open. We understand that launching a startup is a complicated task in the best of circumstances, and it's an especially complex process to tackle during COVID-19. We had to endure these challenges as we continued to push and market our workshop classes that unfortunately got canceled. We continue to stay on track and remain positive as we work extra hard to bring in the funds we need to give our company the potential it has to flourish, educate the dance community and incorporate a sense of style into comfortable, everyday clothing. 

OUR ASK

We have found that in the midst of this chaos, our most practical plan is to launch our clothing line while the world is still adjusting because; (i). More now than ever before, society is taking full advantage of online consuming. (ii) Due to the incline in people working from home, office attire went from traditional workwear to workout clothes. Athleisure quickly became the day-to-night, everyday attire for the average person. It is now that we ask for your consideration in helping us take off. Anything raised will go directly towards our clothing line which will assist in opening our physical space, bringing us closer to our dream. Our clothes will be completely manufactured from scratch. We’ve taken the time to sketch and create great quality, clean, sleek, timeless styles that are both comfortable and reliable. Any donation, no matter the amount, would be deeply appreciated. Your support will mean the world to us and we’ll continue to pay it forward. We hope you believe in us as much as we believe in our company! 

 

Love Always,

Amy Surette & Giana Forgione

PLATFORM

XX'

story:
Have a question that isn't listed here? Want to stay up to date?

Find answers to those questions and more on our successful Kickstarter by Clicking Here

 

Due to the recent outbreak of COVID-19, people have bought up thousands of disposable surgical masks, and while it's a good thing people are taking action to stay healthy, it's having a terrible impact on our planet.

That's why we designed the S.P.P.S (Sustainable Personal Protection System), an easy to use, made to order mask with machine-washable filters.

At first they were made for close friends and family with money out of our own pockets, but as time's gone on, more and more people are running out of masks, and can't find replacements for under $100. One of the main issues is that those masks are made in China, which means they need to be shipped overseas, raising the price, and even creating a risk that they could already be "contaminated". 

Color Examples:

 

 

The S.P.P.S uses a custom filter system, allowing you to reliably clean/sterilize the filters using only hot water and a home dishwasher.

Each filter canister is made up of 2 separate core containers, separated by  small pins. The design of the internal fins helps guide the hot water where it's needed, without sacrificing the integrity of the filter itself. 

This special design, combine with more conventional filtration systems using cloths and other types of mats gives the S.P.P.S all the benefits of your conventional face-mask, with almost no environmental impact. 

 S.P.P.A is not made for filtering out larger particles such as sawdust, metal shaving, or plastics. Due to how the filters are constructed, using the S.P.P.S in these types of environments will permanently damage the filters, making them unable to be used as intended.

NOW AVAILABLE IN BLACK

 

 

Staying healthy is important, saving the planet is also pretty good, so why not choose both? The S.P.P.S helps keep thousands of pounds of plastics out of the landfill, while also saving you money! 

Need another reason? We don't fill the air with pollutants by shipping items thousands of miles across the ocean. Even better than that, you're helping support small businesses in uncertain time. Thank you for reading this far, and we hope to see your name on the backers page soon.

 

 

 

 

After several iterations, we've come up with a mask that fits snugly around the users face, without getting uncomfortable to wear after a few hours of use. We've also changed smaller details (Seen Below), such as how the straps mount onto the mask itself. This new redesign is also extremely cost effective, and able to be assembled completely in-house.

Newest Version (White)

 

 

There was also an eye/face cover that was considered. After some testing along with the extra assembly time it creates, the eye covers were scrapped. Any benefits are heavily outweighed by the added price, and the massive slowdown on actually shipping them out.

 

Our Mission:

We started out as a small group of friends making masks and filters for our friends and family. Eventually word spread, and even more people wanted them made. Unfortunately, they cost far to much on their own, meaning we literally couldn't help everyone that needed it. This huge push from our neighbors inspired us to make constant iterations on our initial design, which has left us with an easy-to-build, simple to use mask that's affordable for everyone, assuming we get enough initial orders. Thank you for making it this far on our page, and we hope you stay safe, and have a wonderful rest of your day.

 

While our masks may be extremely effective, not even the most expensive hardware will keep you safe if used improperly. Here's a few tips to make sure you get the most out of the S.P.P.S.

 

Tips:

  • Make sure the mask is centered on your face, this assures the cleanest seal possible.
  • Put your hand over the vents on the filter and breath in. You shouldn't be able to feel any air flowing in through the outsides of the mask.
  • Make sure the straps are fastened tightly around your head, and aren't twisted around each other.
  • Do not move the mask around while you're outside or in an area you consider contaminated. 
  • Always use both straps to secure the mask to your face. 
  • After changing the filter, pull it downwards to make sure it's completely secured and sealed.

 

Using sites like Indiegogo, we can gather enough orders to keep our individual part costs as low as possible. This means we're able to create a viable, quality product, without having to charge far more than anyone would be willing to pay. 

Kickstarter also gives us a sort of "community hub" where people can ask questions, leave their feedback and ideas, and connect with us directly, making every part of the transaction as enjoyable as possible. 

 

Meeting delivery dates is important, especially for something as time sensitive as this. Luckily, assembly and shipping are fairly straight forward. All of our testing has been completed already, and our design is finalized. We may make small iterations while the campaign is live, just to be sure we deliver the best product possible, but overall, we shouldn't have any setbacks in assembly or shipping times. 
 

 Wanna help out even more? Feel free to share us on social media!

 

Risks & Challenges

If we get a few more orders than we're expecting, we may have to push our delivery date back by a few weeks. This shouldn't cause and substantial setbacks, and you'll receive a better quality product overall. Our goal is to prioritize quality over delivery speed. If any unforeseen circumstances arise forcing us to choose between shipping on time with a sub-par product, or delay and deliver the high quality equipment you're expecting, we'll choose the delay.
