story:
Choose Your Adventure. Choose Your Style. All you have to do is FOLD or SWITCH. It’s that simple. 

If you’re like us, you take your life with you when you leave the house. But, most days, you don’t need a full-sized, bulky backpack. URBANATURE by NIID has created the FOLD and SWITCH bags that complement each other and work together to simplify your life. They’re convertible and customizable bags that can be added together, expanded, or used singularly for everyday wear. We like to think of these bags as choose-your-own-adventure packs. You get to determine the storage capacity and style. All you have to do is fold or switch. It’s that simple.

How To Get Them 

By becoming a backer and picking a reward, you will essentially be pre-ordering one of these bags, backing this project not only gets you a special discount, you'll receive the bags before they're available in stores. Want to buy more than one? Check out Rewards & Add-ons.

We have no traditional investors. Instead, we launch products here on Kickstarter. The funds we raise not only go towards manufacturing, they also help us design future products.  

The FOLD / Sling or Messenger  

At a glance:  

  • Sling mode: fits a 10” iPad or tablet  
  • Messenger mode: fits a 15” laptop  
  • Innovative design
  • Quick access front and side compartments  
  • Anti-theft (hidden) back pocket for stashing your valuables Cushioned shoulder strap for comfort   
  • Waterproof coated polyester
  • Expandable front cover flap
  • Magnetic flip cover

 

 What makes the Fold<Sling Bag> so dope?

 

 

 

The SWITCH / Chest Pack - Laptop Sling -Waist Pack   

These interchangeable and ergonomic bags were designed for easy transitions. The SWITCH is for carrying the essentials. The Waist Pack and Laptop Sling, Chest Pack can be combined, attached and worn as an ultra-slim sling bag. While the Chest Pack is a bag all its own. 

The SWITCH / Chest Pack  

At a glance:

  • Interchangeable buckle  
  • Hypalon Phone Fetcher  
  • YKK Waterproof Zipper  
  • Leather Wrapping Side Pocket - iPad Mini Compatible  
  • Secure Magnetic Side Closure  
  • Slim fit to body

 

 What makes the Switch <Chest Pack> so dope?

 

The SWITCH / Laptop Sling

At a glance:

  • Fits a 13” laptop  
  • Expandable double layer  
  • Waterproof  
  • Anti-theft magnetic flap lock

 

What makes the Switch <Laptop Sling> so dope? 

 

The SWITCH / Waist Pack

At a glance:  

  • Fits the essentials— iPhone 7, car keys, ID  
  • Doubles as shoulder strap when attached to the Laptop Sling or Chest Pack  
  • Slim and no bulk

 

Specs 

FOLD

SWITCH

PRODUCT WARRANTY 

Here at NIID, we stand behind our products. If you are not 100% satisfied with the quality simply send it back and we will refund you, no questions asked. 

Production

Our Previous Design

For us, looking back at where we started, and where we ended up is always enjoyable. We started this particular journey with an idea and knew generally where we wanted to go. But the final products evolved and expanded, in great part due to feedback from our wonderful customers. We owe a great deal of our design to you and always welcome new ideas for the next product.

story:
AS SEEN ON

 

I- WHY DID WE CREATE BOSHIES

1. To elevate Middle Eastern culture, with style

Today, Arabs are not only losing touch with their cultural roots, but their voices are also getting lost in the global media climate. What better medium than fashion to help this generation tell its own story? BOSHIES is a modern Lebanese clothing brand that aims to reflect the diversity and spirit of the region, helping shift the conversation to a more positive note. By creating fashion pieces inspired by the Middle Eastern culture, BOSHIES is not only helping modernize Arab culture, but it also hopes to spread this culture accross the world.

To start with, we decided to put a contemporary spin on one of the staples of Middle Eastern clothing with the Boshie Hat: Our modern incarnation of the tarboosh can now be enjoyed by Middle Easterners and non-Middle Easterners alike. By mixing the talent of local artisans with unrivalled international techniques, we're helping to reimagine the collective Arab story.

 

THE HAT

 

1. BURGUNDY x Black stripes

2. BEIGE x White stripes

3. KHAKI x Red stripes

4. BLACK x Red stripes

 

 

AS WORN BY

THE BEANIE

 

1. BURGUNDY x Black or White stripes

2. DARK BLUE x Light Blue stripes

3. BLACK x Burgundy stripes

 

THE T-SHIRT

 

 

Love حب printed in velvet flock

 

2. To reclaim a narrative of our own

The Arab region boasts some of the most influential contributions to art and science as we experience them today, from the development of algebra and some of the earliest navigational and geographical charts, to the architectural design of the arcades and the artistry of glassware, ceramics, and textile weaves. But the dominant media narrative all too often forgets this legacy and contributes to a one-dimensional portrayal of what it means to be Arab, which is often conflated with the tropes of war, terrorism, and oppression, set to landscapes of deserts and camels.

In fact, the Arab world is actually a hub of artistic and entrepreneurial innovations, comprised of the ecclectic sounds of Lebanon's Mashrou Leila and Algeria's Babylone, the visual talent displayed at Jordan's National Gallery of Fine Arts and Beirut Design Week, and the technological innovations of UAE's Souq.com or the broader transportation application, Careem, just to name a few. No matter the sector, the region is full of creatives who are constantly redefining the past and present.

Despite this creative energy, there's a gap between the current generation and the work of its predecessors. The BOSHIES brand is here help us get inspired by everything that surrounds us old and new, as well as to bridge the gap between these worlds, offering an organic fusion of the elements which form our very identities.

I- WHERE DOES THE BOSHIE COME FROM

1. An icon of traditional masculinity

In 1826, the tarboosh was adopted across the Ottoman Empire. It came as an answer to the banned turban, which was deemed out-dated and unpractical. For over a century after that, the tarboosh spread throughout the Middle-East and North Africa. The universal nature of the tarboosh made it an ideal symbol for an otherwise ecclectic region.

Prominent high-profile leaders, members of the military, and other powerful social male figures took on the tarboosh as a symbol of pride and influence. Some of these notable people include Egypt's King Farouk and Gamal Abdel Nasser, as well as Lebanon's very own first president, Bechara el Khoury, and former prime minster, Riad el Solh. It was even worn by Turkey's founder, Mustafa Kemal Ataturk, in the days of his youth.

The post-colonial period (60'S-70'S) brought on a general decline in the wearing of hats as part of daily fashion whether it be in the West or the East. This naturally reflected in the ubiquity of the tarboosh in the Middle East. Today, at least 1 billion inhabitants and 30 countries of this world still have a strong collective culture of the tarboosh.

2. Turned into an unisex fashion accessory

Fast forward to the summer of 2016, when BOSHIES' founder Elias began re-designing the tarboosh producing the first prototype of the Boshie hat. With the collaboration of local artisans, these hats were carefully handmade, and featured in storefronts across Lebanon.

After the first Boshie hat's initial success, Elias and his team of artisans reinvented the tarboosh yet again, creating a winter Boshie hat, handcrafted out of wool. They then set out to gather feedback from the Lebanese market about his products, taking a look at sales records, customer reactions, and market trends.

With this new information in mind, they decided the Boshie hat's design could be made even better. So in 2017, joined by Boshies' new partner designer Diane, the team set to work on a new model for the Boshie hat.

The new design maintains the familiar shape of the tarboosh, with added elements like a rounded top and more defined borders for protection against the sun. The two hand-stitched strands on either side also serve as a throwback to the original tassels of the traditional tarboosh. The Boshie hat now comes in a variety of colors.

This new modernized Boshie hat has broken free the tarboosh from its macho identity, easy to wear by anyone from all around the world, including both men and women, old and young, Middle Eastern and non-Middle Eastern.

 

III- HOW DID THE BOSHIE HAT COME TO LIFE ?

2. Expert local craftsmanship

Lebanese artisans were once key to the region's art scene, creating some of its richest cultural artifacts. Today, these items are reduced to stereotypical Arab souvenirs. Artisans now, more than ever, are struggling to keep their craft alive and make ends meet. To change that, it was important to bring these figures back into the creative process. BOSHIES hopes to keep on producing not only hats, but inspiring artifacts and clothing based on Arabic heritage, all while utilizing local craftman's expert savoir faire and artistry.

2. And the finest international techniques

While the Boshie hat's origins are Lebanese, it was important to create the best possible version of the design. Searching for the most innovative techniques to create the perfect balance between authenticity and quality, Elias and Diane travelled to Bologna, Italy. There, they met up with renowned headwear expert Dana Jaker, who taught them everything she knew about finest techniques in creating hats, using top of the line tools and equipment along the way. Mixing these international techniques with local craftsmanship will truly allow BOSHIES to create a hat of the highest quality.

Who is Dana ?

With over 30 years of experience designing and shooting her own millinery labels, Dana Virginia Jauker is the go-to expert on quality hat creation. Her work is housed in some of the most exclusive stores in major fashion capitals, including Italy, London, Tokyo, and New York. Her designs have been featured in runway shows and in collections of fashion powerhouses like Romeo Gigli, Yohji Yamamato, Eric Tibush, Collection Privée, Daniela Bizzi, Giorgio Brat, and Borsalino. She also launched her own haute couture line in 2009 called Yesey.

3. The application of a meticulous production process

Taking what was learned from the seasoned headwear expert, the Boshie hat was created using the highest quality felt fabric. The material took on a bell shape, followed by molding using an expert block technique. Steam was then applied to the fabric, which allowed it to take the shape of the mold. After drying, two strands were carefully handstitched on either sides of the hat.

 

IV- THE TEAM

Who is Elias? Elias El Haddad is the founder and brand creator of BOSHIES. After growing up in Beirut, he moved to France at the age of 22 to pursue a Masters in Management. Later on, after ten years of living in Europe and working in the financial industry, Elias felt it was time to finally come back home. He returned to his hometown to contribute to a resurgence of entrepreneurial and artistic innovation which Beirut has witnessed over the last few years. With this in mind, Elias launched BOSHIES in 2016. Today, he manages the production of BOSHIES products and aims to move forward with a full line of neo Arabic casual wear, combining his passion for entrepreneurship, fashion, and the Orient.

Who is Diane? Diane Ferjane is BOSHIES' designer. Diane grew up in Paris until the age of 12, when she moved back to her native Lebanon. There, she attended ESMOD Fashion Design School, before going on to reimagine her own contemporary version of unisex Seroual pants. She went on to have a busy career in the fashion industry, training at the prestigious Maison Rabih Kayrouz, and winning the "Costumes et Mode" award from the Pierre Cardin Foundation for her work in the French-Egyptian movie, Dunia (2004). Before teaming with BOSHIES in 2017, Diane launched her own line which merged traditional Lebanese fashion with a contemporary twist, opening her eponymous boutique in Beirut.

IV- WHAT LIES AHEAD

1. Bringing the necessary tools to Lebanon

By contributing to this campaign, you'll help Elias and Diane provide world-renowned production knowledge to Lebanese artisans. This includes not only the know-how, but the actual machinery and tools needed to produce the Boshie hat, helping BOSHIES create more local jobs in the process.

2. An expanded line of modernized Middle Eastern apparel

Elias and Diane will also be able to expand their line and continue reimagining Arab fashion.This campaign will help the team break into the mainstream market, by offering modern takes on traditional Arab staples, from jog serouals and shirts, to abayas and more.

3. And who knows what else?

Innovation breeds innovation. With these new tools and techniques, the sky is the limit for a new wave of creative expression through fashion and beyond. In a nutshell, we are aiming to growing the BOSHIES brand to expand our revenue sources, which will allow us to find new ways to give back to our Middle Eastern community.

 

OUR COMMUNITY

 

THANK YOU

At BOSHIES, we are deeply thankful and grateful to the following key persons and friends who have been the watchful eyes and supporters of the brand.

A big BIG THANK YOU.

Hoda Farah, Janine Safa, IRAP, Naoum Farah, Kamal Farah, Anthony Chamie, Jad Chamie, Lyne Khabbaz, Ghaleb Ferjane, Emile Issa, Akl Family, Lea Bsaibes, Angélique Sabounjian, Elsa Osta, MIKA, Rabih Keyrouz, Aziza, Zahra Ghandour, Carmen Bsaibes, Fatima Bhutto, Aly Jaffal, Stephane Rolland, Caroline Labaki, Bruno Tabbal, Ingrid Bawab, Matteo El Khodr, Sophie Abi Chahine, Nayla De Freige, Fifi Aboud Dib, Nady Sokhn, Florence Masséna, Paula Nassif, Roy Azzi, Yasmine Saliba, Laetitia Mourad, Lama Zouein, Lea Chelhot, Soraya Hamdan, Christina Malkoune, Antoine Daher, John Owens, Maria Chamie, Mayas Ayyach, Georges Yazbeck, Paul Abboche, Mehdi Boufares, Dyala Badran.

story:
We launched our first campaign on Kickstarter and today we woke up to good and bad news... our Kickstarter campaign was finished... with 290% funding!!! Words can't express how grateful we are for every person who supported us, for every dollar invested in our company, for every feedback sent to us, for every belief and every word from our supporters and backers! They say: 'When you see a successful business, you must know that someone one day made a courageous decision" - and we believe in this. Our courageous decision was to launch our little baby-company on Kickstarter and wait for people's feedback... We received it and we are so proud and full of desire to move forward creating more and more new products! Dear customers, dear backers, YOU are our driving force, thank you for motivating us to work harder, to think bigger and to create more! And here is a little surprise: for those who did not get a chance to back out project, we are launching INDIEGOGO - IN - DEMAND for only 15 days to give you a chance to check out footwear out!

100% wool breathable thermoregulating footwear for ALL SEASONS.  Water resistant.  Odor resistant. No sweating, no cold feet.  Footwear Perfected.  

Thank you for visiting our page. Being a couple of women that wear all types of shoes, we found that we were always faced with a choice between comfort and style: the good-looking shoes hurt our feet and the comfortable shoes looked like, well, comfortable shoes.

We decided to create our own line of footwear that looks great, fits perfectly and is ethically sound. The result of our efforts is Wools - footwear that benefits from one of nature's most amazing material.

 Our brand was created for people who want to look stylish but do not want to sacrifice comfort. Whether you are running errands, attending an event or sitting through meetings, our footwear will help you accomplish what you planned for the day. 

WOOLS footwear brings together: design, fashion, function and being a voice for animals. Made of 100% wool with rubber soles, Wools footwear is made with simplicity, durability and comfort in mind. During the felting process, the natural woolen fibers shrink and entangle very tightly and firmly, making the shoes perfectly insulated and form fitting. These strong, natural fibers regulate temperature, keeping your feet warm without overheating in milder temperatures.

Wools footwear is designed to allow you to accomplish your things without ever worrying about the comfort and look of your shoes, while fulfilling a higher cause.

Your feet deserve the right shoes, shoes that look great, last for ages and fit perfectly. This has been the driving force behind WOOLS. When creating and developing our footwear, we wanted to bring people an ethically sourced shoe that would be durable and able to regulate temperature in any weather condition.   

We were inspired by pressed wool as the material that would check all the boxes because wool is a true masterpiece of nature. Here is why:

Sizing length measured from feet (inside the shoe) length

Womens:

Mens:

 This smart lace up shoe suits any formal occasion, from a high-powered board meeting to an evening event. Wools Paris features a classic contemporary shape without compromising on comfort. Internal freshness is maintained thanks to the 100% wool material. Available for men and women.

This lace-up shoe epitomizes casual refinement with an elegant modern look for the temperate climate. The Wools London low-top style does not sacrifice comfort. The 100% wool material helps keep your feet fresh, dry and happy all day long. Available for men and women.

Our warm and stylish winter boot takes you from day to night with ease. Super comfortable, Wools Ottawa boots are breathable, keeping your feet fresh all day long. These 100% wool boots will become your favorite off-duty style. Available for men and women.

 This comfortable and minimalist slip-on is a sleek, stylish marvel. Wools Cali is designed for running errands, walking the beach and bringing style to casual Fridays. The highly breathable and moisture absorbent 100% wool material makes this footwear attractive for a warmer climate. Available for men and women.

Sizing length measured from feet (inside the shoe) length

Womens:

Mens:

No More Cold! - is a slogan for our brand new winter footwear line specifically designed in Siberia to withstand severe winters! Made of 100% natural Siberian wool, this product is build without use of any chemicals. Your feet will always be protected from snowstorms and severe winter conditions. These boots are guaranteed to withstand -70C (-94F) degrees and last for ages if taken care of properly.

Here, on Kickstarter, we invite you to be among first people buying WOOLS at a discounted price. Give it a try - and you will see what we mean when we call these shoes the "perfect footwear" that your feet deserve.

We truly appreciate your help and, of course, you can help us by backing our project. You, as our backer are at the heart of our success and growth. We would like to ask you to please share our story and our project with your friends and relatives. Simply click on one of the “share” buttons on the top of this page or visit us on Facebook and Instagram and Twitter to like and to follow us to stay tuned with our progress!

As much as we believe in hard work and dedication, we also believe that we would never be able to build our product and company without sincere help of our friends and family. Special "thanks" goes to:

Paul Romero for all the awesome advice and willingness to be here for us at all times!

Jon Walsh for the amazing advice and tremendous help.

Ross Aidun for the incredible photos, videos and gracious help with other company aspects.

Claire Andrew for the amazing acting skills and support.

Daria Grave for being a great friend, supporter and actress.

Stephanie Nelson, Julia North and James Bardakjian for incredible modelling and acting talent.

Tessa (@tess) and Conor (@shootingsomething) for most beautiful commercial and pictures.

story:
Created to be a gorgeous, classic shape to complement absolutely anything in your closet, our shoes softly hug your feet with a hidden SoftSurround System™ so that you feel supreme cushion with each step.

Instead of sacrificing beauty for wearability, or accepting the pain of beautiful shoes, we have carefully re-engineered high heels and flats to give you the high-quality support you deserve.

We are offering this customized service to all Indiegogo backers as a thank you for helping us get started!

 

We have created a truly modern shoe for the modern world. We have thought of all the ways in which we wished flats and heels would feel, and how we wished they would wear over time, and we spent the last two years bringing them to life.

 

 

*Our Essential Flat comes with the same technology, with slight modifications.

For those of you who want to ease back into wearing heels on occasion, or simply love flats, the flat is an absolute game-changer. And for those of you who must have that go-to heel, we’ve got what you need. The heel stands at 3.5 inches, but feels MUCH LOWER due to the triple-cushion insert design, and overall technology.

 

 

 

 

 

 

If you don’t see your size here, we still want to make them for you! Please back this project so we can grow as a company and make it possible to create the sizes you need. Please also write to us in the comments with your size preference! We want every one of you to find freedom in your footwear.

 

 

 

Want to buy more than one pair of shoes, or a few pairs in different colors? Check out all rewards, help us spread the word so we can offer more colors, and get friends to order with you, so you can save money the more you bundle.

 

 

 

 

 

The idea for Antonia Saint NY came when walking to the THINX HQ in New York City and feeling pain in her feet. Similar to when she was working on creating THINX, it was her father’s DNA as an industrial designer that came alive inside of her.

Called a “Feminist Genius” by the press and nominated to Women 2.0’s “Top Founders to Watch,” Antonia is now focused on the women's shoe industry to create products that address both form, and function. She also Co-Founded The Brooklyn Shoe Factory to have a home for the custom-fit orders she will create in the U.S., with a focus to grow jobs as the company scales.

This is a fitting role for Dr. Levine, as the aristocrats of Manhattan commonly refer to her as the ‘Podiatrist in High Heels’ and she has been a candid supporter and a passionate advocate of women not having to sacrifice optimal foot health for the sake of their undeniable sense of fashion.

As a leading expert and author at the forefront of podiatry with a revolutionary resolve to “provide pain-free beauty,” she has become a favorite on various shows including Good Morning America, The Dr. Oz Show and The Today Show. Over her career of 30 years, Dr. Levine has seen more than 200,000 patients, and she has gained tremendous peer recognition as one of the most internationally acclaimed podiatrists in the industry.

 

We will also be helping to create more jobs in America with all custom-fit orders being fulfilled in our Brooklyn Shoe Factory, so thank you so much for helping this dream come true for us, and for everyone who would benefit from shoes like this!
story_txt:
Everyone needs that essential pair of black heels and flats that goes with everything. But most of the time, these hurt. At Antonia Saint NY, we believe that you should have beautiful shoes that make you feel great. That’s why we make essential heels and flats that look classic on the outside, and feel like sneakers on the inside.    Created to be a gorgeous, classic shape to complement absolutely anything in your closet, our shoes softly hug your feet with a hidden SoftSurround System™ so that you feel supreme cushion with each step.Instead of sacrificing beauty for wearability, or accepting the pain of beautiful shoes, we have carefully re-engineered high heels and flats to give you the high-quality support you deserve. 
Every well-loved shoe starts with finding the perfect fit. To provide you with shoes that are more personalized to fit you, we have a smartphone app that will help you create a Fit Profile™ and Sole Story™ to save your measurements and find your closest matching shoe. Once we get this info, our team will carefully customize your shoes to fit *you.*We are offering this customized service to all Indiegogo backers as a thank you for helping us get started!
 
 
At Antonia Saint NY, we believe that you should no longer be held back by something as simple as your footwear. If you’re going to fulfill your dreams, you can’t have part of your brain focused on the pain that you feel. You can’t break a glass ceiling with a glass slipper - and we’ve got lots of glass-breaking to do! - so it’s high time to Free the Feminine and Her Feet. 
 

 
 
 
 
We have created a truly modern shoe for the modern world. We have thought of all the ways in which we wished flats and heels would feel, and how we wished they would wear over time, and we spent the last two years bringing them to life.  
We have a patented SoftSurround System™ to gently cushion and support the entire foot. 
Made up of three distinct parts listed below, we also created these shoes to be some of the most durable you’ll ever own.
 
*Our Essential Flat comes with the same technology, with slight modifications.Everyone needs an essential black heel and an essential black flat in their closet. They go with everything and make anything look great. It’s like having that perfect little black dress, but for your feet.For those of you who want to ease back into wearing heels on occasion, or simply love flats, the flat is an absolute game-changer. And for those of you who must have that go-to heel, we’ve got what you need. The heel stands at 3.5 inches, but feels MUCH LOWER due to the triple-cushion insert design, and overall technology.  
Imagine wearing your favorite running shoes...
It feels fantastic. The combination of the plush interior that surrounds you, and the soft, flexible materials used throughout, makes this the most cushioned classic shoe you’ve ever experienced.
  
  
  
   
Finally, you can have a high heel that supports you in moving through life instead of just looking pretty. You now have three shoes built into one: Instead of wearing one pair to work, one pair at work, and one pair after work, feel confident you can make it through the entire day and night with one pair of beautiful shoes if you want to. You can: 
Don’t just listen to us. Hear from a few of those who have actually tried our shoes.

 

 
 
 

Making shoes that fit *you* requires some extra thought and care, but you’re worth it. You are unique, and there are no other two feet exactly like yours. 
Think about it: Does one of your shoes pinch more than the other? Or does one shoe move on your foot? Or worse, even fall off when you walk? 
With our split shoebox that arrives to you as a complete set, you can receive the perfect size for each individual foot. No other shoe company is doing this, and we’re proud to be the first.
 
We will send you a Fit Kit™ during the survey process to determine your size once the campaign closes. However, here is a general idea of size below, and remember, we will take your measurements for EACH foot.
 If you don’t see your size here, we still want to make them for you! Please back this project so we can grow as a company and make it possible to create the sizes you need. Please also write to us in the comments with your size preference! We want every one of you to find freedom in your footwear. 

Take a look at how other shoes perform over time in comparison to Antonia Saint NY.

 

Check out what you can save when you buy these well-made shoes. There's an old saying "buy cheap, and buy twice" and we know that to be true.  

 

Hate to say it, but you need to know (in case you haven’t figured it out yet) - the industry is a RACKET. Too often we fall for beautiful shoes that only hurt us. One study found that we have BILLIONS of dollars of unworn shoes sitting in our closets because of how painful they are known to be after just a few uses.

   

 
Become a backer of this project and pick a reward. This allows you to PRE-ORDER the shoes before they are made. You will not only receive your shoes before anyone else in the entire world, but you will get a special backer discount only available on this Indiegogo campaign here. 

Want to buy more than one pair of shoes, or a few pairs in different colors? Check out all rewards, help us spread the word so we can offer more colors, and get friends to order with you, so you can save money the more you bundle.
 

After the campaign is over, the Victoria Heel will retail for $295, and the Jane Autumn Flat will retail at $225. The Reward Cost at the top of each reward is the price you will pay for the shoes. AND don't forget - you are also receiving a FREE ($70 value) Custom-Fitting service ($35 per shoe with skilled technicians to custom-fit your shoes to EACH of your unique feet!), as a THANK YOU for helping us get started here on Indiegogo! Join us NOW because we will never have this incredible offer again! 

 
 

 

 
 
 

Antonia Saint Dunbar creates solutions for women and others who need them, and most often, products that are in industries dominated by men with minimal innovation. For her first company THINX, she led the design and wrote the patent for the period-proof underwear while also doing all operations of the company as COO for many years.

THINX went on to be named TIME Magazine's “Top 25 Best Inventions for 2015,” Entrepreneur Magazine's “Top 100 Most Brilliant Companies of 2016” and Fast Company's “Top 50 Most Innovative Companies in the World of 2017.” THINX also makes activewear, reusable tampon applicators and organic tampons, and every product comes with a giveback that empowers girls around the world. Her second company, Icon, makes products for incontinence and helps fund the Fistula Foundation.
The idea for Antonia Saint NY came when walking to the THINX HQ in New York City and feeling pain in her feet. Similar to when she was working on creating THINX, it was her father’s DNA as an industrial designer that came alive inside of her.
Called a “Feminist Genius” by the press and nominated to Women 2.0’s “Top Founders to Watch,” Antonia is now focused on the women's shoe industry to create products that address both form, and function. She also Co-Founded The Brooklyn Shoe Factory to have a home for the custom-fit orders she will create in the U.S., with a focus to grow jobs as the company scales.

Board-certified Podiatric Surgeon Dr. Suzanne Levine is the official advisor to Antonia Saint NY, and one of the Most Influential Podiatrists of 2017 by Podiatry Magazine. She is a highly-regarded instructor, Co-Chair of the International Aesthetic Foot Society (iafs.com) and Co-Founder of Institute Beauté.

A self-proclaimed shoe addict, Dr. Levine was inspired by her elite and celebrity-driven clientele to provide a solution for the ongoing effects that come from wearing the designer stilettos we all dream about. After creating several inventions of her own to address high heel pain and other types of shoe problems, she tackled the root of the issue, the shoe itself, and partnered with Antonia Saint Dunbar for Antonia Saint NY. 
This is a fitting role for Dr. Levine, as the aristocrats of Manhattan commonly refer to her as the ‘Podiatrist in High Heels’ and she has been a candid supporter and a passionate advocate of women not having to sacrifice optimal foot health for the sake of their undeniable sense of fashion.
As a leading expert and author at the forefront of podiatry with a revolutionary resolve to “provide pain-free beauty,” she has become a favorite on various shows including Good Morning America, The Dr. Oz Show and The Today Show. Over her career of 30 years, Dr. Levine has seen more than 200,000 patients, and she has gained tremendous peer recognition as one of the most internationally acclaimed podiatrists in the industry.

We are incredibly fortunate to have a team of more than 25 people working with us to help bring this dream to life for all of you. We have the expertise of production partners, consultants and shoemakers, and here is the team who works in New York City every week with Co-Founders Antonia Saint Dunbar and Obed Moses Cepeda.

 

We will be using these funds to create our first production orders of shoes, including all the tooling, molds and components that these complex designs need across many sizes! The more money we raise, the more we can make for all of you! 
We will also be helping to create more jobs in America with all custom-fit orders being fulfilled in our Brooklyn Shoe Factory, so thank you so much for helping this dream come true for us, and for everyone who would benefit from shoes like this!

story:
Our Story:

Darion Cortez is an luxury accessories brand that plans to be the most interactive and consumer friendly luxury brand in the world. Founded in 2010 by Darion Cortez a self-taught artist from St. Louis, Mo. the concept of the brand started as a favor for a friend. Darion was approached by a close friend who at the time worked in a clothing store whose manager was looking for an original pair of shoes to use as a display. This friend knowing Darion was an artist decided to ask him if he'd be up to handle the task. Having been in a rut with art for a while he jumped at the chance to try it as he saw it as a new and fun challenge as well as an opportunity to try a new form of art. Darion was supposed to show one shoe concept but instead showed twelve. After presenting his designs to his friend Darion decided to stick with shoe designing and over the next few years started to develop his own style. Since shoe designing was an art form he'd never tried before he looked to Louboutin, Giuseppe Zanotti, Ruthie Davis, and Nicholas Kirkwood for inspiration on how to design beautiful shoes. In 2015 Darion decided to expand his creativity and started to branch out into designing other accessories such as jewelry, handbags, backpacks, and sunglasses. Now in 2016 with your help he's ready to begin the process to launch his brand in the Autumn/Winter 17/18 season.



About Us:

As stated above we want to be the most interactive and consumer friendly luxury brand in the world. We want our customers to have a say and take part in creating the products that we produce. We plan to do this by putting these three key factors in place.


  • Customer Choice Vote: Twice a year before seasonal collection go into production we will post 3 CAD footwear designs to Twitter and Instagram and ask our customers to "Like" their favorite design. The design with the most likes by the determined deadline will be added into the seasonal collection.


  • Print Design Contest: Also taking place twice a year we will ask our customers to submit original works of art to be turned into printed fabrics for our products. We will provide the color palette and pattern concept for the contest, then it's up to our customers/artists to create the pattern that closely fits the concept. The winner will receive a prize yet to be determined.


  • Custom Products: Customers will be able to collaborate with our designer to produce one of a kind never for sale products. You get to choose each fabric/material your product is made with. As per below we're posting some shoe designs that won't be in our debut collections and will only be available as future custom purchases.

To keep the lines of communication open with our customers we will be participating in Twitter chats #GentsChat every Monday, #FashionUnfold every second Tuesday of the month, and #StyleChat every Wednesday. In these chats we'll talk about what's ahead for the brand and our launch details. We'll also post CAD photos of some of our upcoming and not-for-sale products.


What We Need:

We're seeking to raise $750,000 to begin the process of launching Darion Cortez. The funding will allow us to produce samples of our Autumn/Winter 17/18 and Spring/Summer 18 collections as well as produce both collections in full, pay for office space/supplies and advertising. If we reach our full goal our Autumn/Winter collection will be available July 2017 and our Spring/Summer collection will be available February 2018.

Our Autumn/Winter 17/18 collection will consist of 11 women's style from pumps to sling backs, booties, sandals, and a thigh high boot. The collection will also have 9 men's styles 5 sneakers and 4 boots.

Our Spring/Summer 18 collection will consist of 15 women's styles from, cut out booties, strap sandals, wedges, and a knee high gladiator sandal. The collection will also have 5 men's sneakers.



What You Can Expect:

What you can expect for Darion Cortez is vibrant, bold, unique, and beautifully designed accessories. For the first year we will be focused on our women's and men's footwear and slowly grow into our other products which will include: Jewelry such as rings, ear rings, bracelets, necklaces, handbags, backpacks, eyewear, fragrances and nail polish.

  • Our footwear will be handmade with high quality fabrics and materials by one of the best shoe factories in Italy which also products shoes for other luxury brands.
  • Our jewelry, eyewear, fragrances, and nail polishes will all be produced in New York by top manufacturers.
  • Our handbags and backpacks will be handcrafted in Los Angeles with top quality materials.
Below are a few of our women's shoe designs (not part of AW17/18 or SS18).


Other Ways You Can Help 

We'd greatly appreciate it if you would share our campaign with others you think might like to see our designs and contribute to helping our brand come to life.

story:
The primary goal is to be able to contribute in active and positive way of the spread of an ecofriendly culture. Because today we all live in a fast and frantic way, we feel the need to slow down, get back to the origins, our foundation, so we could simply have greater knowledge and consciousness of things around us. So we think every single action facing the respect of nature and the safeguarding of the atmosphere, contributes to a general improvement of the entire planet. Through a progressive design , environmental sustainability and simplicity, the main task of Elemento is therefore commit to make the collections of wristwatches in wood deriving from Japanese woods controlled harvest. All this for an extra support to an international association, one of many Italian realities to create new woodland areas for the descent harmful emissions in the atmosphere. From here the idea that all our watches will be sold to a certificate that attests grow plants that to show the contribution that every single person will give to this project.
Now we're here, on Indiegogo, with a fully functional prototype that looks amazing. We just need one more thing... your support!

IMPORTANT: These watches are only used to raise funds, this project is based on working with carpenters to retrieve the timber.

ELEMENTO is also backed with a warranty. We are so confident with the quality and durability of our watches, that if something were to happen within the first year, we hope you will send it back to us. This warranty covers manufacturing defects on the watch itself (movement, case, crystal).Note that repair/replacements will be charged in the following cases, even during the warranty term.

– Failure or damage caused by improper use or carelessness (knocks, dents, crushing, broken crystal, etc.)
– Failure or damage caused by unjustifiable repair or modification
– Failure or damage caused by fire or water
– Esthetic changes that occur during normal wear and tear and aging (minor scratches, etc.; on the case and/or cystal, alteration of the colour on the watchband and the peeling of the plating)
– In case the retail store and the purchase date are not indicated on the warranty, or if this information has been rewritten
– If the warranty is not submitted along with the watch.


Who is the team?

The idea sinks its roots from the mind of Davide Zanon, a young entrepreneur passionate about photography and lover of trips. Tired of the routine and fascinated with the eastern culture he meets in Germany Mayo, a Japanese girl, sharing with her his dream of being able to contribute to the safeguarding of the atmosphere, since then, back to Italy he begins to develop his business idea that would allow him to finance his plans related to the environment with the help of everyone. In the way he meets Geshe Mancini a friend, a young movie director and they plan together every detail of promotion and communications online and offline. On this team, take part too Marco Trestini (Marketing), Roberta (copywriters), Amina (translator) , Matteo (quality control and development), Fabiano (photographer).


Watch Specifications:

100% Natural Wood 
Hypo-allergenic 
Completely free of toxic chemicals
Case Material:  bamboo
Case Diameter: 49 mm
Band Material: genuine Leather
Band Width: 22 mm
Dial Window Material: Crystal Mineral Glass
Display: Analog
Movement: Japanese Quartz (Miyota)


We Need Your Support

We need YOU, too! We remind you that Indiegogo will allow us to raise the funds only if we reach our goal. We will try to promote the project in different ways,online and offline, and we hope, through the use of social media and the blogs we can address all traffic here. Sharing the page, promoting the project, publishing picture with the #hashtag elementowatches You can really contribute to the spread of this fund-raiser. You have just to subscribe in the Facebook page and Instagram to receive the latest news and share it with all your friends and the followers of our work.


If funded, how will you fulfill the orders?

We have optimised the initial prototype, studied the different kinds of wood, perfected the design and choose our producer who has a great experience in our business. Once the Indiegogo campaign is over and we'll get your funds, we can start the production which could take about 30 days according to the amount of the order. We'll do everything we can to respect the time of delivery and we'll keep you updated about your order.

Risks and challenges

The challenge for Elemento Watches are many. Once we collected funds that are necessary to production we will try all over the world to promote our watches with our echo-loyal concept. To make this work we need the help of all to spread this project: blogger, friends, relatives, magazines, every channel is important to bring more and more visibility to our collection. Some features may change the original watches. It all depends if we reach our goal .

story:
**NOTE! The PERK thumbnail images only represent the amount of pins you GET, you can CHOOSE whichever design you want on ANY tier! -CV**

Hello we are Coastalvania, a pin & art company started by comic book creator Corey Lewis Reyyy. Coastalvania started in August 2017. Over the last year we have shipped over 200 pins around the world! 

Here are the pins we've made so far, most of them highly inspired by nerd culture: 

Here's some of our pins in the wild





Along with those, we have a new wave of pins we'd also like to make! 

 

All the designs have been proofed and are ready to go into production! All we need is funding from you! 

+ + + 

Limited Edition: 

Backers at the $50+ level will be eligible to receive the Coastalvania Limited Edition VIP pin "Catacomb Saint" for the first time here on this Indiegogo! Limited to 200, with a signature by Reyyy on the backing card.

+ + + 

Selection: 

You can choose any Coastalvania pin(s) for your Perk selection. Many of our Perk selections offer free pins as well. You can also feel free to choose multiples of the same design if you wish.

See the "Perks" to your right to make your selection of pins! You can choose multiple of the same design if you want!  *Note: We have a lot of pins! So our Selection is split into two columns "A" & "B" in PERKS. Please only select one pin design in the "A & B" column per pin, leaving the 2nd option "No Selection"!  ✌️

+ + + 

Bonus: 

In addition to your sweet, sweet Coastalvania pins, all backers of this campaign will receive a pair of Coastalvania stickers featuring our designs! 

Backers at $50+ levels will get access to our VIP "Catacomb Saint" pin, as well as a special VIP Coastalvania Indiegogo backing card for your pins! 


+ + + 

Stretch Goals:

If we reach certain milestones we'll make some additional content:

$6k - ALL backers will receive an additional "T-<300" die-cut sticker! 

$7k - ALL backers will receive an additional "Send Noods" die-cut sticker!

$8k - A brand new Coastalvania pin, "Seek-a Slate" will be added for all backers at $30 or above!

$9k - ALL backers will receive an expanded Coastalvania Sticker Set

Should we surpass these goals (!!), we'll think of even more fun stuff to include for Backers!
 

+ + + 

Funding:

The funding you provide us will go to the following: 

$3k for the actual pressing of the pins! 

$1k for backing cards and other ancillary production

$1k for shipping! 

We're hoping we surpass these goals. Should we surpass the amounts we need, that money would go towards even more new designs!
 

+ + + 

Shipping: 

Our Product Shipping Coordinator Arabella has handled Coastalvania's orders for over a year and will be fulfilling the orders here as well with the additional help of a small team. You can count on us to deliver your pins by the target deadline!
 

+ + + 

Thank you for your interest, we hope you enjoy what you see :)

CV
story_txt: **NOTE! The PERK thumbnail images only represent the amount of pins you GET, you can CHOOSE whichever design you want on ANY tier! -CV**Hello we are Coastalvania, a pin & art company started by comic book creator Corey Lewis Reyyy. Coastalvania started in August 2017. Over the last year we have shipped over 200 pins around the world! Here are the pins we've made so far, most of them highly inspired by nerd culture: Here's some of our pins in the wildAlong with those, we have a new wave of pins we'd also like to make!  All the designs have been proofed and are ready to go into production! All we need is funding from you! + + + Limited Edition: Backers at the $50+ level will be eligible to receive the Coastalvania Limited Edition VIP pin "Catacomb Saint" for the first time here on this Indiegogo! Limited to 200, with a signature by Reyyy on the backing card.+ + + Selection: You can choose any Coastalvania pin(s) for your Perk selection. Many of our Perk selections offer free pins as well. You can also feel free to choose multiples of the same design if you wish.See the "Perks" to your right to make your selection of pins! You can choose multiple of the same design if you want!  *Note: We have a lot of pins! So our Selection is split into two columns "A" & "B" in PERKS. Please only select one pin design in the "A & B" column per pin, leaving the 2nd option "No Selection"!  ✌️+ + + Bonus: In addition to your sweet, sweet Coastalvania pins, all backers of this campaign will receive a pair of Coastalvania stickers featuring our designs! Backers at $50+ levels will get access to our VIP "Catacomb Saint" pin, as well as a special VIP Coastalvania Indiegogo backing card for your pins! + + + Stretch Goals:If we reach certain milestones we'll make some additional content:$6k - ALL backers will receive an additional "T-<300" die-cut sticker! $7k - ALL backers will receive an additional "Send Noods" die-cut sticker!$8k - A brand new Coastalvania pin, "Seek-a Slate" will be added for all backers at $30 or above!$9k - ALL backers will receive an expanded Coastalvania Sticker SetShould we surpass these goals (!!), we'll think of even more fun stuff to include for Backers! + + + Funding:The funding you provide us will go to the following: $3k for the actual pressing of the pins! $1k for backing cards and other ancillary production$1k for shipping! We're hoping we surpass these goals. Should we surpass the amounts we need, that money would go towards even more new designs! + + + Shipping: Our Product Shipping Coordinator Arabella has handled Coastalvania's orders for over a year and will be fulfilling the orders here as well with the additional help of a small team. You can count on us to deliver your pins by the target deadline! + + + Thank you for your interest, we hope you enjoy what you see :)CV

story:
You desire to walk comfortably and you design your outfit starting from your shoes.  

Your feet are aching for style and comfort. You are not satisfied with the options out there for your funky esthetic and demand for quality and simplicity. We heard your prayers and answered...here’s what we came up with!

We created a durable cork based shoe that takes all this into consideration. The result is the tsouls shoe wearing lifestyle.  From One To Many, is our motto.

When your mood or outfit changes, so can your shoe. Your worldly travels will take on a new level of comfort when you just need to take one shoe that meets all your needs.  Transformed easily by peeling off your top and attaching a new one. Have fun with changeable tops while being seriously comfortable, stylish and equally responsible to the earth. Let's take a look at what makes this unique concept interesting for those who care about such things as style and being eco-conscious at the same time.

YOU ASK:  Why Change-able tops?

BECAUSE:  this concept allows you to have many different looks with just one shoe.  Minimizing the amount of shoes for your many outfits. Wear tsouls when you travel and pack only the tops in our customized sole bag….so no shoes to pack!  But you’ve still packed many shoes. THAT’S THE WHOLE IDEA! The storage space in your closet will happily get some extra room because it will not be taken up by tons of unworn shoes.

YOU ASK:  So what’s the quality like?  I’m tired of cheap, plastic shoes that hurt my feet.

WE DELIVER:  We use the highest quality cork and infuse it with natural latex. Then, we cover it with chrome-free leather and insert heel springs, for that extra bounce in your step. No plastic! We Promise.

YOU ASK: What’s so eco-friendly about it?

IT IS: Our 3RE recycling program to benefit you, me and the cork tree.  It goes something like this:

1 > YOU REturn - your love-worn soles back to us

2 > WE REcycle - those old soles for new ones

3 > YOU RElive - your newborn soles at cost value

Hey, shocking news!  9 out of 10 shoes will find themselves in shoe landfills that are growing and growing!  We feel we cannot contribute to such waste so we encourage all our wearers to return their old shoes back to us and we will recycle them.  In return, we will sell you a new base shoe at cost value. Let’s stay out of the shoe mountains and just walk the real mountains.

We THINK: Recycling is essential for any modern day business and everyone should be aware of how we can contribute to keeping our Earth a clean and healthy environment.

YOU ASK:  WHAT KIND OF BUSINESS PRACTICES ARE IMPORTANT TO YOU?

WE PRACTICE:  AD4BS - attention deficit 4 bullshit - that’s how we operate.  
We must demand what we want to produce and how we would like to have it produced.  We have to sleep at night knowing that our product is made on the premises of good manufacturing practices and environments.  We accomplish this in Portugal.

And our favorite part is … the cork footwear industry not only nurtures sustainable cork forests and their ecosystems, but also, puts out so little pollution that bird nests are thriving around the perimeter of the factory.

AD4BS in a nutshell:

1. responsible, clean and sustainable manufacturing

2. soulful partnerships and collaborations

3. high quality materials with eco-demand

4. price transparency

5. direct to you with no middle-man

So for now, peruse our first basic line and stay tuned for more, emerging designs. Many are on the drawing boards. Materials of recycled ocean plastics and others will be intentionally used for new, up-cycled tops.

We are all about scaling down, living clean, walking in shoes that support our comfort needs and making sure we're having a good time doing it.

Let’s team up and make this happen and bring this vision to all souls.

Payment: Enter your payment information and please remember you won’t be billed until our campaign is over, so be patient and think Ohhmmmmmm

Size, Color and Shipping Info:  Once we wrap things up you will receive a survey asking and answering many questions.  That's when the real fun begins!

Brandon Murphy of B|M|C 

  t.souls featured designer and collaborator

B|M|C, an emerging New York City-based ready-to-wear brand collaborates with t.souls for an exclusive three-part release of attachable tops. This refined and athletic collection includes styles in premium suede and cotton neoprene, all sourced from Portugal. Our team, alongside Brandon Murphy, thoughtfully considered every detail to create this luxurious offering of wardrobe staples.

 

 

_the evolution of collaboration

We love the idea of collaboration so much that it is our intention to engage with different designers and artisans. Such as groups in different countries that support small sewing circles. We will seek these opportunities for limited runs of tops, on a regular basis.  We believe design should be innovative, therefore, we will be constantly seeking newness and freshness, alongside our basic line.

 

 

 

 

 

_ so, therefore, in this world of corrupt and unsafe business practices, we're doing it differently because we are compelled to be part of the change and thus AD4BS_

 

 

How it all began

After lifetimes of frustration over having too many no-good shoes, cluttering our closets, we took it upon ourselves to create a solution that meets our expectations of both comfort and style.  Since we are a traveling and creative bunch, we were able to cook up something that we haven’t seen yet.  After much talking and drawing and thinking, we composed our shoe, with its own personal storage, to meet all our desires for change-ability, walk-ability and organizational needs.  Turned out to be pretty freakin’ great so we bring it to you.

"There once was a shoe, that didn’t know what to do  It’s top was all worn, perhaps a bit torn  Was that it for the shoe? It still wanted to do  So it thought and it thought about quite a lot  And wished it could JUST get a new top"

- Olga's ode to t.souls inspired by Leonard Cohen
